================================================
FILE: CJ_6/script.js
================================================
/**
 * æ™ºæ…§åŸå¸‚é©¾é©¶èˆ±æ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ
 * @description å®ç°å¸‚é•¿è§£å†³åœè½¦éš¾é—®é¢˜çš„å®Œæ•´æ¼”ç¤ºæµç¨‹
 * @author AI Assistant
 * @version 1.0.0
 */

class SmartCityDashboard {
    constructor() {
        this.currentStep = 1;
        this.isVoiceActive = false;
        this.voiceCommands = [
            "å°æ…§ï¼Œè°ƒå‡ºæ˜¨å¤©çš„åŸå¸‚æœåŠ¡æ—¥æŠ¥",
            "æ·±å…¥åˆ†æ'åœè½¦éš¾'é—®é¢˜",
            "é’ˆå¯¹Aè¡—é“çš„è½¦ä½ä¸è¶³é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨é™„è¿‘çš„åºŸå¼ƒCåœ°å—ï¼Œæ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰300ä¸ªè½¦ä½çš„æ™ºæ…§åœè½¦åœºï¼Œè¿›è¡Œ'What-If'æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ"
        ];
        this.currentCommandIndex = 0;
        this.map = null;
        this.heatmap = null;
        
        this.init();
    }

    /**
     * åˆå§‹åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ
     */
    init() {
        this.bindEvents();
        this.updateTime();
        this.animateCharts();
    }

    /**
     * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
     */
    bindEvents() {
        // ä¸»æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®
        document.getElementById('startDemoBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo());
        document.getElementById('voiceControlBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleVoiceModal());
        document.getElementById('resetBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());

        // æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹åŠŸèƒ½
        const pointsBtn = document.getElementById('pointsBtn');
        const pointsCloseBtn = document.getElementById('pointsCloseBtn');
        const pointsPopupOverlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        
        pointsBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showPointsPopup());
        pointsCloseBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.hidePointsPopup());
        pointsPopupOverlay?.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target === pointsPopupOverlay) {
                this.hidePointsPopup();
            }
        });

        // è¯­éŸ³ç›¸å…³æŒ‰é’®
        document.getElementById('voiceBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleVoiceModal());
        document.getElementById('closeVoice')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.closeVoiceModal());

        // æ­¥éª¤é—´å¯¼èˆª
        document.getElementById('analyzeParking')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.goToStep(2));
        document.getElementById('backToStep1')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.goToStep(1));
        document.getElementById('simulateDecision')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.goToStep(3));
        document.getElementById('backToStep2')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.goToStep(2));

        // åœ°å›¾ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶å°†åœ¨åœ°å›¾åˆå§‹åŒ–åç»‘å®š

        // å…³é—­åˆ†æå¼¹çª—
        document.getElementById('closeAnalysis')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.closeAreaAnalysis());

        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç›¸å…³
        document.getElementById('runSimulation')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.runSimulation());
        document.getElementById('approveDecision')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.approveDecision());
        document.getElementById('modifyDecision')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.modifyDecision());
        document.getElementById('moreSimulation')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.moreSimulation());

        // åœ°å›¾åˆ·æ–°æŒ‰é’®
        document.getElementById('refreshMapBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.refreshMap());

        // ç‚¹å‡»å¼¹çª—å¤–éƒ¨å…³é—­
        document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target.classList.contains('area-analysis') || e.target.classList.contains('voice-modal')) {
                this.closeAreaAnalysis();
                this.closeVoiceModal();
            }
        });

        // çª—å£å¤§å°å˜åŒ–æ—¶é‡æ–°è°ƒæ•´åœ°å›¾
        window.addEventListener('resize', debounce(() => {
            if (this.map) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.map.getSize();
                    this.map.setFitView();
                }, 100);
            }
        }, 300));
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º
     */
    startDemo() {
        this.showVoiceAssistant();
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.simulateVoiceCommand("å°æ…§ï¼Œè°ƒå‡ºæ˜¨å¤©çš„åŸå¸‚æœåŠ¡æ—¥æŠ¥");
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.showDailyReport();
            }, 2000);
        }, 1000);
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
     */
    resetDemo() {
        this.currentStep = 1;
        this.currentCommandIndex = 0;
        this.hideAllSteps();
        document.getElementById('step1').style.display = 'block';
        document.getElementById('dailyReport').style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('voiceWaves').style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('assistantStatus').textContent = 'ç­‰å¾…æŒ‡ä»¤ä¸­...';
        this.closeAreaAnalysis();
        this.closeVoiceModal();
        this.resetSimulation();
    }

    /**
     * è·³è½¬åˆ°æŒ‡å®šæ­¥éª¤
     * @param {number} step - æ­¥éª¤ç¼–å·
     */
    goToStep(step) {
        this.currentStep = step;
        this.hideAllSteps();
        document.getElementById(`step${step}`).style.display = 'block';
        
        if (step === 2) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.animateCharts();
                this.initMap();
            }, 500);
        }
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ‰€æœ‰æ­¥éª¤
     */
    hideAllSteps() {
        document.querySelectorAll('.step-container').forEach(step => {
            step.style.display = 'none';
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºè¯­éŸ³åŠ©æ‰‹æ´»åŠ¨çŠ¶æ€
     */
    showVoiceAssistant() {
        document.getElementById('voiceWaves').style.display = 'flex';
        document.getElementById('assistantStatus').textContent = 'æ­£åœ¨è†å¬...';
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¯­éŸ³æŒ‡ä»¤
     * @param {string} command - è¯­éŸ³æŒ‡ä»¤å†…å®¹
     */
    simulateVoiceCommand(command) {
        const commandElement = document.getElementById('assistantStatus');
        commandElement.textContent = `"${command}"`;
        commandElement.style.color = '#667eea';
        commandElement.style.fontWeight = '600';
        
        setTimeout(() => {
            commandElement.textContent = 'AIæ­£åœ¨å¤„ç†ä¸­...';
            commandElement.style.color = '#6c757d';
            commandElement.style.fontWeight = '400';
        }, 2000);
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºåŸå¸‚æœåŠ¡æ—¥æŠ¥
     */
    showDailyReport() {
        document.getElementById('dailyReport').style.display = 'block';
        document.getElementById('voiceWaves').style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('assistantStatus').textContent = 'æŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆå®Œæ¯•';
        
        // é«˜äº®æ˜¾ç¤ºåœè½¦é—®é¢˜
        setTimeout(() => {
            const highlightCard = document.querySelector('.metric-card.highlight');
            highlightCard.style.animation = 'pulse 1s ease-in-out 3';
        }, 1000);
    }

    /**
     * åˆ‡æ¢è¯­éŸ³æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
     */
    toggleVoiceModal() {
        const modal = document.getElementById('voiceModal');
        const isVisible = modal.style.display === 'block';
        
        if (!isVisible) {
            modal.style.display = 'block';
            this.isVoiceActive = true;
            this.startVoiceRecognition();
        } else {
            this.closeVoiceModal();
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­è¯­éŸ³æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
     */
    closeVoiceModal() {
        document.getElementById('voiceModal').style.display = 'none';
        this.isVoiceActive = false;
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ«
     */
    startVoiceRecognition() {
        const commandElement = document.getElementById('voiceCommand');
        let currentCommand = '';
        
        if (this.currentCommandIndex < this.voiceCommands.length) {
            currentCommand = this.voiceCommands[this.currentCommandIndex];
            this.currentCommandIndex++;
        } else {
            currentCommand = "è¯·è¯´å‡ºæ‚¨çš„æŒ‡ä»¤...";
        }
        
        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé€å­—è¯†åˆ«
        let index = 0;
        const interval = setInterval(() => {
            if (index <= currentCommand.length) {
                commandElement.textContent = currentCommand.substring(0, index);
                index++;
            } else {
                clearInterval(interval);
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.closeVoiceModal();
                    this.processVoiceCommand(currentCommand);
                }, 1000);
            }
        }, 100);
    }

    /**
     * å¤„ç†è¯­éŸ³æŒ‡ä»¤
     * @param {string} command - è¯†åˆ«åˆ°çš„è¯­éŸ³æŒ‡ä»¤
     */
    processVoiceCommand(command) {
        if (command.includes('æ—¥æŠ¥')) {
            this.showDailyReport();
        } else if (command.includes('åœè½¦éš¾')) {
            setTimeout(() => this.goToStep(2), 500);
        } else if (command.includes('æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ')) {
            setTimeout(() => this.goToStep(3), 500);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºåŒºåŸŸåˆ†æ
     * @param {string} area - åŒºåŸŸåç§°
     */
    showAreaAnalysis(area) {
        const analysisData = {
            'Aè¡—é“': {
                title: 'ğŸ” Aè¡—é“åœè½¦é—®é¢˜æ ¹æºåˆ†æ',
                content: `
                    <h4>æ ¸å¿ƒçŸ›ç›¾</h4>
                    <p>è¯¥åŒºåŸŸä¸ºè€æ—§å°åŒºï¼ŒåŸå§‹è½¦ä½é…æ¯”ä¸¥é‡ä¸è¶³ï¼ˆè½¦ä½:æˆ·æ•° â‰ˆ 1:5ï¼‰</p>
                    
                    <h4>æ•°æ®å…³è”å‘ç°</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li>70%çš„"ä¹±åœè½¦"æŠ•è¯‰ï¼Œå‘ç”Ÿåœ¨å‘¨è¾¹500ç±³å†…æ— å…¬å…±åœè½¦åœºçš„åŒºåŸŸ</li>
                        <li>åœè½¦é—®é¢˜æŠ•è¯‰é‡ä¸å±…æ°‘å¯†åº¦å‘ˆå¼ºæ­£ç›¸å…³ï¼ˆRÂ²=0.89ï¼‰</li>
                        <li>æ™šé—´æŠ•è¯‰å æ¯”é«˜è¾¾85%ï¼Œä¸»è¦é›†ä¸­åœ¨19:00-21:00</li>
                    </ul>
                    
                    <h4>å¸‚æ°‘åŸå£°çƒ­è¯</h4>
                    <p><strong>"æ²¡åœ°æ–¹åœ"ã€"è´´æ¡"ã€"æŠ¢è½¦ä½"ã€"å¤ªéš¾äº†"</strong></p>
                    
                    <h4>å‘¨è¾¹ç¯å¢ƒåˆ†æ</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li>è·ç¦»æœ€è¿‘å…¬å…±åœè½¦åœºï¼š1.2å…¬é‡Œ</li>
                        <li>é“è·¯å®½åº¦é™åˆ¶ï¼Œæ— æ³•å¢è®¾è·¯è¾¹åœè½¦ä½</li>
                        <li>é™„è¿‘æœ‰ä¸€å—é—²ç½®åœŸåœ°ï¼ˆCåœ°å—ï¼‰ï¼Œé¢ç§¯çº¦8000å¹³æ–¹ç±³</li>
                    </ul>
                `
            },
            'Bå¹¿åœº': {
                title: 'ğŸ” Bå¹¿åœºåœè½¦é—®é¢˜æ ¹æºåˆ†æ',
                content: `
                    <h4>æ ¸å¿ƒçŸ›ç›¾</h4>
                    <p>å…¬å…±åœè½¦åœºæ”¶è´¹æ ‡å‡†ä¸ä¸€ï¼Œä¸”ä»·æ ¼è¾ƒé«˜ï¼ˆå‡ä»· > 15å…ƒ/å°æ—¶ï¼‰</p>
                    
                    <h4>æ•°æ®å…³è”å‘ç°</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li>å‘¨è¾¹é“è·¯è¿åœæŠ•è¯‰é‡ï¼Œä¸åœè½¦åœºä»·æ ¼è°ƒæ•´å‘ˆå¼ºæ­£ç›¸å…³</li>
                        <li>85%çš„å¸‚æ°‘åœ¨å’¨è¯¢æ”¶è´¹æ ‡å‡†æ—¶ï¼Œéƒ½è¡¨è¾¾äº†"å¤ªè´µ"çš„æƒ…ç»ª</li>
                        <li>ä»·æ ¼æ¯ä¸Šæ¶¨1å…ƒ/å°æ—¶ï¼Œè¿åœæŠ•è¯‰å¢åŠ çº¦12%</li>
                    </ul>
                    
                    <h4>å¸‚æ°‘åŸå£°çƒ­è¯</h4>
                    <p><strong>"åœä¸èµ·"ã€"æ”¶è´¹ä¹±"ã€"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¿™ä¹ˆè´µ"ã€"ä¸åˆç†"</strong></p>
                    
                    <h4>æ”¶è´¹ç°çŠ¶åˆ†æ</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li>å•†ä¸šä¸­å¿ƒåœè½¦è´¹ï¼š15-25å…ƒ/å°æ—¶</li>
                        <li>å‘¨è¾¹é“è·¯ä¸´åœï¼š10å…ƒ/å°æ—¶ï¼Œä½†è½¦ä½ç¨€ç¼º</li>
                        <li>å¸‚æ°‘æœŸæœ›ä»·æ ¼ï¼š8-12å…ƒ/å°æ—¶</li>
                    </ul>
                `
            }
        };

        const data = analysisData[area];
        if (data) {
            document.getElementById('analysisTitle').textContent = data.title;
            document.getElementById('analysisBody').innerHTML = data.content;
            document.getElementById('areaAnalysis').style.display = 'flex';
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­åŒºåŸŸåˆ†æ
     */
    closeAreaAnalysis() {
        document.getElementById('areaAnalysis').style.display = 'none';
    }

    /**
     * è¿è¡Œæ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
     */
    runSimulation() {
        const targetArea = document.getElementById('targetArea').value;
        const solution = document.getElementById('solution').value;
        
        document.getElementById('simulationResults').style.display = 'block';
        document.getElementById('loadingAnimation').style.display = 'block';
        document.getElementById('resultsContent').style.display = 'none';
        
        // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAIåˆ†æè¿‡ç¨‹
        setTimeout(() => {
            document.getElementById('loadingAnimation').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('resultsContent').style.display = 'block';
            document.getElementById('finalActions').style.display = 'flex';
            
            // æ ¹æ®é€‰æ‹©æ›´æ–°ç»“æœå†…å®¹
            this.updateSimulationResults(targetArea, solution);
        }, 3000);
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»“æœ
     * @param {string} area - ç›®æ ‡åŒºåŸŸ
     * @param {string} solution - è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ
     */
    updateSimulationResults(area, solution) {
        // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒçš„åŒºåŸŸå’Œæ–¹æ¡ˆæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸åŒçš„ç»“æœ
        // å½“å‰æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯é»˜è®¤çš„Aè¡—é“æ–°å»ºåœè½¦åœºæ–¹æ¡ˆ
        console.log(`æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»“æœ: ${area} - ${solution}`);
        
        // æ·»åŠ åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
        const items = document.querySelectorAll('.impact-item, .risk-item, .recommendation-item');
        items.forEach((item, index) => {
            item.style.opacity = '0';
            item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
            setTimeout(() => {
                item.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
                item.style.opacity = '1';
                item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
            }, index * 200);
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ‰¹å‡†å†³ç­–
     */
    approveDecision() {
        this.showMessage('âœ… æ–¹æ¡ˆå·²æ‰¹å‡†ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨ç”Ÿæˆå®æ–½è®¡åˆ’...', 'success');
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.showMessage('ğŸ“‹ å®æ–½è®¡åˆ’å·²ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œå·²æ´¾å‘è‡³ç›¸å…³éƒ¨é—¨æ‰§è¡Œ', 'success');
        }, 2000);
    }

    /**
     * ä¿®æ”¹æ–¹æ¡ˆ
     */
    modifyDecision() {
        this.showMessage('ğŸ“ è¿›å…¥æ–¹æ¡ˆä¿®æ”¹æ¨¡å¼...', 'info');
        // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ ä¿®æ”¹ç•Œé¢çš„é€»è¾‘
    }

    /**
     * æ›´å¤šæ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
     */
    moreSimulation() {
        this.resetSimulation();
        this.showMessage('ğŸ”„ å‡†å¤‡è¿›è¡Œæ–°çš„æ¨¡æ‹Ÿåˆ†æ...', 'info');
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
     */
    resetSimulation() {
        document.getElementById('simulationResults').style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('finalActions').style.display = 'none';
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯æç¤º
     * @param {string} message - æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
     * @param {string} type - æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹
     */
    showMessage(message, type = 'info') {
        // åˆ›å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯æç¤ºå…ƒç´ 
        const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
        messageDiv.className = `message-toast ${type}`;
        messageDiv.textContent = message;
        messageDiv.style.cssText = `
            position: fixed;
            top: 100px;
            right: 20px;
            background: ${type === 'success' ? '#27ae60' : type === 'error' ? '#e74c3c' : '#667eea'};
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 25px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            z-index: 9999;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(100%);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        `;
        
        document.body.appendChild(messageDiv);
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ¨ç”»
        setTimeout(() => {
            messageDiv.style.opacity = '1';
            messageDiv.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
        }, 100);
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨ç§»é™¤
        setTimeout(() => {
            messageDiv.style.opacity = '0';
            messageDiv.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.body.removeChild(messageDiv);
            }, 300);
        }, 3000);
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
     */
    updateTime() {
        const timeElement = document.getElementById('currentTime');
        if (timeElement) {
            const now = new Date();
            const options = { 
                year: 'numeric', 
                month: 'long', 
                day: 'numeric',
                hour: '2-digit',
                minute: '2-digit'
            };
            timeElement.textContent = now.toLocaleDateString('zh-CN', options);
        }
    }

    /**
     * å›¾è¡¨åŠ¨ç”»
     */
    animateCharts() {
        // é—®é¢˜ç±»å‹åˆ†å¸ƒå¡ç‰‡åŠ¨ç”»
        const chartItems = document.querySelectorAll('#problemChart .chart-item');
        chartItems.forEach((item, index) => {
            const progressBar = item.querySelector('.chart-progress-bar');
            const value = item.getAttribute('data-value');
            const icon = item.querySelector('.chart-icon');
            const valueElement = item.querySelector('.chart-value');
            
            // åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€
            item.style.opacity = '0';
            item.style.transform = 'translateY(30px) scale(0.8)';
            progressBar.style.width = '0%';
            icon.style.transform = 'scale(0) rotate(180deg)';
            valueElement.style.transform = 'scale(0)';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                item.style.transition = 'all 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1)';
                item.style.opacity = '1';
                item.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
                
                // å›¾æ ‡åŠ¨ç”»
                setTimeout(() => {
                    icon.style.transition = 'transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1)';
                    icon.style.transform = 'scale(1) rotate(0deg)';
                }, 100);
                
                // æ•°å€¼åŠ¨ç”»
                setTimeout(() => {
                    valueElement.style.transition = 'transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1)';
                    valueElement.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
                    
                    // æ•°å­—è®¡æ•°åŠ¨ç”»
                    this.animateCounter(valueElement, 0, parseInt(value), 800);
                }, 200);
                
                // è¿›åº¦æ¡åŠ¨ç”»
                setTimeout(() => {
                    progressBar.style.transition = 'width 1s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)';
                    progressBar.style.width = value + '%';
                }, 400);
                
            }, index * 200);
        });

        // è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾åŠ¨ç”»
        const trendItems = document.querySelectorAll('.trend-item');
        trendItems.forEach((item, index) => {
            const bar = item.querySelector('.trend-bar');
            
            // åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€
            item.style.opacity = '0';
            item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
            bar.style.width = '0';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                item.style.transition = 'all 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)';
                item.style.opacity = '1';
                item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                
                // å»¶è¿Ÿå¯åŠ¨è¿›åº¦æ¡åŠ¨ç”»
                setTimeout(() => {
                    bar.style.transition = 'width 1s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)';
                    if (bar.classList.contains('high')) {
                        bar.style.width = '85%';
                    } else if (bar.classList.contains('medium')) {
                        bar.style.width = '60%';
                    }
                }, 200);
            }, index * 200 + 1000); // åœ¨å¡ç‰‡åŠ¨ç”»å®Œæˆåå¼€å§‹
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ•°å­—è®¡æ•°åŠ¨ç”»
     * @param {HTMLElement} element - ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ 
     * @param {number} start - èµ·å§‹å€¼
     * @param {number} end - ç»“æŸå€¼
     * @param {number} duration - åŠ¨ç”»æ—¶é•¿
     */
    animateCounter(element, start, end, duration) {
        const range = end - start;
        const increment = range / (duration / 16);
        let current = start;
        
        const timer = setInterval(() => {
            current += increment;
            if (current >= end) {
                current = end;
                clearInterval(timer);
            }
            element.textContent = Math.round(current) + '%';
        }, 16);
    }

    /**
     * åˆå§‹åŒ–é«˜å¾·åœ°å›¾
     */
    initMap() {
        if (this.map) {
            return; // åœ°å›¾å·²åˆå§‹åŒ–
        }

        const mapContainer = document.getElementById('cityMap');
        if (!mapContainer) {
            console.error('åœ°å›¾å®¹å™¨æœªæ‰¾åˆ°');
            return;
        }

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
        mapContainer.innerHTML = '<div style="display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; height: 100%; color: #667eea; font-size: 14px;"><div class="spinner" style="width: 20px; height: 20px; margin-right: 10px;"></div>æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½åœ°å›¾...</div>';

        // ç¡®ä¿å®¹å™¨æœ‰æ­£ç¡®çš„å°ºå¯¸
        setTimeout(() => {
            // åˆ›å»ºåœ°å›¾å®ä¾‹
            this.map = new AMap.Map('cityMap', {
                zoom: 12,
                center: [116.397428, 39.90923], // åŒ—äº¬å¸‚ä¸­å¿ƒ
                mapStyle: 'amap://styles/light',
                resizeEnable: true,
                rotateEnable: false,
                pitchEnable: false,
                zoomEnable: true,
                dragEnable: true
            });

            // åœ°å›¾åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåçš„å›è°ƒ
            this.map.on('complete', () => {
                console.log('é«˜å¾·åœ°å›¾åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ');
                // åœ°å›¾åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåé‡æ–°è°ƒæ•´å¤§å°
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.map.getSize();
                    this.map.setFitView();
                }, 100);
            });

            // åœ°å›¾é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
            this.map.on('hotspotclick', (e) => {
                console.log('åœ°å›¾çƒ­ç‚¹ç‚¹å‡»:', e);
            });

            // ç›‘å¬åœ°å›¾ç§»åŠ¨å®Œæˆ
            this.map.on('moveend', () => {
                console.log('åœ°å›¾ç§»åŠ¨å®Œæˆ');
            });

            // ç›‘å¬åœ°å›¾ç¼©æ”¾å®Œæˆ
            this.map.on('zoomend', () => {
                console.log('åœ°å›¾ç¼©æ”¾å®Œæˆï¼Œå½“å‰çº§åˆ«:', this.map.getZoom());
            });

            // æŠ•è¯‰çƒ­åŠ›æ•°æ®ç‚¹
            const heatmapData = [
                // Aè¡—é“åŒºåŸŸ (é«˜å¯†åº¦)
                { lng: 116.38, lat: 39.92, count: 85 },
                { lng: 116.381, lat: 39.921, count: 78 },
                { lng: 116.382, lat: 39.919, count: 92 },
                { lng: 116.379, lat: 39.918, count: 88 },
                { lng: 116.383, lat: 39.922, count: 95 },

                // Bå¹¿åœºåŒºåŸŸ (é«˜å¯†åº¦)
                { lng: 116.42, lat: 39.89, count: 89 },
                { lng: 116.421, lat: 39.891, count: 83 },
                { lng: 116.419, lat: 39.888, count: 91 },
                { lng: 116.422, lat: 39.892, count: 87 },

                // å…¶ä»–ä¸­ç­‰å¯†åº¦åŒºåŸŸ
                { lng: 116.405, lat: 39.915, count: 45 },
                { lng: 116.395, lat: 39.905, count: 52 },
                { lng: 116.41, lat: 39.895, count: 48 },
                { lng: 116.385, lat: 39.885, count: 41 },

                // ä½å¯†åº¦åŒºåŸŸ
                { lng: 116.43, lat: 39.92, count: 25 },
                { lng: 116.37, lat: 39.88, count: 28 },
                { lng: 116.44, lat: 39.88, count: 22 },
                { lng: 116.36, lat: 39.93, count: 31 }
            ];

            // åˆ›å»ºçƒ­åŠ›å›¾
            this.heatmap = new AMap.HeatMap(this.map, {
                radius: 35,
                opacity: [0, 0.85],
                gradient: {
                    0.2: '#4CAF50',   // ç»¿è‰² - ä½å¯†åº¦
                    0.4: '#FFC107',   // é»„è‰² - ä¸­ä½å¯†åº¦
                    0.6: '#FF9800',   // æ©™è‰² - ä¸­ç­‰å¯†åº¦
                    0.8: '#F44336',   // çº¢è‰² - é«˜å¯†åº¦
                    1.0: '#9C27B0'    // ç´«è‰² - æé«˜å¯†åº¦
                },
                blur: 0.85,
                zooms: [3, 18]
            });

            // è®¾ç½®çƒ­åŠ›å›¾æ•°æ®
            this.heatmap.setDataSet({
                data: heatmapData.map(point => ({
                    lng: point.lng,
                    lat: point.lat,
                    count: point.count
                })),
                max: 100
            });

            // æ·»åŠ æ ‡è®°ç‚¹
            this.addMapMarkers();

            // æ·»åŠ åœ°å›¾æ§ä»¶
            this.map.addControl(new AMap.Scale());
            this.map.addControl(new AMap.ToolBar());

            // å¼ºåˆ¶é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“åœ°å›¾ï¼Œè§£å†³æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸å®Œæ•´é—®é¢˜
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.map.getSize();
                this.map.setFitView();
                window.dispatchEvent(new Event('resize'));
            }, 300);
        }, 100);
    }

    /**
     * æ·»åŠ åœ°å›¾æ ‡è®°ç‚¹
     */
    addMapMarkers() {
        // Aè¡—é“æ ‡è®°
        const markerA = new AMap.Marker({
            position: [116.38, 39.92],
            title: 'Aè¡—é“',
            icon: new AMap.Icon({
                size: new AMap.Size(30, 30),
                image: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,' + btoa(`
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="30" height="30" viewBox="0 0 30 30">
                        <circle cx="15" cy="15" r="12" fill="#ff4757" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2"/>
                        <text x="15" y="19" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="12" font-weight="bold">A</text>
                    </svg>
                `)
            })
        });

        // Bå¹¿åœºæ ‡è®°
        const markerB = new AMap.Marker({
            position: [116.42, 39.89],
            title: 'Bå¹¿åœº',
            icon: new AMap.Icon({
                size: new AMap.Size(30, 30),
                image: 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,' + btoa(`
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="30" height="30" viewBox="0 0 30 30">
                        <circle cx="15" cy="15" r="12" fill="#ff4757" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2"/>
                        <text x="15" y="19" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="12" font-weight="bold">B</text>
                    </svg>
                `)
            })
        });

        // æ·»åŠ æ ‡è®°åˆ°åœ°å›¾
        this.map.add([markerA, markerB]);

        // æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        markerA.on('click', () => this.showAreaAnalysis('Aè¡—é“'));
        markerB.on('click', () => this.showAreaAnalysis('Bå¹¿åœº'));

        // æ·»åŠ ä¿¡æ¯çª—ä½“
        const infoWindowA = new AMap.InfoWindow({
            content: '<div style="padding:10px;"><h4>Aè¡—é“</h4><p>åœè½¦æŠ•è¯‰çƒ­ç‚¹åŒºåŸŸ</p><p>ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹è¯¦ç»†åˆ†æ</p></div>',
            offset: new AMap.Pixel(0, -30)
        });

        const infoWindowB = new AMap.InfoWindow({
            content: '<div style="padding:10px;"><h4>Bå¹¿åœº</h4><p>åœè½¦æŠ•è¯‰çƒ­ç‚¹åŒºåŸŸ</p><p>ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹è¯¦ç»†åˆ†æ</p></div>',
            offset: new AMap.Pixel(0, -30)
        });

        markerA.on('mouseover', () => infoWindowA.open(this.map, markerA.getPosition()));
        markerA.on('mouseout', () => infoWindowA.close());
        markerB.on('mouseover', () => infoWindowB.open(this.map, markerB.getPosition()));
        markerB.on('mouseout', () => infoWindowB.close());
    }

    /**
     * æ‰‹åŠ¨åˆ·æ–°åœ°å›¾
     */
    refreshMap() {
        if (this.map) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.map.getSize();
                this.map.setFitView();
                console.log('åœ°å›¾å·²æ‰‹åŠ¨åˆ·æ–°');
            }, 100);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹å¼¹çª—
     */
    showPointsPopup() {
        const overlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        if (overlay) {
            overlay.classList.add('active');
        }
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹å¼¹çª—
     */
    hidePointsPopup() {
        const overlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        if (overlay) {
            overlay.classList.remove('active');
        }
    }
}

// é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    window.dashboard = new SmartCityDashboard();
});

/**
 * å…¨å±€å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
 */

/**
 * æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ•°å­—æ˜¾ç¤º
 * @param {number} num - æ•°å­—
 * @param {number} decimals - å°æ•°ä½æ•°
 * @returns {string} æ ¼å¼åŒ–åçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
 */
function formatNumber(num, decimals = 1) {
    return Number(num).toFixed(decimals);
}

/**
 * é˜²æŠ–å‡½æ•°
 * @param {Function} func - è¦é˜²æŠ–çš„å‡½æ•°
 * @param {number} wait - ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´
 * @returns {Function} é˜²æŠ–åçš„å‡½æ•°
 */
function debounce(func, wait) {
    let timeout;
    return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
            clearTimeout(timeout);
            func(...args);
        };
        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
    };
}

/**
 * èŠ‚æµå‡½æ•°
 * @param {Function} func - è¦èŠ‚æµçš„å‡½æ•°
 * @param {number} limit - é™åˆ¶æ—¶é—´
 * @returns {Function} èŠ‚æµåçš„å‡½æ•°
 */
function throttle(func, limit) {
    let inThrottle;
    return function() {
        const args = arguments;
        const context = this;
        if (!inThrottle) {
            func.apply(context, args);
            inThrottle = true;
            setTimeout(() => inThrottle = false, limit);
        }
    };
}

// æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›å®ç”¨çš„CSSåŠ¨ç”»ç±»
const style = document.createElement('style');
style.textContent = `
    .chart-item::before {

    }
    
    .message-toast {
        font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei', 'PingFang SC', sans-serif;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 14px;
    }
    
    /* å›¾è¡¨æ‚¬åœæ•ˆæœå¢å¼º */
    .chart-item:hover .chart-value {

        animation-duration: 1s;

---

### **æ¼”ç¤ºåœºæ™¯æ•…äº‹çº¿ï¼šè§£å†³â€œå°åŒºæµæµªçŠ¬æ‰°æ°‘â€å·¥å•çš„å…¨æµç¨‹æ™ºèƒ½åŒ–å¤„ç†**

#### **ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µæ¼”ç¤ºåœºæ™¯ï¼šå·¥å•çš„æ™ºèƒ½ç”Ÿæˆä¸æ´¾å‘**

**åœºæ™¯ç›®æ ‡ï¼š** å±•ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªå…³äºâ€œæµæµªçŠ¬æ‰°æ°‘â€çš„å¸‚æ°‘æ¥ç”µï¼Œå¦‚ä½•åœ¨é€šè¯ç»“æŸåè¢«AIç§’çº§å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¹¶ç²¾å‡†æ´¾å‘ç»™å¤šä¸ªååŒéƒ¨é—¨ã€‚

**ã€åœºæ™¯å¼€å§‹ã€‘**

                    <div class="point-card">
                        <div class="point-icon">ğŸš€</div>
                        <div class="point-content">
                            <h4>ä¸€çº¿æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ™ºèƒ½èµ‹èƒ½</h4>
                            <p>æ‰¿åŠäººæ¥å•æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šåŒæ—¶æ”¶åˆ°AIé™„ä¸Šçš„â€œåŠç†é”¦å›Šâ€ï¼šåŒ…å«æ ‡å‡†æµç¨‹ã€æ³•è§„ä¾æ®å’Œå†å²æˆåŠŸæ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼Œè®©ä¸€çº¿æ‰§è¡Œæœ‰ç« å¯å¾ªã€‚</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="point-card">
                        <div class="point-icon">ğŸ‘ï¸</div>
                        <div class="point-content">
                            <h4>å…¨æµç¨‹ä¸»åŠ¨ç›‘æ§é¢„è­¦</h4>
                            <p>AIåƒä¸€ä¸ªä¸çŸ¥ç–²å€¦çš„â€œé¡¹ç›®ç»ç†â€ï¼Œå®æ—¶è¿½è¸ªæ‰€æœ‰åœ¨é€”å·¥å•ï¼Œå¯¹å³å°†è¶…æ—¶çš„ä»»åŠ¡è‡ªåŠ¨å‚¬åŠï¼Œå¯¹æµè½¬ç“¶é¢ˆä¸»åŠ¨å‘Šè­¦ã€‚</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="point-card">
                        <div class="point-icon">ğŸ›¡ï¸</div>
                        <div class="point-content">
                            <h4>è´¨é‡å®ˆé—¨äººçš„æ™ºèƒ½å®¡æ ¸</h4>
                            <p>å¯¹äºâ€œé—®é¢˜å·²è§£å†³â€è¿™ç±»å«ç³Šçš„åŠç»“æŠ¥å‘Šï¼ŒAIä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨é©³å›å¹¶ç»™å‡ºä¿®æ”¹å»ºè®®ï¼Œç¡®ä¿æ¯ä¸ªå·¥å•çš„å…³é—­éƒ½æœ‰æ®å¯æŸ¥ã€è´¨é‡è¿‡ç¡¬ã€‚</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="point-card">
                        <div class="point-icon">ğŸ’</div>
                        <div class="point-content">
                            <h4>ç»éªŒå³çŸ¥è¯†çš„æ™ºèƒ½æ²‰æ·€</h4>
                            <p>æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæˆåŠŸè§£å†³çš„å·¥å•ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šè¢«AIè‡ªåŠ¨è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦æ ‡ç­¾ã€æœ‰æ‘˜è¦çš„æ ‡å‡†åŒ–æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼Œå­˜å…¥çŸ¥è¯†åº“ï¼Œè®©æˆåŠŸç»éªŒå¾—ä»¥ä¼ æ‰¿ã€‚</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>



================================================
FILE: CJ_7/script.js

/**
 * 12345çƒ­çº¿ - æ™ºèƒ½å·¥å•ååŒå¤„ç†äº¤äº’è„šæœ¬
 * å®ç°ä¸‰é˜¶æ®µæ¼”ç¤ºçš„å®Œæ•´äº¤äº’é€»è¾‘
 */

class WorkOrderDemo {
    constructor() {
        this.currentStage = 1;
        this.currentStep = 1;
        this.taskProgressStep = 1;
        this.initializeEventListeners();
        this.showStage(1);
    }

    /**
     * åˆå§‹åŒ–äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
     */
    initializeEventListeners() {
        // é˜¶æ®µåˆ‡æ¢æŒ‰é’®
        document.getElementById('stage1Btn').addEventListener('click', () => this.showStage(1));
        document.getElementById('stage2Btn').addEventListener('click', () => this.showStage(2));
        document.getElementById('stage3Btn').addEventListener('click', () => this.showStage(3));
        document.getElementById('resetBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());

        // æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹å¼¹çª—
        document.getElementById('pointsBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.showPointsPopup());
        document.getElementById('pointsCloseBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.hidePointsPopup());
        document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay').addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target === e.currentTarget) this.hidePointsPopup();
        });

        // é˜¶æ®µä¸€äº¤äº’
        document.getElementById('generateOrderBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.generateWorkOrder());
        document.getElementById('assignOrderBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.assignWorkOrder());

        // é˜¶æ®µäºŒäº¤äº’
        document.getElementById('showWarningBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showWarning());
        document.getElementById('step1Btn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showStep(1));
        document.getElementById('step2Btn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showStep(2));
        document.getElementById('step3Btn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showStep(3));
        document.getElementById('acceptTaskBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.acceptTask());
        document.getElementById('nextStepBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.nextStep());

        // é˜¶æ®µä¸‰äº¤äº’
        document.querySelectorAll('.review-detail-btn').forEach(btn => {
            btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => this.showReviewDetail(e.target.dataset.type));
        });
        document.getElementById('startCallbackBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startCallback());
        document.getElementById('startAuditBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startAuditProcess());
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæŒ‡å®šé˜¶æ®µ
     * @param {number} stageNumber - é˜¶æ®µç¼–å· (1-3)
     */
    showStage(stageNumber) {
        this.currentStage = stageNumber;
        
        // éšè—æ‰€æœ‰é˜¶æ®µé¢æ¿
        document.querySelectorAll('.stage-panel').forEach(panel => {
            panel.style.display = 'none';
        });

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæŒ‡å®šé˜¶æ®µ
        const targetPanel = document.getElementById(`stage${stageNumber}Panel`);
        if (targetPanel) {
            targetPanel.style.display = 'block';
        }

        // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
        this.updateStageButtons(stageNumber);

        // é‡ç½®é˜¶æ®µçŠ¶æ€
        this.resetStageState(stageNumber);
        
        // è°ƒè¯•æ—¥å¿—
        console.log(`åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°é˜¶æ®µ ${stageNumber}`);
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°é˜¶æ®µæŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
     * @param {number} activeStage - å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»çš„é˜¶æ®µ
     */
    updateStageButtons(activeStage) {
        const buttons = ['stage1Btn', 'stage2Btn', 'stage3Btn'];
        
        buttons.forEach((btnId, index) => {
            const btn = document.getElementById(btnId);
            if (btn) {
                if (index + 1 === activeStage) {
                    btn.className = 'btn-primary';
                } else {
                    btn.className = 'btn-secondary';
                }
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®é˜¶æ®µçŠ¶æ€
     * @param {number} stageNumber - é˜¶æ®µç¼–å·
     */
    resetStageState(stageNumber) {
        switch (stageNumber) {
            case 1:
                this.resetStage1();
                break;
            case 2:
                this.resetStage2();
                break;
            case 3:
                this.resetStage3();
                break;
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®é˜¶æ®µä¸€çŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetStage1() {
        const orderDraft = document.getElementById('orderDraft');
        const assignmentFlow = document.getElementById('assignmentFlow');
        
        if (orderDraft) orderDraft.style.display = 'none';
        if (assignmentFlow) assignmentFlow.style.display = 'none';
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®é˜¶æ®µäºŒçŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetStage2() {
        const aiWarning = document.getElementById('aiWarning');
        const timeFlow = document.getElementById('timeFlow');
        const taskDetails = document.getElementById('taskDetails');
        const taskNotification = document.getElementById('taskNotification');
        const monitoringCenter = document.getElementById('monitoringCenter');
        
        // éšè—æ‰€æœ‰å­ç»„ä»¶
        if (aiWarning) aiWarning.style.display = 'none';
        if (timeFlow) timeFlow.style.display = 'none';
        if (taskDetails) taskDetails.style.display = 'none';
        if (monitoringCenter) monitoringCenter.style.display = 'none';
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºä»»åŠ¡é€šçŸ¥
        if (taskNotification) taskNotification.style.display = 'block';
        
        // é‡ç½®çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡
        this.currentStep = 1;
        this.taskProgressStep = 1;
        
        // é‡ç½®æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
        this.resetTimeDisplays();
        
        // è°ƒç”¨showStepç¡®ä¿æ­£ç¡®æ˜¾ç¤ºæ­¥éª¤ä¸€
        this.showStep(1);
        
        // é‡ç½®è¿›åº¦çŠ¶æ€
        this.resetTaskProgress();
        
        // é‡ç½®ä»»åŠ¡æ¥å—æŒ‰é’®
        const acceptBtn = document.getElementById('acceptTaskBtn');
        if (acceptBtn) {
            acceptBtn.innerHTML = 'âœ… æ¥å—ä»»åŠ¡';
            acceptBtn.disabled = false;
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
     */
    resetTimeDisplays() {
        // é‡ç½®æ‰‹æœºçŠ¶æ€æ æ—¶é—´
        const currentTimeDisplay = document.getElementById('currentTime');
        if (currentTimeDisplay) {
            currentTimeDisplay.textContent = '14:32';
        }
        
        // é‡ç½®æ—¶é—´æµè½¬æ˜¾ç¤º
        const timeFlowDisplay = document.querySelector('.time-flow .time-display');
        if (timeFlowDisplay) {
            timeFlowDisplay.textContent = 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 15:30';
        }
        
        // é‡ç½®ç›‘æ§ä¸­å¿ƒæ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
        const monitoringTimeDisplay = document.querySelector('.monitoring-center .time-display');
        if (monitoringTimeDisplay) {
            monitoringTimeDisplay.textContent = 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 15:30';
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®é˜¶æ®µä¸‰çŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetStage3() {
        const reviewOpinion = document.getElementById('reviewOpinion');
        const callbackResult = document.getElementById('callbackResult');
        const knowledgeDeposit = document.getElementById('knowledgeDeposit');
        const smartCallback = document.getElementById('smartCallback');
        const reportsContainer = document.getElementById('reportsContainer');
        const aiAuditProgress = document.getElementById('aiAuditProgress');
        const startAuditBtn = document.getElementById('startAuditBtn');
        const auditStatus = document.getElementById('auditStatus');
        const reviewStatus = document.getElementById('reviewStatus');
        
        // éšè—æ‰€æœ‰å­ç»„ä»¶
        if (reviewOpinion) reviewOpinion.style.display = 'none';
        if (callbackResult) callbackResult.style.display = 'none';
        if (knowledgeDeposit) knowledgeDeposit.style.display = 'none';
        if (smartCallback) smartCallback.style.display = 'none';
        if (aiAuditProgress) aiAuditProgress.style.display = 'none';
        
        // æ¸…ç©ºæŠ¥å‘Šå®¹å™¨
        if (reportsContainer) reportsContainer.innerHTML = '';
        
        // é‡ç½®å®¡æ ¸æ§åˆ¶çŠ¶æ€
        if (startAuditBtn) {
            startAuditBtn.disabled = false;
            startAuditBtn.innerHTML = 'ğŸš€ å¼€å§‹æ™ºèƒ½å®¡æ ¸æµç¨‹';
        }
        
        if (auditStatus) {
            auditStatus.textContent = 'ç­‰å¾…å¼€å§‹';
            auditStatus.className = 'audit-status';
        }
        
        if (reviewStatus) {
            reviewStatus.textContent = 'å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€ï¼šå‡†å¤‡å®¡æ ¸';
        }
    }

    /**
     * ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å• - é˜¶æ®µä¸€æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½
     */
    generateWorkOrder() {
        const generateBtn = document.getElementById('generateOrderBtn');
        const orderDraft = document.getElementById('orderDraft');

        if (!generateBtn || !orderDraft) return;

        // æŒ‰é’®åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
        generateBtn.innerHTML = 'âš¡ ç”Ÿæˆä¸­...';
        generateBtn.disabled = true;

        // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAIç”Ÿæˆå»¶è¿Ÿ
        setTimeout(() => {
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºå·¥å•è‰ç¨¿
            orderDraft.style.display = 'block';
            orderDraft.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';

            // æ¢å¤æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
            generateBtn.innerHTML = 'âš¡ å·²ç”Ÿæˆ';
            generateBtn.disabled = false;

            // é«˜äº®æ˜¾ç¤ºç”Ÿæˆæ—¶é—´
            const generationTime = document.querySelector('.generation-time');
            if (generationTime) {
                generationTime.style.animation = 'pulse 1s ease-in-out 3';
            }

        }, 800);
    }

    /**
     * æ´¾å‘å·¥å• - é˜¶æ®µä¸€æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½
     */
    assignWorkOrder() {
        const assignBtn = document.getElementById('assignOrderBtn');
        const assignmentFlow = document.getElementById('assignmentFlow');

        if (!assignBtn || !assignmentFlow) return;

        // æŒ‰é’®åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
        assignBtn.innerHTML = 'ğŸš€ æ´¾å‘ä¸­...';
        assignBtn.disabled = true;

        setTimeout(() => {
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ´¾å•æµç¨‹å›¾
            assignmentFlow.style.display = 'block';
            assignmentFlow.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';

            // é€ä¸ªæ˜¾ç¤ºå­ä»»åŠ¡çŠ¶æ€
            this.animateSubTasks();

            // æ¢å¤æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
            assignBtn.innerHTML = 'ğŸš€ å·²æ´¾å•';
            assignBtn.disabled = false;

        }, 1500);
    }

    /**
     * åŠ¨ç”»æ˜¾ç¤ºå­ä»»åŠ¡æ´¾å‘çŠ¶æ€
     */
    animateSubTasks() {
        const subTasks = document.querySelectorAll('.sub-task');
        
        subTasks.forEach((task, index) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                task.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.3s ease-out';
                task.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)';
                
                // æ·»åŠ å‘é€åŠ¨ç”»
                setTimeout(() => {
                    task.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
                    const status = task.querySelector('.task-status');
                    if (status) {
                        status.style.animation = 'pulse 0.5s ease-in-out';
                    }
                }, 200);
            }, index * 300);
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºé˜¶æ®µäºŒæ­¥éª¤
     * @param {number} stepNumber - æ­¥éª¤ç¼–å· (1-3)
     */
    showStep(stepNumber) {
        this.currentStep = stepNumber;
        this.updateStepButtons(stepNumber);
        
        const mobileStep = document.getElementById('mobileStep');
        const timeFlow = document.getElementById('timeFlow');
        const monitoringCenter = document.getElementById('monitoringCenter');
        
        // éšè—æ‰€æœ‰æ­¥éª¤å†…å®¹
        if (mobileStep) mobileStep.style.display = stepNumber === 1 ? 'flex' : 'none';
        if (timeFlow) timeFlow.style.display = stepNumber === 2 ? 'block' : 'none';
        if (monitoringCenter) monitoringCenter.style.display = stepNumber === 3 ? 'block' : 'none';
        
        // è°ƒè¯•æ—¥å¿—
        console.log(`ç¬¬äºŒé˜¶æ®µæ­¥éª¤ ${stepNumber}:`, {
            mobileStep: mobileStep?.style.display,
            timeFlow: timeFlow?.style.display,
            monitoringCenter: monitoringCenter?.style.display
        });
        
        // æ‰§è¡Œç‰¹å®šæ­¥éª¤çš„åŠ¨ç”»
        switch (stepNumber) {
            case 1:
                this.animateStep1();
                break;
            case 2:
                this.animateStep2();
                break;
            case 3:
                this.animateStep3();
                break;
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°æ­¥éª¤æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
     * @param {number} activeStep - å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»çš„æ­¥éª¤
     */
    updateStepButtons(activeStep) {
        const buttons = ['step1Btn', 'step2Btn', 'step3Btn'];
        
        buttons.forEach((btnId, index) => {
            const btn = document.getElementById(btnId);
            if (btn) {
                if (index + 1 === activeStep) {
                    btn.className = 'step-btn btn-primary';
                } else {
                    btn.className = 'step-btn btn-secondary';
                }
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ­¥éª¤ä¸€åŠ¨ç”»ï¼šç§»åŠ¨ç«¯æ¥æ”¶ä»»åŠ¡
     */
    animateStep1() {
        const notification = document.querySelector('.notification-icon');
        if (notification) {
            notification.classList.add('pulse');
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ­¥éª¤äºŒåŠ¨ç”»ï¼šæ—¶é—´æµè½¬
     */
    animateStep2() {
        const timeFlow = document.getElementById('timeFlow');
        if (timeFlow) {
            timeFlow.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
        }
        
        // å¼€å§‹çœŸæ­£çš„æ—¶é—´æµè½¬åŠ¨ç”»
        this.startTimeFlowAnimation();
    }
    
    /**
     * å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´æµè½¬åŠ¨ç”»
     */
    startTimeFlowAnimation() {
        const timeDisplay = document.querySelector('.time-flow .time-display');
        const currentTimeDisplay = document.getElementById('currentTime');
        
        if (!timeDisplay) return;
        
        // åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´åºåˆ—ï¼šä»å½“å¤©14:32åˆ°ç¬¬äºŒå¤©15:30
        const timeSequence = this.generateTimeSequence();
        let currentIndex = 0;
        
        // æ·»åŠ æ›´æ–°æ ·å¼
        timeDisplay.classList.add('updating');
        
        // æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„å‡½æ•°
        const updateTime = () => {
            if (currentIndex < timeSequence.length) {
                const timeInfo = timeSequence[currentIndex];
                
                // æ·»åŠ è·³è·ƒåŠ¨ç”»
                timeDisplay.classList.add('jump');
                
                // æ›´æ–°æ˜¾ç¤ºå†…å®¹
                timeDisplay.textContent = timeInfo.display;
                
                // åŒæ—¶æ›´æ–°æ‰‹æœºçŠ¶æ€æ çš„æ—¶é—´
                if (currentTimeDisplay) {
                    currentTimeDisplay.textContent = timeInfo.time;
                }
                
                // ç§»é™¤è·³è·ƒåŠ¨ç”»ç±»
                setTimeout(() => {
                    timeDisplay.classList.remove('jump');
                }, 300);
                
                currentIndex++;
                
                // ç»§ç»­ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é—´ç‚¹ï¼Œå¢åŠ é—´éš”è®©åŠ¨ç”»æ›´æ¸…æ™°
                setTimeout(updateTime, 200);
            } else {
                // æ—¶é—´æµè½¬å®Œæˆï¼Œç§»é™¤æ›´æ–°æ ·å¼
                timeDisplay.classList.remove('updating');
                
                // æ˜¾ç¤ºå®Œæˆæç¤ºå¹¶è‡ªåŠ¨è·³è½¬åˆ°æ­¥éª¤ä¸‰ï¼ˆç›‘æ§é¢„è­¦ï¼‰
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.showToast('æ—¶é—´æµè½¬å®Œæˆï¼Œè¿›å…¥ç›‘æ§é¢„è­¦é˜¶æ®µ...', 'warning');
                    
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        this.showStep(3);
                        this.showToast('æ£€æµ‹åˆ°ååŒç“¶é¢ˆï¼ŒAIç³»ç»Ÿæ­£åœ¨åˆ†æ...', 'warning');
                        
                        // ç¨ç­‰ä¸€ä¸‹åè‡ªåŠ¨æ˜¾ç¤ºé¢„è­¦
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            this.showWarning();
                            
                            // é¢„è­¦æŸ¥çœ‹å®Œæˆåï¼Œè·³è½¬åˆ°é˜¶æ®µä¸‰
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                this.showToast('é¢„è­¦å¤„ç†å®Œæˆï¼Œè¿›å…¥æ™ºèƒ½å®¡æ ¸é˜¶æ®µ...', 'warning');
                                
                                setTimeout(() => {
                                    this.showStage(3);
                                    
                                    // ç¨ç­‰ä¸€ä¸‹åè‡ªåŠ¨å¼€å§‹å®¡æ ¸æµç¨‹
                                    setTimeout(() => {
                                        this.startAuditProcess();
                                    }, 2000);
                                }, 2000);
                            }, 3000);
                        }, 2000);
                    }, 1500);
                }, 1000);
            }
        };
        
        // å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´æ›´æ–°
        setTimeout(updateTime, 500);
    }
    
    /**
     * ç”Ÿæˆæ—¶é—´åºåˆ—
     */
    generateTimeSequence() {
        const sequence = [];
        
        // å½“å¤©æ—¶é—´ç‚¹
        const dayOneTime = [
            { time: '14:32', display: 'å½“å¤© 14:32' },
            { time: '15:30', display: 'å½“å¤© 15:30' },
            { time: '16:45', display: 'å½“å¤© 16:45' },
            { time: '18:20', display: 'å½“å¤© 18:20' },
            { time: '20:10', display: 'å½“å¤© 20:10' },
            { time: '22:30', display: 'å½“å¤© 22:30' }
        ];
        
        // ç¬¬äºŒå¤©æ—¶é—´ç‚¹
        const dayTwoTime = [
            { time: '08:00', display: 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 08:00' },
            { time: '09:30', display: 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 09:30' },
            { time: '11:15', display: 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 11:15' },
            { time: '13:20', display: 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 13:20' },
            { time: '14:45', display: 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 14:45' },
            { time: '15:30', display: 'ç¬¬äºŒå¤© 15:30' }
        ];
        
        return [...dayOneTime, ...dayTwoTime];
    }

    /**
     * æ­¥éª¤ä¸‰åŠ¨ç”»ï¼šç›‘æ§ä¸­å¿ƒ
     */
    animateStep3() {
        const monitoringCenter = document.getElementById('monitoringCenter');
        if (monitoringCenter) {
            monitoringCenter.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ¥å—ä»»åŠ¡
     */
    acceptTask() {
        const taskNotification = document.getElementById('taskNotification');
        const taskDetails = document.getElementById('taskDetails');
        const acceptBtn = document.getElementById('acceptTaskBtn');

        if (acceptBtn) {
            acceptBtn.innerHTML = 'âœ… å·²æ¥å—';
            acceptBtn.disabled = true;
        }

        setTimeout(() => {
            if (taskNotification) taskNotification.style.display = 'none';
            if (taskDetails) {
                taskDetails.style.display = 'block';
                taskDetails.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
            }
        }, 1000);
    }

    /**
     * æ‰§è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œ
     */
    nextStep() {
        const nextBtn = document.getElementById('nextStepBtn');
        const progressSteps = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-step');
        
        if (this.taskProgressStep <= 4) {
            // å®Œæˆå½“å‰æ­¥éª¤
            const currentStep = progressSteps[this.taskProgressStep - 1];
            if (currentStep) {
                currentStep.classList.add('completed');
                currentStep.style.animation = 'stepProgress 0.8s ease-out';
                
                // æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´
                const timeSpan = currentStep.querySelector('.step-time');
                if (timeSpan) {
                    const times = ['14:45', '15:10', '15:25', '15:50'];
                    timeSpan.textContent = times[this.taskProgressStep - 1];
                }
            }
            
            // å¢åŠ æ­¥éª¤è®¡æ•°
            this.taskProgressStep++;
            
            // æ¿€æ´»ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥æˆ–å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡
            if (this.taskProgressStep <= 4) {
                const nextStep = progressSteps[this.taskProgressStep - 1];
                if (nextStep) {
                    nextStep.classList.add('active');
                }
                
                // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®
                if (nextBtn) {
                    nextBtn.innerHTML = `â–¶ï¸ ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œ (${this.taskProgressStep}/4)`;
                }
            } else {
                // æ‰€æœ‰æ­¥éª¤å®Œæˆ
                if (nextBtn) {
                    nextBtn.innerHTML = 'âœ… ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ';
                    nextBtn.disabled = true;
                }
                
                // æ˜¾ç¤ºå®Œæˆæç¤ºå¹¶è‡ªåŠ¨è·³è½¬åˆ°æ­¥éª¤äºŒ
                this.showToast('ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆï¼Œå³å°†è¿›å…¥æ—¶é—´æµè½¬é˜¶æ®µ...', 'success');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.showStep(2);
                    this.showToast('æ—¶é—´å¿«è¿›ä¸­...', 'success');
                }, 2000);
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®ä»»åŠ¡è¿›åº¦
     */
    resetTaskProgress() {
        const progressSteps = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-step');
        progressSteps.forEach((step, index) => {
            step.classList.remove('active', 'completed');
            if (index === 0) {
                step.classList.add('active');
            }
            
            const timeSpan = step.querySelector('.step-time');
            if (timeSpan && index > 0) {
                timeSpan.textContent = '--:--';
            }
        });
        
        const nextBtn = document.getElementById('nextStepBtn');
        if (nextBtn) {
            nextBtn.innerHTML = 'â–¶ï¸ ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œ';
            nextBtn.disabled = false;
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºç›‘æ§é¢„è­¦ - é˜¶æ®µäºŒæ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½
     */
    showWarning() {
        const warningBtn = document.getElementById('showWarningBtn');
        const aiWarning = document.getElementById('aiWarning');
        const warningNode = document.getElementById('warningNode');

        if (!aiWarning) return;

        // é«˜äº®é¢„è­¦èŠ‚ç‚¹
        if (warningNode) {
            warningNode.style.animation = 'pulse 0.5s ease-in-out 3';
        }

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºAIé¢„è­¦è¯¦æƒ…
        setTimeout(() => {
            aiWarning.style.display = 'block';
            aiWarning.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';

            // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
            if (warningBtn) {
                warningBtn.innerHTML = 'âœ… é¢„è­¦å·²æŸ¥çœ‹';
                warningBtn.disabled = true;
            }
        }, 1000);
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹å®¡æ ¸æµç¨‹
     */
    startAuditProcess() {
        const startBtn = document.getElementById('startAuditBtn');
        const auditStatus = document.getElementById('auditStatus');
        const reviewStatus = document.getElementById('reviewStatus');
        
        if (!startBtn) return;
        
        // æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€
        startBtn.disabled = true;
        startBtn.innerHTML = 'ğŸ”„ å®¡æ ¸è¿›è¡Œä¸­...';
        auditStatus.textContent = 'å®¡æ ¸ä¸­';
        auditStatus.className = 'audit-status processing';
        reviewStatus.textContent = 'å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€ï¼šAIæ™ºèƒ½å®¡æ ¸ä¸­';
        
        this.showToast('å¼€å§‹æ™ºèƒ½å®¡æ ¸æµç¨‹...', 'success');
        
        // å¼€å§‹å®¡æ ¸æµç¨‹
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.processFirstReport();
        }, 1500);
    }

    /**
     * å¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ¥å‘Šï¼ˆå…¬å®‰å±€ï¼‰
     */
    processFirstReport() {
        const reportsContainer = document.getElementById('reportsContainer');
        
        // åˆ›å»ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ¥å‘Š
        const report1 = this.createReportElement({
            icon: 'ğŸš”',
            deptName: 'å…¬å®‰å±€æ²»å®‰æ”¯é˜Ÿ',
            submitTime: 'ä»Šæ—¥ 16:30',
            content: '"å·²æ´¾å‘˜å‰å¾€ç°åœºï¼Œå°†æµæµªçŠ¬æ•è·å¹¶é€èµ°ã€‚"',
            type: 'first'
        });
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæŠ¥å‘Šæäº¤
        reportsContainer.appendChild(report1);
        this.showToast('å…¬å®‰å±€æŠ¥å‘Šå·²æäº¤', 'success');
        
        // å¼€å§‹AIå®¡æ ¸
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.startAIReview(report1, 'passed', () => {
                // ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ¥å‘Šå®¡æ ¸å®Œæˆï¼Œå¤„ç†ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæŠ¥å‘Š
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.processSecondReport();
                }, 1000);
            });
        }, 1500);
    }

    /**
     * å¤„ç†ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæŠ¥å‘Šï¼ˆè¡—é“åŠï¼‰
     */
    processSecondReport() {
        const reportsContainer = document.getElementById('reportsContainer');
        
        // åˆ›å»ºç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæŠ¥å‘Š
        const report2 = this.createReportElement({
            icon: 'ğŸ˜ï¸',
            deptName: 'XXè¡—é“åŠäº‹å¤„',
            submitTime: 'ä»Šæ—¥ 17:15',
            content: '"é—®é¢˜å·²å¤„ç†å®Œæ¯•ã€‚"',
            type: 'second'
        });
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæŠ¥å‘Šæäº¤
        reportsContainer.appendChild(report2);
        this.showToast('è¡—é“åŠæŠ¥å‘Šå·²æäº¤', 'success');
        
        // å¼€å§‹AIå®¡æ ¸
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.startAIReview(report2, 'rejected', () => {
                // æ˜¾ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸æ„è§
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.showRejectionReason();
                    
                    // æ¨¡æ‹ŸæŠ¥å‘Šä¿®æ”¹å’Œé‡æ–°æäº¤
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        this.resubmitReport(report2);
                    }, 3000);
                }, 1000);
            });
        }, 1500);
    }

    /**
     * åˆ›å»ºæŠ¥å‘Šå…ƒç´ 
     */
    createReportElement({ icon, deptName, submitTime, content, type }) {
        const reportItem = document.createElement('div');
        reportItem.className = 'report-item submitting';
        reportItem.innerHTML = `
            <div class="report-header">
                <span class="dept-name">${icon} ${deptName}</span>
                <span class="submit-time">æäº¤æ—¶é—´ï¼š${submitTime}</span>
            </div>
            <div class="report-content">
                ${content}
            </div>
            <div class="ai-review-result" style="display: none;">
                <!-- å®¡æ ¸ç»“æœå°†åŠ¨æ€æ·»åŠ  -->
            </div>
        `;
        
        return reportItem;
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹AIå®¡æ ¸åŠ¨ç”»
     */
    startAIReview(reportElement, result, callback) {
        const progressContainer = document.getElementById('aiAuditProgress');
        const progressFill = document.getElementById('progressFill');
        const progressText = document.getElementById('progressText');
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸è¿›åº¦
        progressContainer.style.display = 'block';
        reportElement.className = 'report-item reviewing';
        
        // å®¡æ ¸è¿›åº¦æ–‡æœ¬åºåˆ—
        const progressTexts = [
            'æ­£åœ¨åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Šå†…å®¹...',
            'æ£€æŸ¥å…³é”®ä¿¡æ¯å®Œæ•´æ€§...',
            'éªŒè¯å¤„ç†æªæ–½åˆè§„æ€§...',
            'è¯„ä¼°é—®é¢˜è§£å†³æ•ˆæœ...',
            'ç”Ÿæˆå®¡æ ¸ç»“è®º...'
        ];
        
        let currentStep = 0;
        let progress = 0;
        
        const updateProgress = () => {
            if (currentStep < progressTexts.length) {
                progressText.textContent = progressTexts[currentStep];
                progress += 20;
                progressFill.style.width = progress + '%';
                currentStep++;
                
                setTimeout(updateProgress, 800);
            } else {
                // å®¡æ ¸å®Œæˆï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœ
                progressContainer.style.display = 'none';
                this.showReviewResult(reportElement, result);
                
                if (callback) callback();
            }
        };
        
        updateProgress();
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸ç»“æœ
     */
    showReviewResult(reportElement, result) {
        const reviewResultDiv = reportElement.querySelector('.ai-review-result');
        
        if (result === 'passed') {
            reportElement.className = 'report-item approved';
            reviewResultDiv.innerHTML = `
                <span class="result-icon">âœ…</span>
                <span class="result-text">AIå®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡</span>
                <button class="review-detail-btn" data-type="passed">æŸ¥çœ‹è¯¦æƒ…</button>
            `;
            this.showToast('AIå®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡', 'success');
        } else {
            reportElement.className = 'report-item rejected';
            reviewResultDiv.innerHTML = `
                <span class="result-icon">âŒ</span>
                <span class="result-text">AIå®¡æ ¸é©³å›</span>
                <button class="review-detail-btn" data-type="rejected" onclick="workOrderDemo.showReviewDetail('rejected')">æŸ¥çœ‹è¯¦æƒ…</button>
            `;
            this.showToast('AIå®¡æ ¸é©³å›', 'warning');
        }
        
        reviewResultDiv.style.display = 'flex';
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºé©³å›åŸå› 
     */
    showRejectionReason() {
        const reviewOpinion = document.getElementById('reviewOpinion');
        if (reviewOpinion) {
            reviewOpinion.style.display = 'block';
            reviewOpinion.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡æ–°æäº¤æŠ¥å‘Š
     */
    resubmitReport(reportElement) {
        this.showToast('è¡—é“åŠæ­£åœ¨ä¿®æ”¹æŠ¥å‘Š...', 'success');
        
        // æ·»åŠ é‡æ–°æäº¤åŠ¨ç”»
        reportElement.classList.add('resubmitting');
        
        setTimeout(() => {
            // æ›´æ–°æŠ¥å‘Šå†…å®¹
            const reportContent = reportElement.querySelector('.report-content');
            reportContent.classList.add('updating');
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                reportContent.innerHTML = `
                    "å·²ç»„ç»‡ç½‘æ ¼å‘˜å¯¹XXèŠ±å›­å°åŒºè¿›è¡Œå…¨é¢å·¡æŸ¥ï¼Œå‘å±…æ°‘è§£é‡Šäº†æµæµªçŠ¬å¤„ç†æƒ…å†µï¼Œæ¶ˆé™¤äº†å±…æ°‘çš„å®‰å…¨æ‹…å¿§ã€‚åŒæ—¶å»ºç«‹äº†å®šæœŸå·¡æŸ¥æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæ¯å‘¨è¿›è¡Œ2æ¬¡ç¤¾åŒºå®‰å…¨æ£€æŸ¥ï¼Œå¹¶è®¾ç½®äº†å±…æ°‘åé¦ˆæ¸ é“ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ç±»ä¼¼é—®é¢˜èƒ½å¤ŸåŠæ—¶å‘ç°å’Œå¤„ç†ã€‚"
                `;
                reportContent.classList.remove('updating');
                
                // é‡æ–°å®¡æ ¸
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.startAIReview(reportElement, 'passed', () => {
                        // æ‰€æœ‰å®¡æ ¸å®Œæˆ
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            this.completeAuditProcess();
                        }, 1000);
                    });
                }, 1000);
                
            }, 1000);
            
        }, 1000);
    }

    /**
     * å®Œæˆå®¡æ ¸æµç¨‹
     */
    completeAuditProcess() {
        const auditStatus = document.getElementById('auditStatus');
        const reviewStatus = document.getElementById('reviewStatus');
        const reviewOpinion = document.getElementById('reviewOpinion');
        const smartCallback = document.getElementById('smartCallback');
        
        // æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€
        auditStatus.textContent = 'å®¡æ ¸å®Œæˆ';
        auditStatus.className = 'audit-status completed';
        reviewStatus.textContent = 'å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€ï¼šå®¡æ ¸é€šè¿‡ï¼Œå‡†å¤‡å›è®¿';
        
        // éšè—å®¡æ ¸æ„è§
        if (reviewOpinion) {
            reviewOpinion.style.display = 'none';
        }
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºå›è®¿ç•Œé¢
        if (smartCallback) {
            smartCallback.style.display = 'block';
            smartCallback.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
        }
        
        this.showToast('æ‰€æœ‰æŠ¥å‘Šå®¡æ ¸å®Œæˆï¼Œè¿›å…¥å›è®¿é˜¶æ®µ', 'success');
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºå®¡æ ¸è¯¦æƒ… - é˜¶æ®µä¸‰åŠŸèƒ½
     * @param {string} type - å®¡æ ¸ç±»å‹ (passed/rejected)
     */
    showReviewDetail(type) {
        const reviewOpinion = document.getElementById('reviewOpinion');
        
        if (type === 'rejected' && reviewOpinion) {
            reviewOpinion.style.display = 'block';
            reviewOpinion.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
        }
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹å›è®¿ - é˜¶æ®µä¸‰æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½
     */
    startCallback() {
        const callbackBtn = document.getElementById('startCallbackBtn');
        const callbackResult = document.getElementById('callbackResult');
        const knowledgeDeposit = document.getElementById('knowledgeDeposit');

        if (!callbackBtn) return;

        // æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€æ›´æ–°
        callbackBtn.innerHTML = 'ğŸ“ å›è®¿ä¸­...';
        callbackBtn.disabled = true;

        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå›è®¿è¿‡ç¨‹
        setTimeout(() => {
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºå›è®¿ç»“æœ
            if (callbackResult) {
                callbackResult.style.display = 'block';
                callbackResult.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
            }

            // ç»§ç»­æ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ¥è¯†æ²‰æ·€
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (knowledgeDeposit) {
                    knowledgeDeposit.style.display = 'block';
                    knowledgeDeposit.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.5s ease-out';
                    
                    // è§¦å‘é£è¡ŒåŠ¨ç”»
                    const knowledgeCard = document.querySelector('.knowledge-card');
                    if (knowledgeCard) {
                        knowledgeCard.classList.add('flying');
                    }
                }

                // æ¢å¤æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
                callbackBtn.innerHTML = 'âœ… å›è®¿å®Œæˆ';
                
            }, 1500);

        }, 2000);
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹å¼¹çª—
     */
    showPointsPopup() {
        const overlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        if (overlay) {
            overlay.style.display = 'flex';
            // æ·»åŠ activeç±»æ¥è§¦å‘åŠ¨ç”»
            setTimeout(() => {
                overlay.classList.add('active');
            }, 10);
            // é˜²æ­¢bodyæ»šåŠ¨
            document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
        }
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹å¼¹çª—
     */
    hidePointsPopup() {
        const overlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        if (overlay) {
            overlay.classList.remove('active');
            // ç­‰å¾…åŠ¨ç”»å®Œæˆåéšè—
            setTimeout(() => {
                overlay.style.display = 'none';
            }, 500);
            // æ¢å¤bodyæ»šåŠ¨
            document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ•´ä¸ªæ¼”ç¤º
     */
    resetDemo() {
        // é‡ç½®åˆ°é˜¶æ®µä¸€
        this.showStage(1);
        
        // é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰åŠ¨ç”»çŠ¶æ€
        document.querySelectorAll('[style*="animation"]').forEach(element => {
            element.style.animation = '';
        });

        // é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
        this.resetAllButtons();

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºé‡ç½®å®Œæˆæç¤º
        this.showToast('æ¼”ç¤ºå·²é‡ç½®', 'success');
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetAllButtons() {
        const buttons = [
            { id: 'generateOrderBtn', text: 'âš¡ AIç§’çº§ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å•' },
            { id: 'assignOrderBtn', text: 'ğŸš€ ä¸€é”®æ´¾å•' },
            { id: 'showWarningBtn', text: 'âš ï¸ æŸ¥çœ‹é¢„è­¦è¯¦æƒ…' },
            { id: 'startCallbackBtn', text: 'ğŸ“ å¼€å§‹å›è®¿' },
            { id: 'acceptTaskBtn', text: 'âœ… æ¥å—ä»»åŠ¡' },
            { id: 'nextStepBtn', text: 'â–¶ï¸ ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œ' }
        ];

        buttons.forEach(({ id, text }) => {
            const btn = document.getElementById(id);
            if (btn) {
                btn.innerHTML = text;
                btn.disabled = false;
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
     * @param {string} message - æç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
     * @param {string} type - æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ (success/warning/error)
     */
    showToast(message, type = 'success') {
        // åˆ›å»ºæç¤ºå…ƒç´ 
        const toast = document.createElement('div');
        toast.className = `toast toast-${type}`;
        toast.innerHTML = `
            <span class="toast-icon">${this.getToastIcon(type)}</span>
            <span class="toast-message">${message}</span>
        `;

        // æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
        Object.assign(toast.style, {
            position: 'fixed',
            top: '20px',
            right: '20px',
            background: type === 'success' ? '#4CAF50' : type === 'warning' ? '#FF9800' : '#f44336',
            color: 'white',
            padding: '12px 20px',
            borderRadius: '25px',
            zIndex: '3000',
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            gap: '8px',
            boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
            animation: 'slideIn 0.3s ease-out'
        });

        // æ·»åŠ åˆ°é¡µé¢
        document.body.appendChild(toast);

        // 3ç§’åè‡ªåŠ¨ç§»é™¤
        setTimeout(() => {
            toast.style.animation = 'slideOut 0.3s ease-in';
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.body.removeChild(toast);
            }, 300);
        }, 3000);
    }

    /**
     * è·å–æç¤ºå›¾æ ‡
     * @param {string} type - æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹
     * @returns {string} å›¾æ ‡å­—ç¬¦
     */
    getToastIcon(type) {
        const icons = {
            success: 'âœ…',
            warning: 'âš ï¸',
            error: 'âŒ'
        };
        return icons[type] || 'ğŸ’¡';
    }

    /**
     * é”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®æ”¯æŒ
     */
    initializeKeyboardShortcuts() {
        document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
            // ESC å…³é—­å¼¹çª—
            if (e.key === 'Escape') {
                this.hidePointsPopup();
            }
            
            // æ•°å­—é”®åˆ‡æ¢é˜¶æ®µ
            const stageNumber = parseInt(e.key);
            if (stageNumber >= 1 && stageNumber <= 3) {
                this.showStage(stageNumber);
            }
            
            // Ré”®é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
            if (e.key.toLowerCase() === 'r' && e.ctrlKey) {
                e.preventDefault();
                this.resetDemo();
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * å“åº”å¼é€‚é…
     */
    handleResponsive() {
        const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)');
        
        const handleTabletChange = (e) => {
            if (e.matches) {
                // å¹³æ¿é€‚é…
                document.body.classList.add('tablet-mode');
            } else {
                document.body.classList.remove('tablet-mode');
            }
        };

        mediaQuery.addListener(handleTabletChange);
        handleTabletChange(mediaQuery);
    }

    /**
     * æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼šé˜²æŠ–å‡½æ•°
     * @param {Function} func - éœ€è¦é˜²æŠ–çš„å‡½æ•°
     * @param {number} delay - å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´
     * @returns {Function} é˜²æŠ–åçš„å‡½æ•°
     */
    debounce(func, delay) {
        let timeoutId;
        return function (...args) {
            clearTimeout(timeoutId);
            timeoutId = setTimeout(() => func.apply(this, args), delay);
        };
    }

    /**
     * åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºæ•°æ®
     */
    initializeDemoData() {
        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå®æ—¶æ•°æ®æ›´æ–°
        this.updateMonitoringData();
        
        // æ¯30ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®
        setInterval(() => {
            this.updateMonitoringData();
        }, 30000);
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®
     */
    updateMonitoringData() {
        const boardItems = document.querySelectorAll('.board-item .item-value');
        boardItems.forEach((item, index) => {
            if (!item.classList.contains('warning')) {
                const currentValue = parseInt(item.textContent);
                const newValue = currentValue + Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) - 2;
                if (newValue > 0) {
                    item.textContent = newValue;
                }
            }
        });
    }
}

// æ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰CSSåŠ¨ç”»
const additionalStyles = `
    .toast-slideOut {
        animation: slideOut 0.3s ease-in !important;
    }
    
    @keyframes slideOut {
        from {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(0);
        }
        to {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(100%);
        }
    }
    
    .tablet-mode .control-buttons {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 10px;
    }
    
    .tablet-mode .phone-mockup {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 400px;
    }
`;

const styleSheet = document.createElement('style');
styleSheet.textContent = additionalStyles;
document.head.appendChild(styleSheet);

@keyframes slideIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

@keyframes pulse {
    0%, 100% {
        transform: scale(1);
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }
}

@keyframes flyToTarget {
    0% {
        transform: translateX(0) scale(1);
    }
    50% {
        transform: translateX(100px) scale(0.8);
    }
    100% {
        transform: translateX(200px) scale(0.6);
        opacity: 0.3;
    }
}

@keyframes spin {
    from {
        transform: rotate(0deg);
    }
    to {
        transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
}

@keyframes flowMove {
    0% {
        left: 0%;
        opacity: 1;
    }
    50% {
        opacity: 0.7;
    }
    100% {
        left: calc(100% - 8px);
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

@keyframes stepProgress {
    0% {
        transform: scale(1);
        background: var(--bg-white);
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1.02);
        background: linear-gradient(145deg, #e3f2fd, #bbdefb);
    }
    100% {
        transform: scale(1);
        background: linear-gradient(145deg, #d4edda, #c3e6cb);
    }
}

.report-item.reviewing {
    background: linear-gradient(145deg, #fff3e0, #ffe0b2);
    border-left: 4px solid #ff9800;
    position: relative;
}

.report-item.reviewing::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.1), transparent);
    animation: reviewScan 1.5s linear infinite;
}

.report-item.approved {
    background: linear-gradient(145deg, #e8f5e8, #c8e6c8);
    border-left: 4px solid #4caf50;
}

.report-item.rejected {
    background: linear-gradient(145deg, #ffebee, #ffcdd2);
    border-left: 4px solid #f44336;
}

/* ===== å®¡æ ¸ç»“æœåŠ¨ç”» ===== */
.ai-review-result {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.8);
    animation: resultAppear 0.5s ease-out 0.5s forwards;
}

.review-detail-btn {
    opacity: 0;
    animation: buttonFadeIn 0.3s ease-out 1s forwards;
}

/* ===== é‡æ–°æäº¤åŠ¨ç”» ===== */
.report-item.resubmitting {
    animation: resubmitPulse 0.8s ease-in-out;
}

.report-content.updating {
    background: linear-gradient(145deg, #fff9c4, #f4f4a5);
    animation: contentUpdate 1s ease-in-out;
}

/* ===== åŠ¨ç”»å…³é”®å¸§ ===== */
@keyframes shimmer {
    0% {
        transform: translateX(-100%);
    }
    100% {
        transform: translateX(100%);
    }
}

@keyframes scan {
    0% {
        left: -100%;
    }
    100% {
        left: 100%;
    }
}

@keyframes reportSlideIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(-50px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateX(0);
    }
}

@keyframes reviewScan {
    0% {
        transform: translateX(-100%);
    }
    100% {
        transform: translateX(100%);
    }
}

@keyframes resultAppear {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: scale(0.8);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: scale(1);
    }
}

@keyframes buttonFadeIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

@keyframes resubmitPulse {
    0%, 100% {
        transform: scale(1);
        box-shadow: 0 5px 15px var(--shadow-light);
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1.02);
        box-shadow: 0 8px 25px var(--shadow-medium);
    }
}

@keyframes contentUpdate {
    0%, 100% {
        background: var(--bg-white);
    }
    50% {
        background: linear-gradient(145deg, #fff9c4, #f4f4a5);
    }
}
