                        <div class="point-content">
                            <h4>ä¼—åŒ…ä¸è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–ç»“åˆ</h4>
                            <p>å¯¹äºå‘ç°çš„çŸ¥è¯†â€œç›²åŒºâ€ï¼ŒAIèƒ½åˆ©ç”¨å†å²é€šè¯æ•°æ®è‡ªåŠ¨ç”ŸæˆçŸ¥è¯†è‰ç¨¿ï¼Œå†æ¨é€ç»™ç›¸å…³ä¸šåŠ¡éƒ¨é—¨çš„ä¸“å®¶è¿›è¡Œå®¡æ ¸ç¡®è®¤ï¼Œå®ç°äººæœºååŒé«˜æ•ˆç”Ÿäº§çŸ¥è¯†ã€‚</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>



================================================
FILE: CJ_8/script.js
================================================
/**
 * CJ_8 çŸ¥è¯†åº“ç®¡ç†å¹³å°æ¼”ç¤ºè„šæœ¬
 * å®ç°ä¸‰ä¸ªåœºæ™¯çš„äº¤äº’æ¼”ç¤ºï¼šæ–°çŸ¥è¯†æ³¨å…¥ã€çŸ¥è¯†æ›´æ–°ã€çŸ¥è¯†ç©ºç™½æ¢æµ‹
 */

class KnowledgeBaseDemo {
    constructor() {
        this.currentDemo = null;
        this.animationTimeouts = [];
        this.init();
    }

    /**
     * åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ
     */
    init() {
        this.bindEvents();
        this.showPlatformOverview();
    }

    /**
     * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
     */
    bindEvents() {
        // æ¼”ç¤ºæŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('startDemo1')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo1());
        document.getElementById('startDemo2')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo2());
        document.getElementById('startDemo3')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo3());
        document.getElementById('resetBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());
        document.getElementById('pointsBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showPoints());

        // åœºæ™¯1äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('uploadBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.simulateFileUpload());
        document.getElementById('uploadArea')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.simulateFileUpload());

        // åœºæ™¯2äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('viewDetailsBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showConflictDetails());
        document.getElementById('executeBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.executeUpdate());

        // åœºæ™¯3äº‹ä»¶
        document.querySelectorAll('.detail-btn').forEach(btn => {
            btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => this.showGapDetails(e.target.dataset.item));
        });

        // å¼¹çª—äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('pointsCloseBtn')?.addEventListener('click', () => this.hidePoints());
        document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay')?.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target.id === 'pointsPopupOverlay') {
                this.hidePoints();
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºå¹³å°æ¦‚è§ˆ
     */
    showPlatformOverview() {
        this.hideAllSections();
        const overview = document.getElementById('platformOverview');
        if (overview) {
            overview.style.display = 'block';
            overview.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
        }
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ‰€æœ‰æ¼”ç¤ºåŒºåŸŸ
     */
    hideAllSections() {
        const sections = ['platformOverview', 'demo1', 'demo2', 'demo3'];
        sections.forEach(id => {
            const element = document.getElementById(id);
            if (element) {
                element.style.display = 'none';
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ¸…é™¤æ‰€æœ‰å®šæ—¶å™¨
     */
    clearTimeouts() {
        this.animationTimeouts.forEach(timeout => clearTimeout(timeout));
        this.animationTimeouts = [];
    }

    /**
     * æ¼”ç¤º1ï¼šæ–°çŸ¥è¯†æ³¨å…¥
     */
    startDemo1() {
        this.currentDemo = 'demo1';
        this.clearTimeouts();
        this.hideAllSections();
        
        const demo1 = document.getElementById('demo1');
        if (demo1) {
            demo1.style.display = 'block';
            demo1.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰å­ç»„ä»¶çŠ¶æ€
            this.resetDemo1State();
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º1çŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetDemo1State() {
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        const processingFlow = document.getElementById('processingFlow');
        const extractionPreview = document.getElementById('extractionPreview');
        const knowledgeGeneration = document.getElementById('knowledgeGeneration');
        const completionResult = document.getElementById('completionResult');

        if (uploadArea) uploadArea.style.display = 'block';
        if (processingFlow) processingFlow.style.display = 'none';
        if (extractionPreview) extractionPreview.style.display = 'none';
        if (knowledgeGeneration) knowledgeGeneration.style.display = 'none';
        if (completionResult) completionResult.style.display = 'none';

        // é‡ç½®æ­¥éª¤çŠ¶æ€
        document.querySelectorAll('#demo1 .step').forEach(step => {
            step.classList.remove('active', 'completed');
            const progressFill = step.querySelector('.progress-fill');
            if (progressFill) {
                progressFill.style.width = '0%';
            }
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
     */
    simulateFileUpload() {
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        const processingFlow = document.getElementById('processingFlow');
        
        if (uploadArea && processingFlow) {
            // éšè—ä¸Šä¼ åŒºåŸŸï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºå¤„ç†æµç¨‹
            uploadArea.style.display = 'none';
            processingFlow.style.display = 'block';
            processingFlow.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';

            // å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨ç”»
            this.startProcessingSteps();
        }
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨ç”»
     */
    startProcessingSteps() {
        const steps = ['step1', 'step2', 'step3', 'step4'];
        let currentIndex = 0;

        const activateStep = () => {
            if (currentIndex < steps.length) {
                const stepElement = document.getElementById(steps[currentIndex]);
                if (stepElement) {
                    stepElement.classList.add('active');
                    
                    // 2ç§’åå®Œæˆå½“å‰æ­¥éª¤
                    this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                        stepElement.classList.remove('active');
                        stepElement.classList.add('completed');
                        currentIndex++;
                        
                        if (currentIndex < steps.length) {
                            activateStep();
                        } else {
                            // æ‰€æœ‰æ­¥éª¤å®Œæˆï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºæå–ç»“æœ
                            this.showExtractionResults();
                        }
                    }, 2000));
                }
            }
        };

        activateStep();
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯æå–ç»“æœ
     */
    showExtractionResults() {
        const extractionPreview = document.getElementById('extractionPreview');
        if (extractionPreview) {
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                extractionPreview.style.display = 'block';
                extractionPreview.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
                
                // 2ç§’åæ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ¥è¯†ç”Ÿæˆ
                this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                    this.showKnowledgeGeneration();
                }, 2000));
            }, 500));
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ¥è¯†ç”Ÿæˆ
     */
    showKnowledgeGeneration() {
        const knowledgeGeneration = document.getElementById('knowledgeGeneration');
        if (knowledgeGeneration) {
            knowledgeGeneration.style.display = 'block';
            knowledgeGeneration.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // åŠ¨æ€æ˜¾ç¤ºQ&Aé¡¹ç›®
            const qaItems = knowledgeGeneration.querySelectorAll('.qa-item');
            qaItems.forEach((item, index) => {
                item.style.opacity = '0';
                item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                
                this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                    item.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
                    item.style.opacity = '1';
                    item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                }, index * 1000));
            });
            
            // æœ€åæ˜¾ç¤ºå®Œæˆç»“æœ
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                this.showCompletionResult();
            }, qaItems.length * 1000 + 1000));
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºå®Œæˆç»“æœ
     */
    showCompletionResult() {
        const completionResult = document.getElementById('completionResult');
        if (completionResult) {
            completionResult.style.display = 'block';
            completionResult.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // æ•°å­—è®¡æ•°åŠ¨ç”»
            const highlight = completionResult.querySelector('.highlight');
            if (highlight) {
                this.animateCount(highlight, 0, 15, 1000);
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ¼”ç¤º2ï¼šçŸ¥è¯†è¿­ä»£æ›´æ–°
     */
    startDemo2() {
        this.currentDemo = 'demo2';
        this.clearTimeouts();
        this.hideAllSections();
        
        const demo2 = document.getElementById('demo2');
        if (demo2) {
            demo2.style.display = 'block';
            demo2.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // é‡ç½®çŠ¶æ€
            this.resetDemo2State();
            
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºå†²çªè­¦å‘ŠåŠ¨ç”»
            this.animateConflictAlert();
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º2çŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetDemo2State() {
        const conflictComparison = document.getElementById('conflictComparison');
        const updateProgress = document.getElementById('updateProgress');
        
        if (conflictComparison) conflictComparison.style.display = 'none';
        if (updateProgress) updateProgress.style.display = 'none';
    }

    /**
     * å†²çªè­¦å‘ŠåŠ¨ç”»
     */
    animateConflictAlert() {
        const conflictAlert = document.getElementById('conflictAlert');
        if (conflictAlert) {
            conflictAlert.style.animation = 'pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite';
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºå†²çªè¯¦æƒ…
     */
    showConflictDetails() {
        const conflictComparison = document.getElementById('conflictComparison');
        if (conflictComparison) {
            conflictComparison.style.display = 'block';
            conflictComparison.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // åœæ­¢è­¦å‘ŠåŠ¨ç”»
            const conflictAlert = document.getElementById('conflictAlert');
            if (conflictAlert) {
                conflictAlert.style.animation = 'none';
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ‰§è¡Œæ›´æ–°
     */
    executeUpdate() {
        const aiSuggestions = document.getElementById('aiSuggestions');
        const updateProgress = document.getElementById('updateProgress');
        
        if (aiSuggestions && updateProgress) {
            aiSuggestions.style.display = 'none';
            updateProgress.style.display = 'block';
            updateProgress.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ›´æ–°æ­¥éª¤
            this.simulateUpdateSteps();
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ›´æ–°æ­¥éª¤
     */
    simulateUpdateSteps() {
        const steps = document.querySelectorAll('#updateProgress .update-step');
        steps.forEach((step, index) => {
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                step.classList.add('completed');
                step.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.3s ease-out';
            }, index * 800));
        });

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€ç»ˆç»“æœ
        this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
            const updateResult = document.querySelector('.update-result');
            if (updateResult) {
                updateResult.style.animation = 'pulse 1s ease-in-out';
            }
        }, steps.length * 800 + 500));
    }

    /**
     * æ¼”ç¤º3ï¼šçŸ¥è¯†ç©ºç™½æ¢æµ‹
     */
    startDemo3() {
        this.currentDemo = 'demo3';
        this.clearTimeouts();
        this.hideAllSections();
        
        const demo3 = document.getElementById('demo3');
        if (demo3) {
            demo3.style.display = 'block';
            demo3.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // é‡ç½®çŠ¶æ€
            this.resetDemo3State();
            
            // å¼€å§‹æ’è¡Œæ¦œåŠ¨ç”»
            this.animateGapRanking();
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º3çŠ¶æ€
     */
    resetDemo3State() {
        const aiInsight = document.getElementById('aiInsight');
        const knowledgeCreation = document.getElementById('knowledgeCreation');
        
        if (aiInsight) aiInsight.style.display = 'none';
        if (knowledgeCreation) knowledgeCreation.style.display = 'none';
    }

    /**
     * æ’è¡Œæ¦œåŠ¨ç”»
     */
    animateGapRanking() {
        const gapItems = document.querySelectorAll('.gap-item');
        gapItems.forEach((item, index) => {
            item.style.opacity = '0';
            item.style.transform = 'translateX(-30px)';
            
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                item.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
                item.style.opacity = '1';
                item.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
            }, index * 300));
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºå·®è·è¯¦æƒ…
     * @param {string} item - é¡¹ç›®ç±»å‹
     */
    showGapDetails(item) {
        const aiInsight = document.getElementById('aiInsight');
        if (aiInsight) {
            aiInsight.style.display = 'block';
            aiInsight.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // æ´å¯Ÿå¡ç‰‡é€ä¸ªæ˜¾ç¤º
            const insightCards = aiInsight.querySelectorAll('.insight-card');
            insightCards.forEach((card, index) => {
                card.style.opacity = '0';
                card.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                
                this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                    card.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
                    card.style.opacity = '1';
                    card.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                }, index * 500));
            });
            
            // æ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ¥è¯†åˆ›å»º
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                this.showKnowledgeCreation();
            }, insightCards.length * 500 + 1000));
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ¥è¯†åˆ›å»º
     */
    showKnowledgeCreation() {
        const knowledgeCreation = document.getElementById('knowledgeCreation');
        if (knowledgeCreation) {
            knowledgeCreation.style.display = 'block';
            knowledgeCreation.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // 2ç§’åæ˜¾ç¤ºè‰ç¨¿é¢„è§ˆ
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                this.showDraftPreview();
            }, 2000));
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºè‰ç¨¿é¢„è§ˆ
     */
    showDraftPreview() {
        const draftPreview = document.getElementById('draftPreview');
        if (draftPreview) {
            draftPreview.style.display = 'block';
            draftPreview.style.animation = 'slideIn 0.6s ease-out';
            
            // è‰ç¨¿å†…å®¹é€ä¸ªæ˜¾ç¤º
            const draftSections = draftPreview.querySelectorAll('.draft-section');
            draftSections.forEach((section, index) => {
                section.style.opacity = '0';
                section.style.transform = 'translateX(-20px)';
                
                this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                    section.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
                    section.style.opacity = '1';
                    section.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
                }, index * 600));
            });
        }
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
     */
    resetDemo() {
        this.currentDemo = null;
        this.clearTimeouts();
        this.showPlatformOverview();
        
        // é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰çŠ¶æ€
        this.resetDemo1State();
        this.resetDemo2State();
        this.resetDemo3State();
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹
     */
    showPoints() {
        const overlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        if (overlay) {
            overlay.classList.add('active');
        }
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹
     */
    hidePoints() {
        const overlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
        if (overlay) {
            overlay.classList.remove('active');
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ•°å­—è®¡æ•°åŠ¨ç”»
     * @param {HTMLElement} element - ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ 
     * @param {number} start - èµ·å§‹æ•°å­—
     * @param {number} end - ç»“æŸæ•°å­—
     * @param {number} duration - åŠ¨ç”»æ—¶é•¿
     */
    animateCount(element, start, end, duration) {
        const range = end - start;
        const increment = range / (duration / 16);
        let current = start;
        
        const timer = setInterval(() => {
            current += increment;
            if (current >= end) {
                current = end;
                clearInterval(timer);
            }
            element.textContent = Math.floor(current);
        }, 16);
        
        this.animationTimeouts.push(timer);
    }

    /**
     * æ·»åŠ ç²’å­æ•ˆæœï¼ˆå¯é€‰çš„è§†è§‰å¢å¼ºï¼‰
     * @param {HTMLElement} container - å®¹å™¨å…ƒç´ 
     */
    addParticleEffect(container) {
        if (!container) return;
        
        for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            const particle = document.createElement('div');
            particle.className = 'particle';
            particle.style.cssText = `
                position: absolute;
                width: 4px;
                height: 4px;
                background: #667eea;
                border-radius: 50%;
                pointer-events: none;
                animation: particleFloat ${2 + Math.random() * 3}s linear infinite;
                left: ${Math.random() * 100}%;
                top: ${Math.random() * 100}%;
                opacity: ${0.3 + Math.random() * 0.7};
            `;
            container.appendChild(particle);
            
            // æ¸…ç†ç²’å­
            this.animationTimeouts.push(setTimeout(() => {
                if (particle.parentNode) {
                    particle.parentNode.removeChild(particle);
                }
            }, 5000));
        }
    }
}

// æ·»åŠ ç²’å­åŠ¨ç”»CSS
const particleStyle = document.createElement('style');
particleStyle.textContent = `
    @keyframes particleFloat {
        0% {
            transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg);
            opacity: 1;
        }
        100% {
            transform: translateY(-100px) rotate(360deg);
            opacity: 0;
        }
    }
`;
document.head.appendChild(particleStyle);

// é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤º
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    window.knowledgeBaseDemo = new KnowledgeBaseDemo();
});

// é”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®æ”¯æŒ
document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
    if (!window.knowledgeBaseDemo) return;
    
    switch(e.key) {
        case '1':
            window.knowledgeBaseDemo.startDemo1();
            break;
        case '2':
            window.knowledgeBaseDemo.startDemo2();
            break;
        case '3':
            window.knowledgeBaseDemo.startDemo3();
            break;
        case 'r':
        case 'R':
            window.knowledgeBaseDemo.resetDemo();
            break;
        case 'Escape':
            window.knowledgeBaseDemo.hidePoints();
            break;
    }
});

// å¯¼å‡ºä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆå¦‚æœéœ€è¦åœ¨å…¶ä»–è„šæœ¬ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ï¼‰
if (typeof module !== 'undefined' && module.exports) {
    module.exports = KnowledgeBaseDemo;
}



================================================
FILE: CJ_8/style.css
================================================
/* ===== CSSå˜é‡å®šä¹‰ ===== */
:root {
    /* å“ç‰Œæ¸å˜è‰² */
    --primary-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    --button-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
    --success-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #27ae60, #2ecc71);
    --warning-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff6b6b, #ffa726);
    --dark-gradient: linear-gradient(145deg, #2c3e50, #34495e);
    --info-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #3498db, #2980b9);
    
    /* æ–‡æœ¬é¢œè‰² */
    --text-primary: #2c3e50;
    --text-secondary: #6c757d;
    --text-light: #ecf0f1;
    --text-muted: #bdc3c7;
    
    /* èƒŒæ™¯è‰² */
    --bg-white: #ffffff;
    --bg-light: #f8f9fa;
    --bg-muted: #e9ecef;
    --bg-transparent: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    
    /* çŠ¶æ€è‰² */
    --color-success: #27ae60;
    --color-warning: #f39c12;
    --color-danger: #e74c3c;
    --color-info: #3498db;
    
    /* é˜´å½± */
    --shadow-light: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --shadow-medium: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    --shadow-dark: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    
    /* å­—ä½“ */
    --font-title: 18px;
    --font-body: 14px;
    --font-small: 12px;
    --font-large: 16px;
    --font-normal: 400;
    --font-medium: 500;
    --font-semibold: 600;
}

/* ===== åŸºç¡€æ ·å¼ ===== */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei', 'PingFang SC', sans-serif;
    background: var(--primary-gradient);
    min-height: 100vh;
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* ===== æ§åˆ¶é¢æ¿æ ·å¼ ===== */
.demo-controls {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    padding: 12px 20px;
    border-radius: 0 0 15px 15px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.control-row {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
}

.demo-title {
    color: #2c3e50;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: 600;
    flex-shrink: 0;
}

.control-buttons {
    display: flex;
    gap: 12px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

/* ===== æŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ ===== */
.btn-primary, .btn-secondary {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 25px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    outline: none;
}

.btn-primary {
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
    color: white;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3);
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4);
}

.btn-secondary {
    background: #f8f9fa;
    color: #6c757d;
    border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
    background: #e9ecef;

@keyframes slideIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(30px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

@keyframes pulse {
    0%, 100% {
        transform: scale(1);
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }
}

/* ===== æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹å¼¹çª—æ ·å¼ ===== */
.points-popup-overlay {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(rgba(44, 62, 80, 0.9), rgba(52, 73, 94, 0.9));
    backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    z-index: 2000;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55);
}

.points-popup-overlay.active {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}

.points-popup {
    background: linear-gradient(145deg, #ffffff, #fafbfc);
    border-radius: 24px;
    box-shadow: 
        0 24px 48px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
        0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
        inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    max-width: 980px;
    width: 95%;
    position: relative;
    transform: scale(0.7) translateY(40px) rotateX(15deg);
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55);
    max-height: 90vh;
    overflow: hidden;
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
}

.points-popup-overlay.active .points-popup {
    transform: scale(1) translateY(0) rotateX(0deg);
}

.points-popup-header {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    padding: 32px 40px 28px;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
}

    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: url('data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><defs><pattern id="grid" width="10" height="10" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse"><path d="M 10 0 L 0 0 0 10" fill="none" stroke="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)" stroke-width="0.5"/></pattern></defs><rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(%23grid)"/></svg>');
    opacity: 0.3;
}

*   **äº¤äº’æ“ä½œ**: æ¼”ç¤ºè€…ç‚¹å‡»ä¸‹è½½ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å¼€PPTæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚
*   **PPTå†…å®¹é¢„è§ˆ**:
    *   **ç¬¬ä¸€é¡µ (å°é¢)**: `12345çƒ­çº¿æœåŠ¡è´¨é‡åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Šï¼ˆ6æœˆ3æ—¥-6æœˆ9æ—¥ï¼‰`
    *   **ç¬¬äºŒé¡µ (æ‘˜è¦)**: `ä¸Šå‘¨æ¦‚è§ˆï¼šæ»¡æ„åº¦ç•¥æœ‰ä¸‹æ»‘ï¼Œä¸»å› æ˜¯...` (AIè‡ªåŠ¨æ’°å†™çš„æ‘˜è¦)
    *   **ç¬¬ä¸‰é¡µ (é—®é¢˜åˆ†æ)**: åŒ…å«åˆšæ‰ç”Ÿæˆçš„â€œåŸå› å æ¯”é¥¼å›¾â€å’Œè¯¦ç»†æ–‡å­—è¯´æ˜ã€‚
    *   **ç¬¬å››é¡µ (éƒ¨é—¨æ•ˆèƒ½)**: åŒ…å«â€œå¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿æ’è¡Œæ¦œâ€å’Œå…³é”®æ•°æ®ã€‚
    *   **ç¬¬äº”é¡µ (åˆæ­¥å»ºè®®)**: `åŸºäºä»¥ä¸Šåˆ†æï¼Œå»ºè®®é‡ç‚¹å…³æ³¨ä½å»ºå§”å…³äºè€æ—§å°åŒºæ”¹é€ å·¥å•çš„å¤„ç†æµç¨‹ï¼Œå¹¶å¯¹ç›¸å…³åå¸­è¿›è¡Œä¸“é¡¹åŸ¹è®­...` (AIè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆçš„å»ºè®®)

    *   **æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹**:
        *   **è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æŠ¥å‘Š**: å°†ç¹ççš„æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºã€å›¾è¡¨åˆ¶ä½œã€æ–‡æ¡ˆæ’°å†™å·¥ä½œå®Œå…¨è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–ã€‚
        *   **æˆæœå›ºåŒ–**: å°†å³æ—¶çš„ã€ç¢ç‰‡åŒ–çš„å¯¹è¯åˆ†æè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œä¸€é”®è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºç»“æ„åŒ–çš„ã€å¯ç”¨äºæ±‡æŠ¥å’Œå­˜æ¡£çš„æ­£å¼æŠ¥å‘Šã€‚
        *   **æ™ºèƒ½å»ºè®®**: æŠ¥å‘Šä¸­ä¸ä»…æœ‰æ•°æ®å’Œåˆ†æï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰AIåŸºäºåˆ†æç»“æœæå‡ºçš„å¯è¡Œæ€§å»ºè®®ï¼ŒçœŸæ­£æ‰®æ¼”äº†â€œåˆ†æå¸ˆâ€çš„è§’è‰²ã€‚

**ã€åœºæ™¯ç»“æŸã€‘**

================================================
FILE: CJ_9/script.js
================================================
/**
 * åœºæ™¯9ï¼šå¯¹è¯å¼æ•°æ®åˆ†ææ¼”ç¤ºè„šæœ¬
 * å®ç°æ™ºèƒ½æ•°æ®åˆ†æå¹³å°çš„äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½
 */

class DataAnalysisDemo {
    constructor() {
        this.currentStep = 0;
        this.isRunning = false;
        this.conversationHistory = [];
        this.reportData = [];
        
        this.init();
    }

    /**
     * åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»„ä»¶å’Œäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
     */
    init() {
        this.bindEvents();
        this.setupInitialState();
    }

    /**
     * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
     */
    bindEvents() {
        // æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('startBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo());
        document.getElementById('resetBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());
        document.getElementById('pointsBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.showPoints());
        
        // æ¨èé—®é¢˜å¡ç‰‡ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        document.querySelectorAll('.question-card').forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('click', (e) => this.handleQuestionCard(e));
        });
        
        // å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('sendBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.sendMessage());
        document.getElementById('questionInput').addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') this.sendMessage();
        });
        
        // å¼¹çª—å…³é—­äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('pointsCloseBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.hidePoints());
        document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay').addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target === e.currentTarget) this.hidePoints();
        });
        
        // æŠ¥å‘ŠæŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
        document.getElementById('downloadBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.downloadReport());
        document.getElementById('shareBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.shareReport());
    }

    /**
     * è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€
     */
    setupInitialState() {
        this.disableInputs();
        this.hideAllSections();
        document.getElementById('analysisPlatform').style.display = 'block';
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º
     */
    async startDemo() {
        if (this.isRunning) return;
        
        this.isRunning = true;
        this.currentStep = 0;
        this.enableInputs();
        
        // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
        document.getElementById('startBtn').textContent = 'ğŸ¯ æ¼”ç¤ºè¿›è¡Œä¸­...';
        document.getElementById('startBtn').disabled = true;
        
        await this.executeDemo();
    }

    /**
     * æ‰§è¡Œæ¼”ç¤ºæµç¨‹
     */
    async executeDemo() {
        const steps = [
            // () => this.showWelcomeMessage(),
            () => this.simulateFirstQuestion(),
            () => this.simulateSecondQuestion(),
            () => this.simulateThirdQuestion(),
            () => this.generateReport()
        ];
        
        for (let i = 0; i < steps.length; i++) {
            await this.delay(2000);
            await steps[i]();
            this.currentStep++;
        }
        
        this.completeDemo();
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¬¢è¿æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    async showWelcomeMessage() {
        await this.addAIMessage(
            'æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨12345çƒ­çº¿æ™ºèƒ½æ•°æ®åˆ†æå¹³å°ï¼æˆ‘å°†ä¸ºæ‚¨æ¼”ç¤ºå¦‚ä½•é€šè¿‡è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€äº¤äº’è·å–æ·±åº¦æ•°æ®æ´å¯Ÿã€‚è®©æˆ‘ä»¬ä»ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„é—®é¢˜å¼€å§‹...'
        );
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼šä¸Šå‘¨çƒ­çº¿æ•´ä½“æƒ…å†µ
     */
    async simulateFirstQuestion() {
        const question = "ä¸Šå‘¨çƒ­çº¿æ•´ä½“æƒ…å†µæ€ä¹ˆæ ·ï¼Ÿ";
        await this.simulateUserQuestion(question);
        
        await this.delay(1500);
        
        const response = `
            <div class="data-card">
                <h4>ğŸ“Š ä¸Šå‘¨ï¼ˆ6æœˆ3æ—¥-6æœˆ9æ—¥ï¼‰çƒ­çº¿è¿è¡Œæ¦‚å†µ</h4>
                <div class="data-metrics">
                    <div class="metric-item">
                        <span class="metric-value">85,430</span>
                        <div class="metric-label">é€šè¯æ€»é‡</div>
                        <div class="metric-change positive">ç¯æ¯”ä¸Šå‡ 5.2%</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="metric-item">
                        <span class="metric-value">91.5%</span>
                        <div class="metric-label">ç»¼åˆæ»¡æ„åº¦</div>
                        <div class="metric-change negative">è¾ƒå‰å‘¨ -0.8%</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="metric-item">
                        <span class="metric-value">88.2%</span>
                        <div class="metric-label">é¦–æ¬¡è§£å†³ç‡</div>
                        <div class="metric-change positive">è¾ƒå‰å‘¨ +1.5%</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="chart-container">
                    <h5>ğŸ“ˆ é€šè¯é‡å’Œæ»¡æ„åº¦è¶‹åŠ¿</h5>
                    <div id="trendChart" class="echarts-container"></div>
                </div>
                <p><strong>çƒ­ç‚¹é—®é¢˜ï¼š</strong>ä¸»è¦é›†ä¸­åœ¨"ä¸­è€ƒæ‹›ç”Ÿæ”¿ç­–å’¨è¯¢"å’Œ"å¤å­£å¸‚å®¹ç¯å¢ƒæŠ•è¯‰"</p>
            </div>
        `;
        
        await this.addAIMessage(response);
        
        // æ¸²æŸ“è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾è¡¨
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.renderTrendChart();
        }, 500);
        
        this.reportData.push({
            question: question,
            response: "ä¸Šå‘¨æ•°æ®æ¦‚è§ˆ",
            key_metrics: ["é€šè¯é‡85,430é€š", "æ»¡æ„åº¦91.5%", "é¦–æ¬¡è§£å†³ç‡88.2%"]
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç¬¬äºŒä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼šæ»¡æ„åº¦ä¸‹é™åˆ†æ
     */
    async simulateSecondQuestion() {
        const question = "ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ»¡æ„åº¦ä¸‹é™äº†ï¼Ÿå…·ä½“æ˜¯å“ªäº›æ–¹é¢çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Ÿ";
        await this.simulateUserQuestion(question);
        
        await this.delay(2000);
        
        const response = `
            <div class="data-card">
                <h4>ğŸ” æ»¡æ„åº¦ä¸‹é™å½’å› åˆ†æ</h4>
                <p>é€šè¿‡å¯¹ä½åˆ†ï¼ˆä¸æ»¡æ„ï¼‰å·¥å•çš„æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹è¿›è¡ŒAIèšç±»åˆ†æï¼Œå‘ç°å¯¼è‡´æ»¡æ„åº¦ä¸‹é™çš„ä¸»è¦åŸå› ï¼š</p>
                <div class="data-metrics">
                    <div class="metric-item">
                        <span class="metric-value">45%</span>
                        <div class="metric-label">å¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆè¿‡é•¿</div>
                        <div class="metric-change">è€æ—§å°åŒºåŠ è£…ç”µæ¢¯</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="metric-item">
                        <span class="metric-value">30%</span>
                        <div class="metric-label">è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆæ— æ•ˆ</div>
                        <div class="metric-change">å…±äº«å•è½¦ä¹±åœæ”¾</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="metric-item">
                        <span class="metric-value">15%</span>
                        <div class="metric-label">æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦é—®é¢˜</div>
                        <div class="metric-change">ç¤¾ä¿å¡è¡¥åŠå’¨è¯¢</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="chart-container">
                    <h5>ğŸ¥§ é—®é¢˜åŸå› åˆ†å¸ƒé¥¼å›¾</h5>
                    <div id="pieChart" class="pie-chart-container"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;
        
        await this.addAIMessage(response);
        
        // æ¸²æŸ“é¥¼å›¾
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.renderPieChart();
        }, 500);
        
        this.reportData.push({
            question: question,
            response: "æ»¡æ„åº¦ä¸‹é™åŸå› åˆ†æ",
            key_findings: ["å¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆè¿‡é•¿45%", "è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆæ— æ•ˆ30%", "æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦15%"]
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼šéƒ¨é—¨å¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆæ’å
     */
    async simulateThirdQuestion() {
        const question = "æŠŠå¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆæœ€é•¿çš„å·¥å•æŒ‰æ‰¿åŠéƒ¨é—¨åˆ—ä¸ªæ’å";
        await this.simulateUserQuestion(question);
        
        await this.delay(1500);
        
        const response = `
            <div class="data-card">
                <h4>â±ï¸ å„éƒ¨é—¨å·¥å•å¹³å‡å¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿æ’è¡Œæ¦œ (TOP 5)</h4>
                <table class="ranking-table">
                    <thead>
                        <tr>
                            <th>æ’å</th>
                            <th>æ‰¿åŠéƒ¨é—¨</th>
                            <th>å¹³å‡å¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿</th>
                            <th>è¶…æ—¶ç‡</th>
                            <th>ä¸»è¦é—®é¢˜ç±»å‹</th>
                        </tr>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                        <tr>
                            <td><span class="rank-number">1</span></td>
                            <td>ä½å»ºå§”</td>
                            <td>18.5å¤©</td>
                            <td>35%</td>
                            <td>è€æ—§å°åŒºæ”¹é€ </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <td><span class="rank-number">2</span></td>
                            <td>è§„è‡ªå±€</td>
                            <td>15.2å¤©</td>
                            <td>28%</td>
                            <td>è¿å»ºæ‹†é™¤</td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <td><span class="rank-number">3</span></td>
                            <td>äººç¤¾å±€</td>
                            <td>9.8å¤©</td>
                            <td>15%</td>
                            <td>åŠ³åŠ¨ä»²è£</td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <td><span class="rank-number">4</span></td>
                            <td>äº¤é€šå§”</td>
                            <td>7.3å¤©</td>
                            <td>12%</td>
                            <td>é“è·¯ç»´æŠ¤</td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <td><span class="rank-number">5</span></td>
                            <td>ç¯ä¿å±€</td>
                            <td>5.1å¤©</td>
                            <td>8%</td>
                            <td>å™ªéŸ³æŠ•è¯‰</td>
                        </tr>
                    </tbody>
                </table>
                <p><strong>ğŸ’¡ å…³é”®æ´å¯Ÿï¼š</strong>ä½å»ºå§”åœ¨è€æ—§å°åŒºæ”¹é€ ç±»å·¥å•å¤„ç†ä¸Šå­˜åœ¨æ˜æ˜¾ç“¶é¢ˆï¼Œå»ºè®®é‡ç‚¹å…³æ³¨æµç¨‹ä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚</p>
            </div>
        `;
        
        await this.addAIMessage(response);
        this.reportData.push({
            question: question,
            response: "éƒ¨é—¨å¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆæ’å",
            key_insight: "ä½å»ºå§”å¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿æœ€é•¿ï¼ˆ18.5å¤©ï¼‰ï¼Œéœ€è¦æµç¨‹ä¼˜åŒ–"
        });
    }

    /**
     * ç”ŸæˆæŠ¥å‘Š
     */
    async generateReport() {
        const question = "æŠŠåˆšæ‰æˆ‘ä»¬èŠçš„è¿™äº›ï¼Œç»™æˆ‘ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä»½å…³äºä¸Šå‘¨æœåŠ¡è´¨é‡é—®é¢˜çš„åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Šï¼Œè¦PPTæ ¼å¼çš„";
        await this.simulateUserQuestion(question);
        
        await this.delay(1000);
        await this.addAIMessage("å¥½çš„ï¼æˆ‘æ­£åœ¨ä¸ºæ‚¨ç”Ÿæˆä¸“ä¸šçš„åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Šï¼Œè¯·ç¨å€™...");
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæŠ¥å‘Šç”ŸæˆåŒºåŸŸ
        document.getElementById('reportSection').style.display = 'block';
        
        await this.animateReportGeneration();
    }

    /**
     * åŠ¨ç”»æ¼”ç¤ºæŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹
     */
    async animateReportGeneration() {
        const statusElement = document.getElementById('reportStatus');
        const progressElement = document.getElementById('progressFill');
        const previewElement = document.getElementById('reportPreview');
        
        const steps = [
            { text: "æ­£åœ¨åˆ†æå¯¹è¯å†…å®¹...", progress: 20 },
            { text: "æ­£åœ¨æå–å…³é”®æ•°æ®...", progress: 40 },
            { text: "æ­£åœ¨ç”Ÿæˆå›¾è¡¨...", progress: 60 },
            { text: "æ­£åœ¨æ’°å†™åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Š...", progress: 80 },
            { text: "æ­£åœ¨ç”ŸæˆPPTæ ¼å¼...", progress: 100 }
        ];
        
        for (const step of steps) {
            statusElement.textContent = step.text;
            progressElement.style.width = step.progress + '%';
            await this.delay(1500);
        }
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæŠ¥å‘Šé¢„è§ˆ
        previewElement.innerHTML = `
            <div style="text-align: left;">
                <h4>ğŸ“‹ 12345çƒ­çº¿æœåŠ¡è´¨é‡åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Šï¼ˆ6æœˆ3æ—¥-6æœˆ9æ—¥ï¼‰</h4>
                <br>
                <p><strong>ğŸ“Š ç¬¬ä¸€é¡µ - æ•°æ®æ¦‚è§ˆï¼š</strong></p>
                <ul>
                    <li>é€šè¯æ€»é‡ï¼š85,430é€šï¼ˆç¯æ¯”+5.2%ï¼‰</li>
                    <li>ç»¼åˆæ»¡æ„åº¦ï¼š91.5%ï¼ˆè¾ƒå‰å‘¨-0.8%ï¼‰</li>
                    <li>é¦–æ¬¡è§£å†³ç‡ï¼š88.2%ï¼ˆè¾ƒå‰å‘¨+1.5%ï¼‰</li>
                </ul>
                <br>
                <p><strong>ğŸ” ç¬¬äºŒé¡µ - é—®é¢˜åˆ†æï¼š</strong></p>
                <ul>
                    <li>å¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆè¿‡é•¿ï¼š45%ï¼ˆè€æ—§å°åŒºåŠ è£…ç”µæ¢¯ï¼‰</li>
                    <li>è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆæ— æ•ˆï¼š30%ï¼ˆå…±äº«å•è½¦ä¹±åœæ”¾ï¼‰</li>
                    <li>æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦é—®é¢˜ï¼š15%ï¼ˆç¤¾ä¿å¡è¡¥åŠå’¨è¯¢ï¼‰</li>
                </ul>
                <br>
                <p><strong>ğŸ“ˆ ç¬¬ä¸‰é¡µ - éƒ¨é—¨æ•ˆèƒ½ï¼š</strong></p>
                <ul>
                    <li>ä½å»ºå§”å¹³å‡å¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿ï¼š18.5å¤©ï¼ˆéœ€é‡ç‚¹å…³æ³¨ï¼‰</li>
                    <li>è§„è‡ªå±€å¹³å‡å¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿ï¼š15.2å¤©</li>
                    <li>äººç¤¾å±€å¹³å‡å¤„ç†æ—¶é•¿ï¼š9.8å¤©</li>
                </ul>
                <br>
                <p><strong>ğŸ’¡ ç¬¬å››é¡µ - æ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®ï¼š</strong></p>
                <ul>
                    <li>ä¼˜åŒ–ä½å»ºå§”è€æ—§å°åŒºæ”¹é€ å·¥å•æµç¨‹</li>
                    <li>åŠ å¼ºåå¸­å…³äºç¤¾ä¿ä¸šåŠ¡çš„ä¸“é¡¹åŸ¹è®­</li>
                    <li>å»ºç«‹å…±äº«å•è½¦ä¹±åœæ”¾é•¿æ•ˆæ²»ç†æœºåˆ¶</li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // å¯ç”¨ä¸‹è½½å’Œåˆ†äº«æŒ‰é’®
        document.getElementById('downloadBtn').disabled = false;
        document.getElementById('shareBtn').disabled = false;
        
        await this.addAIMessage("âœ… æŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆï¼æˆ‘å·²ç»å°†æˆ‘ä»¬çš„å¯¹è¯åˆ†æè½¬åŒ–ä¸ºä¸€ä»½ç»“æ„åŒ–çš„PPTæŠ¥å‘Šï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ•°æ®æ¦‚è§ˆã€é—®é¢˜åˆ†æã€éƒ¨é—¨æ•ˆèƒ½å’Œæ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®å››ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç‚¹å‡»ä¸‹è½½æŒ‰é’®è·å–å®Œæ•´çš„PPTæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚");
    }

    /**
     * æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç”¨æˆ·æé—®
     */
    async simulateUserQuestion(question) {
        await this.addUserMessage(question);
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºAIæ€è€ƒçŠ¶æ€
        await this.delay(500);
        await this.addAIMessage("æ­£åœ¨åˆ†ææ‚¨çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·ç¨å€™...", true);
        await this.delay(1000);
        // ç§»é™¤æ€è€ƒçŠ¶æ€æ¶ˆæ¯
        this.removeLastMessage();
    }

    /**
     * å¤„ç†æ¨èé—®é¢˜å¡ç‰‡ç‚¹å‡»
     */
    async handleQuestionCard(e) {
        if (!this.isRunning) return;
        
        const card = e.currentTarget;
        const question = card.dataset.question;
        
        // æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»æ•ˆæœ
        card.style.transform = 'scale(0.95)';
        setTimeout(() => {
            card.style.transform = '';
        }, 150);
        
        // ç¦ç”¨æ‰€æœ‰æ¨èé—®é¢˜å¡ç‰‡
        document.querySelectorAll('.question-card').forEach(c => {
            c.style.opacity = '0.5';
            c.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
        });
        
        await this.addUserMessage(question);
        // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ å¯¹åº”çš„AIå“åº”é€»è¾‘
    }

    /**
     * å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    async sendMessage() {
        const input = document.getElementById('questionInput');
        const message = input.value.trim();
        
        if (!message || !this.isRunning) return;
        
        input.value = '';
        await this.addUserMessage(message);
        
        // ç®€å•çš„è‡ªåŠ¨å›å¤é€»è¾‘
        await this.delay(1000);
        await this.addAIMessage("æ„Ÿè°¢æ‚¨çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼åœ¨å®é™…åº”ç”¨ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¼šåŸºäºæ‚¨çš„å…·ä½“é—®é¢˜æä¾›ç›¸åº”çš„æ•°æ®åˆ†æç»“æœã€‚");
    }

    /**
     * æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    async addUserMessage(message) {
        const messagesContainer = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
        
        const messageElement = document.createElement('div');
        messageElement.className = 'user-message';
        messageElement.innerHTML = `
            <div class="user-avatar">ğŸ‘¤</div>
            <div class="message-content">
                <p>${message}</p>
            </div>
        `;
        
        messagesContainer.appendChild(messageElement);
        this.scrollToBottom();
        
        this.conversationHistory.push({
            type: 'user',
            content: message,
            timestamp: new Date()
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ·»åŠ AIæ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    async addAIMessage(message, isThinking = false) {
        const messagesContainer = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
        
        const messageElement = document.createElement('div');
        messageElement.className = 'ai-message';
        if (isThinking) messageElement.dataset.thinking = 'true';
        
        messageElement.innerHTML = `
            <div class="ai-avatar">ğŸ¤–</div>
            <div class="message-content">
                ${isThinking ? '<p>ğŸ¤” æ­£åœ¨æ€è€ƒ...</p>' : message}
            </div>
        `;
        
        messagesContainer.appendChild(messageElement);
        this.scrollToBottom();
        
        if (!isThinking) {
            this.conversationHistory.push({
                type: 'ai',
                content: message,
                timestamp: new Date()
            });
        }
    }

    /**
     * ç§»é™¤æœ€åä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    removeLastMessage() {
        const messagesContainer = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
        const lastMessage = messagesContainer.querySelector('[data-thinking="true"]');
        if (lastMessage) {
            lastMessage.remove();
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°åº•éƒ¨
     */
    scrollToBottom() {
        const messagesContainer = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
        messagesContainer.scrollTop = messagesContainer.scrollHeight;
    }

    /**
     * å®Œæˆæ¼”ç¤º
     */
    completeDemo() {
        this.isRunning = false;
        document.getElementById('startBtn').textContent = 'âœ… æ¼”ç¤ºå®Œæˆ';
        document.getElementById('startBtn').disabled = false;
    }

    /**
     * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
     */
    resetDemo() {
        this.isRunning = false;
        this.currentStep = 0;
        this.conversationHistory = [];
        this.reportData = [];
        
        // é‡ç½®UIçŠ¶æ€
        document.getElementById('startBtn').textContent = 'ğŸ¯ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º';
        document.getElementById('startBtn').disabled = false;
        
        // æ¸…ç©ºå¯¹è¯
        const messagesContainer = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
        messagesContainer.innerHTML = `
            <div class="system-message">
                <div class="ai-avatar">ğŸ¤–</div>
                <div class="message-content">
                    <p>æ‚¨å¥½ï¼æˆ‘æ˜¯å°æ…§ï¼Œæ‚¨çš„æ™ºèƒ½æ•°æ®åˆ†æåŠ©æ‰‹ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç”¨è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€å‘æˆ‘è¯¢é—®ä»»ä½•å…³äº12345çƒ­çº¿è¿è¥æ•°æ®çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // é‡ç½®å…¶ä»–çŠ¶æ€
        this.setupInitialState();
        
        // æ¢å¤æ¨èé—®é¢˜å¡ç‰‡
        document.querySelectorAll('.question-card').forEach(card => {
            card.style.opacity = '';
            card.style.pointerEvents = '';
        });
        
        // é‡ç½®æŠ¥å‘ŠåŒºåŸŸ
        document.getElementById('reportSection').style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('reportStatus').textContent = 'å‡†å¤‡ç”Ÿæˆ...';
        document.getElementById('progressFill').style.width = '0%';
        document.getElementById('reportPreview').innerHTML = 'æŠ¥å‘Šé¢„è§ˆå°†åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ˜¾ç¤º...';
        document.getElementById('downloadBtn').disabled = true;
        document.getElementById('shareBtn').disabled = true;
        
        document.getElementById('questionInput').value = '';
        
        // æ¸…ç†å›¾è¡¨
        this.disposeCharts();
    }

    /**
     * å¯ç”¨è¾“å…¥
     */
    enableInputs() {
        document.getElementById('questionInput').disabled = false;
        document.getElementById('sendBtn').disabled = false;
    }

    /**
     * ç¦ç”¨è¾“å…¥
     */
    disableInputs() {
        document.getElementById('questionInput').disabled = true;
        document.getElementById('sendBtn').disabled = true;
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ‰€æœ‰åŒºåŸŸ
     */
    hideAllSections() {
        document.getElementById('dataDisplay').style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('reportSection').style.display = 'none';
    }

    /**
     * ä¸‹è½½æŠ¥å‘Š
     */
    downloadReport() {
        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸‹è½½
        const btn = document.getElementById('downloadBtn');
        const originalText = btn.textContent;
        
        btn.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ æ­£åœ¨ä¸‹è½½...';
        btn.disabled = true;
        
        setTimeout(() => {
            btn.textContent = 'âœ… ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ';
            setTimeout(() => {
                btn.textContent = originalText;
                btn.disabled = false;
            }, 2000);
        }, 2000);
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸‹è½½æç¤º
        this.showNotification('ğŸ’¼ PPTæŠ¥å‘Šå·²ç”Ÿæˆå¹¶å¼€å§‹ä¸‹è½½ï¼åŒ…å«å®Œæ•´çš„æ•°æ®åˆ†æå’Œæ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®ã€‚');
    }

    /**
     * åˆ†äº«æŠ¥å‘Š
     */
    shareReport() {
        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿåˆ†äº«
        const btn = document.getElementById('shareBtn');
        const originalText = btn.textContent;
        
        btn.textContent = 'ğŸ“¤ æ­£åœ¨åˆ†äº«...';
        btn.disabled = true;
        
        setTimeout(() => {
            btn.textContent = 'âœ… åˆ†äº«æˆåŠŸ';
            setTimeout(() => {
                btn.textContent = originalText;
                btn.disabled = false;
            }, 2000);
        }, 1500);
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿåˆ†äº«æç¤º
        this.showNotification('ğŸ“¤ æŠ¥å‘Šåˆ†äº«é“¾æ¥å·²ç”Ÿæˆï¼ç›¸å…³äººå‘˜å¯é€šè¿‡é“¾æ¥æŸ¥çœ‹å®Œæ•´æŠ¥å‘Šã€‚');
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºé€šçŸ¥
     */
    showNotification(message) {
        // åˆ›å»ºé€šçŸ¥å…ƒç´ 
        const notification = document.createElement('div');
        notification.style.cssText = `
            position: fixed;
            top: 100px;
            right: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 20px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            z-index: 3000;
            max-width: 300px;
            word-wrap: break-word;
            transform: translateX(100%);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        `;
        notification.textContent = message;
        
        document.body.appendChild(notification);
        
        // åŠ¨ç”»æ˜¾ç¤º
        setTimeout(() => {
            notification.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
        }, 100);
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨éšè—
        setTimeout(() => {
            notification.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.body.removeChild(notification);
            }, 300);
        }, 4000);
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹
     */
    showPoints() {
        document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay').classList.add('active');
    }

    /**
     * éšè—æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹
     */
    hidePoints() {
        document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay').classList.remove('active');
    }

    /**
     * æ¸…ç†å›¾è¡¨
     */
    disposeCharts() {
        const trendChart = echarts.getInstanceByDom(document.getElementById('trendChart'));
        const pieChart = echarts.getInstanceByDom(document.getElementById('pieChart'));
        
        if (trendChart) {
            trendChart.dispose();
        }
        if (pieChart) {
            pieChart.dispose();
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ¸²æŸ“è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾è¡¨
     */
    renderTrendChart() {
        const chartDom = document.getElementById('trendChart');
        if (!chartDom) return;
        
        const myChart = echarts.init(chartDom);
        
        const option = {
            title: {
                text: '',
                left: 'center',
                textStyle: {
                    fontSize: 14,
                    color: '#2c3e50'
                }
            },
            tooltip: {
                trigger: 'axis',
                axisPointer: {
                    type: 'cross'
                }
            },
            legend: {
                data: ['é€šè¯é‡', 'æ»¡æ„åº¦'],
                top: 20
            },
            xAxis: {
                type: 'category',
                data: ['6æœˆ3æ—¥', '6æœˆ4æ—¥', '6æœˆ5æ—¥', '6æœˆ6æ—¥', '6æœˆ7æ—¥', '6æœˆ8æ—¥', '6æœˆ9æ—¥'],
                axisLabel: {
                    color: '#6c757d',
                    fontSize: 12
                }
            },
            yAxis: [
                {
                    type: 'value',
                    name: 'é€šè¯é‡',
                    position: 'left',
                    axisLabel: {
                        formatter: '{value}',
                        color: '#6c757d'
                    }
                },
                {
                    type: 'value',
                    name: 'æ»¡æ„åº¦(%)',
                    position: 'right',
                    axisLabel: {
                        formatter: '{value}%',
                        color: '#6c757d'
                    }
                }
            ],
            series: [
                {
                    name: 'é€šè¯é‡',
                    type: 'bar',
                    yAxisIndex: 0,
                    data: [12800, 13200, 12500, 13800, 12100, 11900, 13030],
                    itemStyle: {
                        color: new echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 1, [
                            { offset: 0, color: '#667eea' },
                            { offset: 1, color: '#764ba2' }
                        ])
                    }
                },
                {
                    name: 'æ»¡æ„åº¦',
                    type: 'line',
                    yAxisIndex: 1,
                    data: [92.1, 91.8, 92.3, 91.2, 90.8, 91.0, 91.5],
                    lineStyle: {
                        color: '#27ae60',
                        width: 3
                    },
                    itemStyle: {
                        color: '#27ae60'
                    },
                    symbol: 'circle',
                    symbolSize: 6
                }
            ],
            grid: {
                left: '3%',
                right: '4%',
                bottom: '3%',
                containLabel: true
            }
        };
        
        myChart.setOption(option);
        
        // å“åº”å¼å¤„ç†
        window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
            myChart.resize();
        });
    }

    /**
     * æ¸²æŸ“é¥¼å›¾
     */
    renderPieChart() {
        const chartDom = document.getElementById('pieChart');
        if (!chartDom) return;
        
        const myChart = echarts.init(chartDom);
        
        const option = {
            title: {
                text: '',
                left: 'center',
                textStyle: {
                    fontSize: 14,
                    color: '#2c3e50'
                }
            },
            tooltip: {
                trigger: 'item',
                formatter: '{a} <br/>{b}: {c}% ({d}%)'
            },
            legend: {
                orient: 'horizontal',
                bottom: '5%',
                left: 'center',
                textStyle: {
                    color: '#6c757d'
                }
            },
            series: [
                {
                    name: 'é—®é¢˜åŸå› ',
                    type: 'pie',
                    radius: ['40%', '70%'],
                    center: ['50%', '45%'],
                    avoidLabelOverlap: false,
                    itemStyle: {
                        borderRadius: 8,
                        borderColor: '#fff',
                        borderWidth: 2
                    },
                    label: {
                        show: true,
                        position: 'outside',
                        formatter: '{b}\n{c}%',
                        fontSize: 12,
                        color: '#2c3e50'
                    },
                    emphasis: {
                        label: {
                            show: true,
                            fontSize: 14,
                            fontWeight: 'bold'
                        },
                        itemStyle: {
                            shadowBlur: 10,
                            shadowOffsetX: 0,
                            shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
                        }
                    },
                    labelLine: {
                        show: true
                    },
                    data: [
                        {
                            value: 45,
                            name: 'å¤„ç†æ—¶æ•ˆè¿‡é•¿',
                            itemStyle: {
                                color: new echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 1, 1, [
                                    { offset: 0, color: '#ff6b6b' },
                                    { offset: 1, color: '#ffa726' }
                                ])
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            value: 30,
                            name: 'è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆæ— æ•ˆ',
                            itemStyle: {
                                color: new echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 1, 1, [
                                    { offset: 0, color: '#667eea' },
                                    { offset: 1, color: '#764ba2' }
                                ])
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            value: 15,
                            name: 'æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦é—®é¢˜',
                            itemStyle: {
                                color: new echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 1, 1, [
                                    { offset: 0, color: '#f093fb' },
                                    { offset: 1, color: '#f5576c' }
                                ])
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            value: 10,
                            name: 'å…¶ä»–åŸå› ',
                            itemStyle: {
                                color: new echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 1, 1, [
                                    { offset: 0, color: '#4facfe' },
                                    { offset: 1, color: '#00f2fe' }
                                ])
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
        
        myChart.setOption(option);
        
        // å“åº”å¼å¤„ç†
        window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
            myChart.resize();
        });
    }

    /**
     * å»¶è¿Ÿå‡½æ•°
     */
    delay(ms) {
        return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
    }
}

// é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤º
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    new DataAnalysisDemo();
});

    transform: translateY(-4px) scale(1.02);

        0 8px 24px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.15),
        0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    border-color: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2);
}

.point-card:hover::before {
    opacity: 1;
}

.point-icon {
    font-size: 24px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    filter: drop-shadow(0 2px 4px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3));
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

    flex: 1;

    z-index: 1;
}

}

}

}

    transform: scale(0.95) rotate(90deg);
}

FILE: .specstory/.project.json

{
  "workspace_id": "c9c0-5dac-9b7f-c873",
  "workspace_id_at": "2025-06-06T01:32:49.180Z",
  "git_id": "8f83-0ad1-033f-0c23",
  "git_id_at": "2025-06-09T00:06:32.850Z"

================================================
FILE: .specstory/.what-is-this.md
================================================

# SpecStory Artifacts Directory
    
This directory is automatically created and maintained by the SpecStory extension to preserve your Cursor composer and chat history.
    
## What's Here?
    
- `.specstory/history`: Contains markdown files of your AI coding sessions
    - Each file represents a separate chat or composer session
    - Files are automatically updated as you work
- `.specstory/cursor_rules_backups`: Contains backups of the `.cursor/rules/derived-cursor-rules.mdc` file
    - Backups are automatically created each time the `.cursor/rules/derived-cursor-rules.mdc` file is updated
    - You can enable/disable the Cursor Rules feature in the SpecStory settings, it is disabled by default

## Valuable Uses
    
- Capture: Keep your context window up-to-date when starting new Chat/Composer sessions via @ references
- Search: For previous prompts and code snippets 
- Learn: Meta-analyze your patterns and learn from your past experiences
- Derive: Keep Cursor on course with your past decisions by automatically deriving Cursor rules from your AI interactions
    
## Version Control
    
We recommend keeping this directory under version control to maintain a history of your AI interactions. However, if you prefer not to version these files, you can exclude them by adding this to your `.gitignore`:
    
```
.specstory
```

We recommend not keeping the `.specstory/cursor_rules_backups` directory under version control if you are already using git to version the `.cursor/rules` directory, and committing regularly. You can exclude it by adding this to your `.gitignore`:

```
.specstory/cursor_rules_backups
```

## Searching Your Codebase
    
When searching your codebase in Cursor, search results may include your previous AI coding interactions. To focus solely on your actual code files, you can exclude the AI interaction history from search results.
    
To exclude AI interaction history:
    
1. Open the "Find in Files" search in Cursor (Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + F)
2. Navigate to the "files to exclude" section
3. Add the following pattern:
    
```
.specstory/*
```
    
This will ensure your searches only return results from your working codebase files.

## Notes

- Auto-save only works when Cursor/sqlite flushes data to disk. This results in a small delay after the AI response is complete before SpecStory can save the history.
- Auto-save does not yet work on remote WSL workspaces.

## Settings
    
You can control auto-saving behavior in Cursor:
    
1. Open Cursor â†’ Settings â†’ VS Code Settings (Cmd/Ctrl + ,)
2. Search for "SpecStory"
3. Find "Auto Save" setting to enable/disable
    
Auto-save occurs when changes are detected in Cursor's sqlite database, or every 2 minutes as a safety net.


================================================

================================================

+                 content: 'ä¸å®¢æ°”ã€‚æ„Ÿè°¢æ‚¨å¸®åŠ©æˆ‘ä»¬å‘ç°æœåŠ¡ä¸­çš„ä¸è¶³ï¼Œç¥æ‚¨ç”Ÿæ´»æ„‰å¿«ï¼å†è§ã€‚',
+                 delay: 2500,
+                 analysis: {
+                     originalStatus: 'å·²è§£å†³ï¼ˆæ¼æ°´åœæ­¢ï¼‰',
+                     derivedIssue: 'å¢™é¢ç»´ä¿®ï¼ˆå·²æ´¾å•ï¼‰',
+                     emotionStatus: 'æ»¡æ„ï¼Œæ„Ÿè°¢',
+                     aiDecision: 'å›è®¿åœ†æ»¡ç»“æŸ'
+                 },
+                 isLastMessage: true
+             }
+         ];
+         
+         this.init();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     init() {
+         this.bindEvents();
+         this.resetDemo();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      */
+     bindEvents() {
+         const startCallBtn = document.getElementById('startCallBtn');
+         const resetBtn = document.getElementById('resetBtn');
+         const endCallBtn = document.getElementById('endCallBtn');
+ 
+         startCallBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startCall());
+         resetBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());
+         endCallBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.endCall());
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹å›è®¿é€šè¯
+      */
+     async startCall() {
+         if (this.isCallActive) return;
+         
+         this.isCallActive = true;
+         this.currentStep = 0;
+         
+         // éšè—å·¥å•å¡ç‰‡ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºé€šè¯ç•Œé¢
+         this.hideElement('workOrderCard');
+         this.showElement('callInterface');
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€
+         this.updateWorkOrderStatus('è¿›è¡Œä¸­');
+         
+         // å¼€å§‹é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶
+         this.startCallTimer();
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°é€šè¯çŠ¶æ€
+         this.updateCallStatus('é€šè¯ä¸­');
+         
+         // å¼€å§‹å¯¹è¯æµç¨‹
+         await this.startConversation();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹å¯¹è¯æµç¨‹
+      */
+     async startConversation() {
+         for (let i = 0; i < this.conversationScript.length; i++) {
+             if (!this.isCallActive) break;
+             
+             const message = this.conversationScript[i];
+             
+             // ç­‰å¾…å»¶è¿Ÿ
+             await this.delay(message.delay);
+             
+             if (!this.isCallActive) break;
+             
+             // æ·»åŠ æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ°å¯¹è¯åŒºåŸŸ
+             this.addMessage(message);
+             
+             // æ›´æ–°AIåˆ†æ
+             this.updateAnalysis(message.analysis);
+             
+             // å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æ˜¾ç¤ºå¤„ç†æ–¹æ¡ˆ
+             if (message.showActions) {
+                 await this.delay(1000);
+                 this.showActionPanel();
+             }
+             
+             // å¦‚æœæ˜¯æœ€åä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œç»“æŸé€šè¯
+             if (message.isLastMessage) {
+                 await this.delay(2000);
+                 this.endCall();
+                 break;
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ·»åŠ æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ°å¯¹è¯åŒºåŸŸ
+      * @param {Object} message - æ¶ˆæ¯å¯¹è±¡
+      */
+     addMessage(message) {
+         const conversationArea = document.getElementById('conversationArea');
+         if (!conversationArea) return;
+ 
+         const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
+         messageDiv.className = `message ${message.type}`;
+         
+         messageDiv.innerHTML = `
+             <div class="message-sender">${message.sender}</div>
+             <div class="message-content">${message.content}</div>
+         `;
+         
+         conversationArea.appendChild(messageDiv);
+         
+         // æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°åº•éƒ¨
+         conversationArea.scrollTop = conversationArea.scrollHeight;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°AIåˆ†æé¢æ¿
+      * @param {Object} analysis - åˆ†ææ•°æ®
+      */
+     updateAnalysis(analysis) {
+         const elements = {
+             originalStatus: document.getElementById('originalStatus'),
+             derivedIssue: document.getElementById('derivedIssue'),
+             emotionStatus: document.getElementById('emotionStatus'),
+             aiDecision: document.getElementById('aiDecision')
+         };
+ 
+         Object.keys(analysis).forEach(key => {
+             const element = elements[key];
+             if (element) {
+                 // æ·»åŠ æ›´æ–°åŠ¨ç”»
+                 element.className = 'analysis-value updating';
+                 
+                 setTimeout(() => {
+                     element.textContent = analysis[key];
+                     element.className = 'analysis-value completed';
+                 }, 500);
+             }
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºå¤„ç†æ–¹æ¡ˆé¢æ¿
+      */
+     showActionPanel() {
+         const actionPanel = document.getElementById('actionPanel');
+         if (actionPanel) {
+             actionPanel.style.display = 'block';
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶å™¨
+      */
+     startCallTimer() {
+         this.callTimer = 0;
+         this.timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
+             this.callTimer++;
+             this.updateCallTimer();
+         }, 1000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶å™¨æ˜¾ç¤º
+      */
+     updateCallTimer() {
+         const timerElement = document.getElementById('callTimer');
+         if (timerElement) {
+             const minutes = Math.floor(this.callTimer / 60);
+             const seconds = this.callTimer % 60;
+             timerElement.textContent = `${minutes.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°é€šè¯çŠ¶æ€
+      * @param {string} status - çŠ¶æ€æ–‡æœ¬
+      */
+     updateCallStatus(status) {
+         const statusElement = document.getElementById('callStatus');
+         if (statusElement) {
+             statusElement.textContent = status;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€
+      * @param {string} status - çŠ¶æ€æ–‡æœ¬
+      */
+     updateWorkOrderStatus(status) {
+         const badge = document.querySelector('.status-badge');
+         if (badge) {
+             badge.textContent = status;
+             badge.className = 'status-badge ' + (status === 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­' ? 'active' : 'pending');
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»“æŸé€šè¯
+      */
+     async endCall() {
+         this.isCallActive = false;
+         
+         // åœæ­¢è®¡æ—¶å™¨
+         if (this.timerInterval) {
+             clearInterval(this.timerInterval);
+             this.timerInterval = null;
+         }
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°é€šè¯çŠ¶æ€
+         this.updateCallStatus('é€šè¯ç»“æŸ');
+         
+         // ç­‰å¾…ä¸€ä¸‹å†æ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœ
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         
+         // éšè—é€šè¯ç•Œé¢ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœ
+         this.hideElement('callInterface');
+         this.showElement('resultPanel');
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€
+         this.updateWorkOrderStatus('å·²å®Œæˆ');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     resetDemo() {
+         // åœæ­¢é€šè¯
+         this.isCallActive = false;
+         if (this.timerInterval) {
+             clearInterval(this.timerInterval);
+             this.timerInterval = null;
+         }
+         
+         // é‡ç½®çŠ¶æ€
+         this.currentStep = 0;
+         this.callTimer = 0;
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºå·¥å•å¡ç‰‡ï¼Œéšè—å…¶ä»–é¢æ¿
+         this.showElement('workOrderCard');
+         this.hideElement('callInterface');
+         this.hideElement('resultPanel');
+         
+         // é‡ç½®å·¥å•çŠ¶æ€
+         this.updateWorkOrderStatus('å¾…å›è®¿');
+         
+         // æ¸…ç©ºå¯¹è¯åŒºåŸŸ
+         const conversationArea = document.getElementById('conversationArea');
+         if (conversationArea) {
+             conversationArea.innerHTML = '';
+         }
+         
+         // é‡ç½®åˆ†æé¢æ¿
+         this.resetAnalysisPanel();
+         
+         // éšè—å¤„ç†æ–¹æ¡ˆé¢æ¿
+         const actionPanel = document.getElementById('actionPanel');
+         if (actionPanel) {
+             actionPanel.style.display = 'none';
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®åˆ†æé¢æ¿
+      */
+     resetAnalysisPanel() {
+         const analysisElements = [
+             'originalStatus',
+             'derivedIssue', 
+             'emotionStatus',
+             'aiDecision'
+         ];
+         
+         analysisElements.forEach(id => {
+             const element = document.getElementById(id);
+             if (element) {
+                 element.textContent = 'åˆ†æä¸­...';
+                 element.className = 'analysis-value';
+             }
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºå…ƒç´ 
+      * @param {string} elementId - å…ƒç´ ID
+      */
+     showElement(elementId) {
+         const element = document.getElementById(elementId);
+         if (element) {
+             element.style.display = 'block';
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * éšè—å…ƒç´ 
+      * @param {string} elementId - å…ƒç´ ID
+      */
+     hideElement(elementId) {
+         const element = document.getElementById(elementId);
+         if (element) {
+             element.style.display = 'none';
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å»¶è¿Ÿå‡½æ•°
+      * @param {number} ms - å»¶è¿Ÿæ¯«ç§’æ•°
+      * @returns {Promise}
+      */
+     delay(ms) {
+         return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤º
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     new AICallbackDemo();
+ });
+ 
+ // æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›é¢å¤–çš„äº¤äº’æ•ˆæœ
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     // ä¸ºæŒ‰é’®æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»æ³¢çº¹æ•ˆæœ
+     const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.btn-primary, .btn-secondary');
+     buttons.forEach(button => {
+         button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
+             const ripple = document.createElement('span');
+             const rect = this.getBoundingClientRect();
+             const size = Math.max(rect.width, rect.height);
+             const x = e.clientX - rect.left - size / 2;
+             const y = e.clientY - rect.top - size / 2;
+             
+             ripple.style.cssText = `
+                 position: absolute;
+                 width: ${size}px;
+                 height: ${size}px;
+                 left: ${x}px;
+                 top: ${y}px;
+                 background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
+                 border-radius: 50%;
+                 transform: scale(0);
+                 animation: ripple 0.6s ease-out;
+                 pointer-events: none;
+             `;
+             
+             this.appendChild(ripple);
+             
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 ripple.remove();
+             }, 600);
+         });
+     });
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ CSSåŠ¨ç”»
+     const style = document.createElement('style');
+     style.textContent = `
+         @keyframes ripple {
+             to {
+                 transform: scale(2);
+                 opacity: 0;
+             }
+         }
+         
+         .btn-primary, .btn-secondary {
+             position: relative;
+             overflow: hidden;
+         }
+     `;
+     document.head.appendChild(style);
+ });
+ 
```

---

å®Œç¾ï¼æˆ‘å·²ç»ä¸ºæ‚¨é‡æ–°åˆ›å»ºäº†å®Œæ•´çš„JavaScriptè„šæœ¬ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªè„šæœ¬å®ç°äº†AIæ™ºèƒ½å›è®¿æ¼”ç¤ºçš„æ‰€æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

## ğŸ¯ **æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§**

### **1. å®Œæ•´çš„å¯¹è¯æµç¨‹**
- **13è½®å®Œæ•´å¯¹è¯**ï¼šä»å¼€åœºç™½åˆ°ç»“æŸè¯­ï¼Œå®Œå…¨è¿˜åŸåœºæ™¯æè¿°
- **çœŸå®çš„æ—¶é—´å»¶è¿Ÿ**ï¼šæ¯æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯éƒ½æœ‰åˆç†çš„å»¶è¿Ÿï¼Œæ¨¡æ‹ŸçœŸå®é€šè¯èŠ‚å¥
- **åŒå‘å¯¹è¯**ï¼šAIæœºå™¨äººå’Œå¸‚æ°‘æå¥³å£«çš„å®Œæ•´äº¤äº’

### **2. å®æ—¶AIåˆ†æ**
- **å››ç»´åº¦åˆ†æ**ï¼šåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çŠ¶æ€ã€è¡ç”Ÿé—®é¢˜è¯†åˆ«ã€å¸‚æ°‘æƒ…ç»ªã€AIå†³ç­–å»ºè®®
- **åŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–°**ï¼šæ¯æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯åå®æ—¶æ›´æ–°åˆ†æç»“æœ
- **è§†è§‰åé¦ˆ**ï¼šæ›´æ–°æ—¶çš„åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœï¼Œå®Œæˆæ—¶çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–

### **3. æ™ºèƒ½å¤„ç†å±•ç¤º**
- **å…³é”®èŠ‚ç‚¹è§¦å‘**ï¼šå½“è¯†åˆ«åˆ°è¡ç”Ÿé—®é¢˜æ—¶ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ˜¾ç¤ºå¤„ç†æ–¹æ¡ˆ
- **ä¸‰æ­¥å¤„ç†æµç¨‹**ï¼šé‡æ–°æ¿€æ´»å·¥å• â†’ åˆ›å»ºç»´ä¿®ä»»åŠ¡ â†’ æ´¾å‘è‡³éƒ¨é—¨
- **å³æ—¶åé¦ˆ**ï¼šå±•ç¤ºAIçš„å†³ç­–å’Œæ‰§è¡Œèƒ½åŠ›

### **4. å®Œæ•´çš„äº¤äº’ä½“éªŒ**
- **é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶å™¨**ï¼šå®æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºé€šè¯æ—¶é•¿
- **çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†**ï¼šå·¥å•çŠ¶æ€ä»"å¾…å›è®¿"â†’"è¿›è¡Œä¸­"â†’"å·²å®Œæˆ"
- **ç•Œé¢åˆ‡æ¢**ï¼šå·¥å•å¡ç‰‡ â†’ é€šè¯ç•Œé¢ â†’ ç»“æœå±•ç¤ºçš„æµç•…åˆ‡æ¢

### **5. ç”¨æˆ·æ§åˆ¶åŠŸèƒ½**
- **å¼€å§‹å›è®¿**ï¼šä¸€é”®å¯åŠ¨å®Œæ•´æ¼”ç¤ºæµç¨‹
- **é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º**ï¼šéšæ—¶é‡ç½®åˆ°åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€
- **ç»“æŸé€šè¯**ï¼šå¯æ‰‹åŠ¨ç»“æŸï¼ˆä¹Ÿä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç»“æŸï¼‰

### **6. å¢å¼ºçš„è§†è§‰æ•ˆæœ**
- **æŒ‰é’®æ³¢çº¹æ•ˆæœ**ï¼šç‚¹å‡»æ—¶çš„Material Designé£æ ¼æ³¢çº¹
- **æ¶ˆæ¯åŠ¨ç”»**ï¼šå¯¹è¯æ¶ˆæ¯çš„æ»‘å…¥åŠ¨ç”»
- **åˆ†ææ›´æ–°åŠ¨ç”»**ï¼šAIåˆ†æç»“æœçš„æ›´æ–°åŠ¨ç”»

## ğŸš€ **æ¼”ç¤ºäº®ç‚¹**

1. **ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–å¼€åœº**ï¼šç›´æ¥æåŠå…·ä½“äº‹ä»¶å’Œå¤„ç†èŠ‚ç‚¹
2. **æ·±åº¦æŒ–æ˜**ï¼šä»"ä¸å¤ªæ»¡æ„"è¿½é—®åˆ°å…·ä½“åŸå› 
3. **æ™ºèƒ½è¯†åˆ«**ï¼šå‡†ç¡®æç‚¼"å¢™é¢ç»´ä¿®"è¿™ä¸€è¡ç”Ÿé—®é¢˜
4. **å³æ—¶å¤„ç†**ï¼šé€šè¯ä¸­å®Œæˆæ–°ä»»åŠ¡åˆ›å»ºå’Œæ´¾å‘
5. **æƒ…ç»ªè½¬åŒ–**ï¼šå°†è´Ÿé¢åé¦ˆè½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæœåŠ¡æå‡æœºä¼š

è¿™ä¸ªæ¼”ç¤ºå®Œç¾å±•ç°äº†AIå›è®¿æœºå™¨äººå¦‚ä½•è¿›è¡Œ**è¶…è¶Šç®€å•æ»¡æ„åº¦è°ƒæŸ¥çš„æ·±åº¦æ™ºèƒ½å›è®¿**ï¼Œä½“ç°äº†AIåœ¨æ”¿åŠ¡æœåŠ¡ä¸­çš„æ™ºèƒ½åŒ–åº”ç”¨ä»·å€¼ã€‚

æ‚¨ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥æ‰“å¼€ `CJ_3/index.html` æ¥ä½“éªŒå®Œæ•´çš„æ¼”ç¤ºæ•ˆæœï¼

æˆ‘éœ€è¦ä¸Šé¢çš„å¯¹è¯çª—å£å’Œä¸‹é¢çš„aiåˆ†æçª—å£å¯ä»¥å·¦å³æ”¾ç½®ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥çœ‹æ¸…åˆ†æè¿‡ç¨‹

æˆ‘æ¥ä¿®æ”¹CSSæ ·å¼ï¼Œå°†é€šè¯ç•Œé¢å’ŒAIåˆ†æé¢æ¿æ”¹ä¸ºå·¦å³å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥æ›´å¥½åœ°è§‚å¯ŸAIåˆ†æè¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

å®Œç¾ï¼æˆ‘å·²ç»å®Œæˆäº†å¸ƒå±€ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œç°åœ¨é€šè¯ç•Œé¢å’ŒAIåˆ†æé¢æ¿é‡‡ç”¨å·¦å³å¸ƒå±€ã€‚ä¸»è¦æ”¹è¿›åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

## ğŸ¯ **å¸ƒå±€ä¼˜åŒ–äº®ç‚¹**

### **1. å·¦å³åˆ†æ å¸ƒå±€**
- **é€šè¯ç•Œé¢**ï¼šå æ®å·¦ä¾§ 1.2 å€ç©ºé—´ï¼Œæ›´å®½æ•çš„å¯¹è¯æ˜¾ç¤º
- **AIåˆ†æé¢æ¿**ï¼šå æ®å³ä¾§ 0.8 å€ç©ºé—´ï¼Œç´§å‡‘ä½†æ¸…æ™°çš„åˆ†æå±•ç¤º
- **å¯¹é½æ–¹å¼**ï¼šé¡¶éƒ¨å¯¹é½ï¼Œç¡®ä¿è§†è§‰åè°ƒ

### **2. å¢å¼ºçš„AIåˆ†æé¢æ¿**
- **ç²˜æ€§å®šä½**ï¼šåˆ†æé¢æ¿ä¼šè·Ÿéšæ»šåŠ¨ï¼Œå§‹ç»ˆå¯è§
- **åŠ¨æ€æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨**ï¼šé¢æ¿å¤´éƒ¨æœ‰æ¸å˜è¿›åº¦æ¡ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ†ææ´»è·ƒçŠ¶æ€
- **æ›´æ–°åŠ¨ç”»**ï¼šåˆ†æé¡¹ç›®æœ‰æ‚¬åœæ•ˆæœå’Œæ›´æ˜æ˜¾çš„æ›´æ–°åŠ¨ç”»
- **åŠ è½½æŒ‡ç¤º**ï¼šæ›´æ–°æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ¨æ€ç‚¹ç‚¹ç‚¹æ•ˆæœ

### **3. ä¼˜åŒ–çš„é€šè¯ç•Œé¢**
- **æ›´å¤§å¯¹è¯åŒºåŸŸ**ï¼šå¯¹è¯çª—å£ä» 300-400px å¢åŠ åˆ° 350-450px
- **é€‚åº”æ€§é«˜åº¦**ï¼šæ‰‹æœºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿå™¨æœ€å°é«˜åº¦ 600pxï¼Œç¡®ä¿å†…å®¹å®Œæ•´æ˜¾ç¤º
- **æ›´å¥½çš„æ»šåŠ¨ä½“éªŒ**ï¼šå¯¹è¯è‡ªåŠ¨æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°æœ€æ–°æ¶ˆæ¯

### **4. å“åº”å¼é€‚é…**
- **å¤§å±å¹•**ï¼šå·¦å³å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œæœ€ä½³è§‚å¯Ÿä½“éªŒ
- **ä¸­ç­‰å±å¹•**ï¼ˆ1024pxä»¥ä¸‹ï¼‰ï¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºä¸Šä¸‹å¸ƒå±€
- **å°å±å¹•**ï¼ˆ768pxä»¥ä¸‹ï¼‰ï¼šç´§å‡‘çš„ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯å¸ƒå±€

### **5. è§†è§‰å¢å¼º**

+                             <div class="event-content">
+                                 <span class="agent-tag">å°å¼ (010)</span>
+                                 <span class="event-text positive">è·å¾—ä¼˜ç§€æœåŠ¡æ ‡è®°</span>
+                             </div>
+                         </div>
+                         <div class="event-item">
+                             <div class="event-time">14:20</div>
+                             <div class="event-content">
+                                 <span class="agent-tag">å°æ(009)</span>
+                                 <span class="event-text warning">è¯­é€Ÿè¿‡å¿«æé†’</span>
+                             </div>
+                         </div>
+                     </div>
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+         </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- è´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘Šæ¨¡æ€æ¡† -->
+     <div class="modal-overlay" id="reportModal" style="display: none;">
+         <div class="modal-content quality-report">
+             <div class="modal-header">
+                 <h3>ğŸ“Š é€šè¯è´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘Š</h3>
+                 <button class="close-btn" id="closeReportModal">Ã—</button>
+             </div>
+             <div class="modal-body" id="reportContent">
+                 <!-- æŠ¥å‘Šå†…å®¹å°†é€šè¿‡JavaScriptç”Ÿæˆ -->
+             </div>
+             <div class="modal-footer">
+                 <button class="btn-primary" id="exportReportBtn">ğŸ“¤ å¯¼å‡ºæŠ¥å‘Š</button>
+                 <button class="btn-secondary" id="closeReportBtn">å…³é—­</button>
+             </div>
+         </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- æ•°æ®æµåŠ¨ç”»å®¹å™¨ -->
+     <div class="data-flow-container" id="dataFlowContainer"></div>
+ 
+     <script src="script.js"></script>
+ </body>
+ </html>
+ 
```

---
