```diff
+     box-shadow: 0 20px 60px var(--shadow-dark);
+     animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;
+ }
+ 
+ .quality-report {
+     width: 700px;
+ }
+ 
+ .modal-header {
+     background: var(--button-gradient);
+     color: white;
+     padding: 20px;
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: space-between;
+     align-items: center;
+ }
+ 
+ .modal-header h3 {
+     margin: 0;
+ }
+ 
+ .close-btn {
+     background: none;
+     border: none;
+     color: white;
+     font-size: 24px;
+     cursor: pointer;
+     padding: 5px;
+     border-radius: 50%;
+     transition: all 0.3s ease;
+ }
+ 
+ .close-btn:hover {
+     background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
+ }
+ 
+ .modal-body {
+     padding: 30px;
+     max-height: 60vh;
+     overflow-y: auto;
+ }
+ 
+ .modal-footer {
+     padding: 20px 30px;
+     background: var(--bg-light);
+     display: flex;
+     gap: 12px;
+     justify-content: flex-end;
+ }
+ 
+ /* æ•°æ®æµåŠ¨ç”»å®¹å™¨ */
+ .data-flow-container {
+     position: fixed;
+     top: 0;
+     left: 0;
+     width: 100%;
+     height: 100%;
+     pointer-events: none;
+     z-index: 100;
+ }
+ 
+ .data-particle {
+     position: absolute;
+     width: 6px;
+     height: 6px;
+     background: #667eea;
+     border-radius: 50%;
+     animation: dataFlow 3s linear infinite;
+     opacity: 0.8;
+ }
+ 
+ @keyframes dataFlow {
+     0% {
+         opacity: 0;
+         transform: scale(0);
+     }
+     10% {
+         opacity: 1;
+         transform: scale(1);
+     }
+     90% {
+         opacity: 1;
+         transform: scale(1);
+     }
+     100% {
+         opacity: 0;
+         transform: scale(0);
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ /* å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡ */
+ @media (max-width: 1200px) {
+     .demo-container {
+         flex-direction: column;
+         height: auto;
+         overflow-y: auto;
+     }
+     
+     .left-panel, .center-panel, .right-panel {
+         max-width: none;
+         flex: none;
+         height: auto;
+         min-height: 400px;
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+     .control-row {
+         flex-direction: column;
+         gap: 10px;
+     }
+     
+     .demo-title {
+         font-size: var(--font-large);
+     }
+     
+     .control-buttons {
+         justify-content: center;
+     }
+     
+     .demo-container {
+         padding: 0 10px 10px;
+         gap: 10px;
+     }
+     
+     .quality-report {
+         width: 95%;
+         margin: 20px;
+     }
+ }
+ 
```

---

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘æ¥åˆ›å»ºJavaScriptè„šæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå®ç°æ¼”ç¤ºåœºæ™¯çš„äº¤äº’é€»è¾‘ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ /**
+  * AIå®æ—¶è´¨æ£€æ•™ç»ƒç³»ç»Ÿæ¼”ç¤ºè„šæœ¬
+  * å®ç°é€šè¯æ¨¡æ‹Ÿã€å®æ—¶è´¨æ£€æé†’ã€è´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆç­‰åŠŸèƒ½
+  */
+ 
+ class QualityCoachDemo {
+     constructor() {
+         this.isRunning = false;
+         this.currentStep = 0;
+         this.callStartTime = null;
+         this.callTimer = null;
+         this.qualityAlerts = [];
+         this.positiveMarks = [];
+         this.violations = [];
+         
+         this.init();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ
+      */
+     init() {
+         this.bindEvents();
+         this.setupInitialState();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      */
+     bindEvents() {
+         // æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
+         document.getElementById('startDemo').addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo());
+         document.getElementById('pauseDemo').addEventListener('click', () => this.pauseDemo());
+         document.getElementById('resetDemo').addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());
+         document.getElementById('generateReport').addEventListener('click', () => this.generateQualityReport());
+         
+         // é€šè¯æ§åˆ¶äº‹ä»¶
+         document.getElementById('answerBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.answerCall());
+         document.getElementById('hangupBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.hangupCall());
+         
+         // æ¨¡æ€æ¡†äº‹ä»¶
+         document.getElementById('closeReportModal').addEventListener('click', () => this.closeReportModal());
+         document.getElementById('closeReportBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.closeReportModal());
+         document.getElementById('exportReportBtn').addEventListener('click', () => this.exportReport());
+         
+         // ç‚¹å‡»æ¨¡æ€æ¡†å¤–éƒ¨å…³é—­
+         document.getElementById('reportModal').addEventListener('click', (e) => {
+             if (e.target.id === 'reportModal') {
+                 this.closeReportModal();
+             }
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€
+      */
+     setupInitialState() {
+         this.updateAgentStatus('å¾…æœºä¸­');
+         this.updateQualityStatus('å¾…æœº');
+         this.updateCallTime('00:00');
+         this.resetQualityIndicator();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     async startDemo() {
+         if (this.isRunning) return;
+         
+         this.isRunning = true;
+         this.currentStep = 0;
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
+         document.getElementById('startDemo').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('pauseDemo').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         document.getElementById('resetDemo').disabled = true;
+         
+         // å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤ºæµç¨‹
+         await this.runDemoSequence();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æš‚åœæ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     pauseDemo() {
+         this.isRunning = false;
+         document.getElementById('startDemo').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         document.getElementById('pauseDemo').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('resetDemo').disabled = false;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     resetDemo() {
+         this.isRunning = false;
+         this.currentStep = 0;
+         
+         // é‡ç½®æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®
+         document.getElementById('startDemo').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         document.getElementById('pauseDemo').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('generateReport').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('resetDemo').disabled = false;
+         
+         // åœæ­¢é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶å™¨
+         if (this.callTimer) {
+             clearInterval(this.callTimer);
+             this.callTimer = null;
+         }
+         
+         // é‡ç½®ç•Œé¢çŠ¶æ€
+         this.setupInitialState();
+         this.clearConversation();
+         this.clearQualityAlerts();
+         this.resetMetrics();
+         this.resetComplianceChecklist();
+         this.updateHints('å‡†å¤‡æ¥å¬å¸‚æ°‘æ¥ç”µ...');
+         
+         // é‡ç½®æ•°æ®
+         this.qualityAlerts = [];
+         this.positiveMarks = [];
+         this.violations = [];
+         this.callStartTime = null;
+         
+         // é‡ç½®é€šè¯æŒ‰é’®
+         document.getElementById('answerBtn').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         document.getElementById('hangupBtn').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('recordingIndicator').style.display = 'none';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è¿è¡Œæ¼”ç¤ºåºåˆ—
+      */
+     async runDemoSequence() {
+         // æ¼”ç¤ºåœºæ™¯æ­¥éª¤
+         const demoSteps = [
+             () => this.step1_PrepareCall(),
+             () => this.step2_StartCall(),
+             () => this.step3_OpeningViolation(),
+             () => this.step4_ImproperLanguage(),
+             () => this.step5_SpeechAnalysis(),
+             () => this.step6_PositiveBehavior(),
+             () => this.step7_EndCall()
+         ];
+ 
+         for (let i = 0; i < demoSteps.length; i++) {
+             if (!this.isRunning) break;
+             
+             this.currentStep = i;
+             await demoSteps[i]();
+             
+             // æ­¥éª¤é—´æš‚åœ
+             if (i < demoSteps.length - 1) {
+                 await this.delay(2000);
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤1: å‡†å¤‡æ¥å¬ç”µè¯
+      */
+     async step1_PrepareCall() {
+         this.updateAgentStatus('æœ‰æ¥ç”µ');
+         this.updateHints('æœ‰å¸‚æ°‘æ¥ç”µï¼Œå‡†å¤‡æ¥å¬...');
+         
+         // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ¥ç”µé“ƒå£°æ•ˆæœ
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         
+         // è‡ªåŠ¨ç‚¹å‡»æ¥å¬
+         this.answerCall();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤2: å¼€å§‹é€šè¯
+      */
+     async step2_StartCall() {
+         this.updateAgentStatus('é€šè¯ä¸­');
+         this.updateQualityStatus('ç›‘æ§ä¸­');
+         this.updateHints('å¼€å§‹è´¨æ£€ç›‘æ§ï¼Œæ³¨æ„å¼€åœºç™½è§„èŒƒ...');
+         
+         // å¼€å§‹å½•éŸ³æŒ‡ç¤º
+         document.getElementById('recordingIndicator').style.display = 'flex';
+         
+         await this.delay(1000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤3: å¼€åœºç™½è¿è§„æé†’
+      */
+     async step3_OpeningViolation() {
+         // åå¸­è¯´äº†ä¸è§„èŒƒçš„å¼€åœºç™½
+         this.addMessage('agent', 'å–‚ï¼Œæ‚¨å¥½ã€‚');
+         
+         await this.delay(500);
+         
+         // AIå®æ—¶æé†’
+         this.showQualityAlert('warning', 'ğŸ’¡ æé†’ï¼šç¼ºå°‘æ ‡å‡†å¼€åœºç™½ï¼ˆé—®å€™+æŠ¥å·ï¼‰ã€‚');
+         this.setQualityIndicator('warning', 'âš ï¸', 'éœ€è¦çº æ­£');
+         this.updateViolation('å¼€åœºç™½ä¸åˆè§„', '00:05');
+         
+         await this.delay(1500);
+         
+         // åå¸­ç«‹å³çº æ­£
+         this.addMessage('agent', 'å“¦ï¼Œä¸å¥½æ„æ€ã€‚æ‚¨å¥½ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œæ˜¯12345çƒ­çº¿ï¼Œå·¥å·008å·å°ç‹ä¸ºæ‚¨æœåŠ¡ã€‚è¯·é—®æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥å¸®æ‚¨ï¼Ÿ');
+         this.updateComplianceItem('æ ‡å‡†å¼€åœºç™½', 'completed');
+         
+         // æ¸…é™¤è­¦å‘ŠçŠ¶æ€
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         this.setQualityIndicator('normal', 'âœ…', 'æœåŠ¡æ­£å¸¸');
+         this.updateHints('å¼€åœºç™½å·²çº æ­£ï¼Œç»§ç»­ç›‘æ§...');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤4: ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­ç›‘æµ‹
+      */
+     async step4_ImproperLanguage() {
+         // å¸‚æ°‘é—®é¢˜
+         this.addMessage('citizen', 'æˆ‘çš„åŒ»ä¿å¡å¥½åƒå‡ºé—®é¢˜äº†ï¼Œä¸Šå‘¨å»è¯åº—ä¹°è¯ï¼Œæ€ä¹ˆåˆ·éƒ½åˆ·ä¸äº†ï¼');
+         
+         await this.delay(1500);
+         
+         // åå¸­ä½¿ç”¨ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­
+         const agentMessage = 'åŒ»ä¿å¡åˆ·ä¸äº†å•Šâ€¦ <span class="highlight">ä½ å¿…é¡»</span>å¸¦ä¸Šèº«ä»½è¯å’ŒåŒ»ä¿å¡ï¼Œå»æœ€è¿‘çš„ç¤¾ä¿ä¸­å¿ƒæŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚';
+         this.addMessage('agent', agentMessage, true);
+         
+         await this.delay(800);
+         
+         // AIæé†’ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­
+         this.showQualityAlert('warning', 'âš ï¸ ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­ï¼š"ä½ å¿…é¡»â€¦"ã€‚å»ºè®®æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºï¼š"æˆ‘ä»¬å»ºè®®æ‚¨â€¦"æˆ–"æ‚¨éœ€è¦â€¦"ã€‚');
+         this.updateViolation('ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­ï¼š"ä½ å¿…é¡»"', '01:15');
+         this.updateComplianceItem('æœåŠ¡ç”¨è¯­è§„èŒƒ', 'failed');
+         
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         this.updateHints('æ£€æµ‹åˆ°ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨æ›´æ¸©å’Œçš„è¡¨è¾¾...');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤5: è¯­éŸ³ç‰¹å¾åˆ†æ
+      */
+     async step5_SpeechAnalysis() {
+         // å¸‚æ°‘å›å¤
+         this.addMessage('citizen', 'ç¤¾ä¿ä¸­å¿ƒï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥é“åœ¨å“ªå•Šï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™é™„è¿‘æœ‰å—ï¼Ÿæˆ‘å¹´çºªå¤§äº†ï¼Œè·‘ä¸€è¶Ÿä¸æ–¹ä¾¿ã€‚');
+         
+         await this.delay(1500);
+         
+         // åå¸­è¯­é€Ÿè¿‡å¿«
+         this.addMessage('agent', 'æ‚¨åœ¨å“ªä¸ªåŒºæˆ‘å¸®æ‚¨æŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹æœ€è¿‘çš„åœ°å€å’Œä¸Šç­æ—¶é—´å¾ˆå¿«çš„ã€‚');
+         
+         // å®æ—¶æ›´æ–°è¯­éŸ³åˆ†ææ•°æ®
+         this.updateMetrics({
+             speechRate: '180 å­—/åˆ†é’Ÿ',
+             volume: '65 dB',
+             tone: 'åå¿«'
+         });
+         
+         this.updateEmotion('agent', 'ğŸ˜¤ æ€¥èº');
+         this.updateEmotion('citizen', 'ğŸ˜• å›°æƒ‘');
+         
+         await this.delay(800);
+         
+         // AIæé†’è¯­é€Ÿé—®é¢˜
+         this.showQualityAlert('warning', 'ğŸ’¨ è¯­é€Ÿç¨å¿«ï¼Œå»ºè®®æ”¾æ…¢ï¼Œå¹¶è€å¿ƒè§£é‡Šã€‚');
+         this.updateViolation('è¯­é€Ÿè¿‡å¿«', '01:45');
+         
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         this.updateHints('è¯­é€Ÿåˆ†æï¼šå½“å‰180å­—/åˆ†é’Ÿï¼Œå»ºè®®æ§åˆ¶åœ¨120-150å­—/åˆ†é’Ÿ...');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤6: ä¼˜ç§€æœåŠ¡è¡Œä¸º
+      */
+     async step6_PositiveBehavior() {
+         // åå¸­è°ƒæ•´æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦
+         this.addMessage('agent', 'å¥½çš„é˜¿å§¨ï¼Œæ‚¨åˆ«ç€æ€¥ã€‚æˆ‘æ”¾æ…¢ç‚¹è¯´ã€‚æ‚¨åªè¦å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘æ‚¨å¤§æ¦‚åœ¨å“ªä¸ªè¡—é“ï¼Œæˆ‘å°±èƒ½å¸®æ‚¨æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€è¿‘ã€æœ€æ–¹ä¾¿çš„ç¤¾ä¿ä¸­å¿ƒï¼Œè¿˜ä¼šå‘Šè¯‰æ‚¨ä»–ä»¬çš„å·¥ä½œæ—¶é—´ï¼Œç¡®ä¿æ‚¨ä¸ç”¨ç™½è·‘ä¸€è¶Ÿã€‚');
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°è¯­éŸ³åˆ†æ
+         this.updateMetrics({
+             speechRate: '140 å­—/åˆ†é’Ÿ',
+             volume: '58 dB',
+             tone: 'æ¸©å’Œ'
+         });
+         
+         this.updateEmotion('agent', 'ğŸ˜Š è€å¿ƒ');
+         this.updateEmotion('citizen', 'ğŸ˜Œ å®‰å¿ƒ');
+         
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         
+         // AIæ ‡è®°ä¼˜ç§€è¡Œä¸º
+         this.showQualityAlert('success', 'ğŸ‘ ä¼˜ç§€è¡Œä¸ºï¼šä¸»åŠ¨å®‰æŠšï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›äº†æ¸…æ™°ã€å¢å€¼çš„æœåŠ¡æ‰¿è¯ºã€‚');
+         this.setQualityIndicator('normal', 'âœ…', 'æœåŠ¡æ­£å¸¸');
+         this.updatePositiveMark('ä¸»åŠ¨å®‰æŠšå¹¶æä¾›å¢å€¼æœåŠ¡', '02:10');
+         this.updateComplianceItem('æœåŠ¡ç”¨è¯­è§„èŒƒ', 'completed');
+         
+         // åœ¨ç­é•¿ç«¯æ˜¾ç¤ºä¼˜ç§€æ ‡è®°
+         this.showSupervisorAlert('å°ç‹(008)', 'positive', 'è·å¾—ä¼˜ç§€æœåŠ¡æ ‡è®°');
+         
+         await this.delay(1500);
+         this.updateHints('æ£€æµ‹åˆ°ä¼˜ç§€æœåŠ¡è¡Œä¸ºï¼Œå·²æ ‡è®°ä¸ºåŸ¹è®­æ¡ˆä¾‹...');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ­¥éª¤7: ç»“æŸé€šè¯
+      */
+     async step7_EndCall() {
+         // ç»§ç»­å¯¹è¯æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
+         this.addMessage('citizen', 'å¥½çš„ï¼Œè°¢è°¢æ‚¨ï¼æˆ‘åœ¨æœé˜³åŒºå»ºå›½é—¨é™„è¿‘ã€‚');
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         
+         this.addMessage('agent', 'å¥½çš„é˜¿å§¨ï¼Œå»ºå›½é—¨è¿™è¾¹æœ€è¿‘çš„æ˜¯æœé˜³åŒºç¤¾ä¿ä¸­å¿ƒï¼Œåœ°å€æ˜¯å»ºå›½é—¨å¤–å¤§è¡—ã€‚å·¥ä½œæ—¶é—´æ˜¯å‘¨ä¸€åˆ°å‘¨äº”ä¸Šåˆ9ç‚¹åˆ°ä¸‹åˆ5ç‚¹ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ååœ°é“1å·çº¿åˆ°å»ºå›½é—¨ç«™ï¼ŒAå£å‡ºæ¥å°±æ˜¯ã€‚');
+         await this.delay(1500);
+         
+         this.addMessage('citizen', 'å¤ªå¥½äº†ï¼Œè°¢è°¢å°ç‹ï¼ä½ ä»¬æœåŠ¡çœŸå¥½ã€‚');
+         await this.delay(1000);
+         
+         this.addMessage('agent', 'ä¸å®¢æ°”é˜¿å§¨ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘åº”è¯¥åšçš„ã€‚è¿˜æœ‰å…¶ä»–é—®é¢˜å¯ä»¥éšæ—¶è”ç³»æˆ‘ä»¬12345çƒ­çº¿ã€‚ç¥æ‚¨ç”Ÿæ´»æ„‰å¿«ï¼');
+         
+         this.updateComplianceItem('é—®é¢˜è§£ç­”å®Œæ•´', 'completed');
+         
+         await this.delay(2000);
+         
+         // è‡ªåŠ¨æŒ‚æ–­
+         this.hangupCall();
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºè´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘ŠæŒ‰é’®
+         document.getElementById('generateReport').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         this.updateHints('é€šè¯ç»“æŸï¼Œå¯ç”Ÿæˆè´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘Šè¿›è¡Œå¤ç›˜...');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ¥å¬ç”µè¯
+      */
+     answerCall() {
+         document.getElementById('answerBtn').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('hangupBtn').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         
+         // å¼€å§‹é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶
+         this.callStartTime = new Date();
+         this.startCallTimer();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æŒ‚æ–­ç”µè¯
+      */
+     hangupCall() {
+         document.getElementById('answerBtn').style.display = 'inline-block';
+         document.getElementById('hangupBtn').style.display = 'none';
+         document.getElementById('recordingIndicator').style.display = 'none';
+         
+         // åœæ­¢é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶
+         if (this.callTimer) {
+             clearInterval(this.callTimer);
+             this.callTimer = null;
+         }
+         
+         this.updateAgentStatus('ç©ºé—²');
+         this.updateQualityStatus('å¾…æœº');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹é€šè¯è®¡æ—¶å™¨
+      */
+     startCallTimer() {
+         this.callTimer = setInterval(() => {
+             if (this.callStartTime) {
+                 const elapsed = Math.floor((new Date() - this.callStartTime) / 1000);
+                 const minutes = Math.floor(elapsed / 60);
+                 const seconds = elapsed % 60;
+                 const timeStr = `${minutes.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
+                 this.updateCallTime(timeStr);
+             }
+         }, 1000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ·»åŠ å¯¹è¯æ¶ˆæ¯
+      */
+     addMessage(sender, content, hasWarning = false) {
+         const messageList = document.getElementById('messageList');
+         const placeholder = messageList.querySelector('.conversation-placeholder');
+         
+         // ç§»é™¤å ä½ç¬¦
+         if (placeholder) {
+             placeholder.remove();
+         }
+         
+         const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
+         messageDiv.className = `message ${sender}${hasWarning ? ' warning' : ''}`;
+         messageDiv.innerHTML = content;
+         
+         messageList.appendChild(messageDiv);
+         messageList.scrollTop = messageList.scrollHeight;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ¸…ç©ºå¯¹è¯è®°å½•
+      */
+     clearConversation() {
+         const messageList = document.getElementById('messageList');
+         messageList.innerHTML = '<div class="conversation-placeholder">ç‚¹å‡»"å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º"å¼€å§‹é€šè¯...</div>';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºè´¨æ£€æé†’
+      */
+     showQualityAlert(type, content) {
+         const alertsContainer = document.getElementById('qualityAlerts');
+         
+         const alertDiv = document.createElement('div');
+         alertDiv.className = `quality-alert ${type}`;
+         alertDiv.textContent = content;
+         
+         alertsContainer.appendChild(alertDiv);
+         
+         // ä¿å­˜åˆ°è´¨æ£€è®°å½•
+         this.qualityAlerts.push({
+             type,
+             content,
+             time: this.getCurrentCallTime()
+         });
+         
+         // è‡ªåŠ¨æ¸…é™¤æ—§æé†’ï¼ˆä¿æŒæœ€å¤š3æ¡ï¼‰
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             if (alertsContainer.children.length > 3) {
+                 alertsContainer.removeChild(alertsContainer.firstChild);
+             }
+         }, 5000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ¸…ç©ºè´¨æ£€æé†’
+      */
+     clearQualityAlerts() {
+         document.getElementById('qualityAlerts').innerHTML = '';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è®¾ç½®è´¨æ£€æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨çŠ¶æ€
+      */
+     setQualityIndicator(status, icon, text) {
+         const indicator = document.getElementById('qualityIndicator');
+         const iconElement = indicator.querySelector('.indicator-icon');
+         const textElement = indicator.querySelector('.indicator-text');
+         const window = document.getElementById('realtimeQuality');
+         
+         // ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰çŠ¶æ€ç±»
+         window.className = 'realtime-quality-window';
+         indicator.className = 'quality-indicator';
+         
+         // æ·»åŠ æ–°çŠ¶æ€
+         window.classList.add(status);
+         indicator.classList.add(status);
+         
+         iconElement.textContent = icon;
+         textElement.textContent = text;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®è´¨æ£€æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨
+      */
+     resetQualityIndicator() {
+         this.setQualityIndicator('normal', 'âœ…', 'æœåŠ¡æ­£å¸¸');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°å®æ—¶æŒ‡æ ‡
+      */
+     updateMetrics(metrics) {
+         if (metrics.speechRate) {
+             document.getElementById('speechRate').textContent = metrics.speechRate;
+         }
+         if (metrics.volume) {
+             document.getElementById('volume').textContent = metrics.volume;
+         }
+         if (metrics.tone) {
+             document.getElementById('tone').textContent = metrics.tone;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®æŒ‡æ ‡
+      */
+     resetMetrics() {
+         this.updateMetrics({
+             speechRate: '-- å­—/åˆ†é’Ÿ',
+             volume: '-- dB',
+             tone: 'æ­£å¸¸'
+         });
+         this.updateEmotion('agent', 'ğŸ˜ ä¸­æ€§');
+         this.updateEmotion('citizen', 'ğŸ˜ ä¸­æ€§');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°æƒ…ç»ªåˆ†æ
+      */
+     updateEmotion(target, emotion) {
+         const elementId = target === 'agent' ? 'agentEmotion' : 'citizenEmotion';
+         document.getElementById(elementId).textContent = emotion;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°è§„èŒƒæ€§æ£€æŸ¥é¡¹
+      */
+     updateComplianceItem(itemText, status) {
+         const items = document.querySelectorAll('.compliance-item');
+         
+         items.forEach(item => {
+             const text = item.querySelector('.item-text').textContent;
+             if (text === itemText) {
+                 item.className = `compliance-item ${status}`;
+                 const checkbox = item.querySelector('.checkbox');
+                 
+                 switch (status) {
+                     case 'completed':
+                         checkbox.textContent = 'âœ…';
+                         break;
+                     case 'failed':
+                         checkbox.textContent = 'âŒ';
+                         break;
+                     case 'pending':
+                         checkbox.textContent = 'â³';
+                         break;
+                 }
+             }
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®è§„èŒƒæ€§æ£€æŸ¥æ¸…å•
+      */
+     resetComplianceChecklist() {
+         const items = ['æ ‡å‡†å¼€åœºç™½', 'æœåŠ¡ç”¨è¯­è§„èŒƒ', 'é—®é¢˜è§£ç­”å®Œæ•´'];
+         items.forEach(item => {
+             this.updateComplianceItem(item, 'pending');
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºç­é•¿ç«¯æé†’
+      */
+     showSupervisorAlert(agent, type, text) {
+         const eventsList = document.getElementById('eventsList');
+         
+         const eventDiv = document.createElement('div');
+         eventDiv.className = 'event-item';
+         eventDiv.innerHTML = `
+             <div class="event-time">${this.getCurrentTime()}</div>
+             <div class="event-content">
+                 <span class="agent-tag">${agent}</span>
+                 <span class="event-text ${type}">${text}</span>
+             </div>
+         `;
+         
+         // æ’å…¥åˆ°é¡¶éƒ¨
+         eventsList.insertBefore(eventDiv, eventsList.firstChild);
+         
+         // ä¿æŒæœ€å¤š5æ¡è®°å½•
+         while (eventsList.children.length > 5) {
+             eventsList.removeChild(eventsList.lastChild);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€æ˜¾ç¤º
+      */
+     updateAgentStatus(status) {
+         document.getElementById('agentStatus').textContent = status;
+     }
+ 
+     updateQualityStatus(status) {
+         document.getElementById('qualityStatus').textContent = status;
+     }
+ 
+     updateCallTime(time) {
+         document.getElementById('callTime').textContent = time;
+     }
+ 
+     updateHints(hint) {
+         const hintsContent = document.querySelector('.hints-content');
+         hintsContent.innerHTML = `<div class="hint-item">${hint}</div>`;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è®°å½•è¿è§„äº‹ä»¶
+      */
+     updateViolation(violation, time) {
+         this.violations.push({
+             violation,
+             time,
+             type: 'warning'
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è®°å½•ä¼˜ç§€è¡¨ç°
+      */
+     updatePositiveMark(behavior, time) {
+         this.positiveMarks.push({
+             behavior,
+             time,
+             type: 'success'
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆè´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘Š
+      */
+     generateQualityReport() {
+         const reportContent = this.createReportContent();
+         document.getElementById('reportContent').innerHTML = reportContent;
+         document.getElementById('reportModal').style.display = 'flex';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆ›å»ºæŠ¥å‘Šå†…å®¹
+      */
+     createReportContent() {
+         const score = this.calculateQualityScore();
+         const callDuration = this.getCallDuration();
+         
+         return `
+             <div class="report-section">
+                 <h4>ğŸ“Š ç»¼åˆè¯„åˆ†</h4>
+                 <div class="score-display" style="text-align: center; margin: 20px 0;">
+                     <div style="font-size: 48px; font-weight: bold; color: ${score >= 90 ? '#27ae60' : score >= 80 ? '#f39c12' : '#e74c3c'};">${score}åˆ†</div>
+                     <div style="color: #6c757d; margin-top: 5px;">${this.getScoreLevel(score)}</div>
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             <div class="report-section">
+                 <h4>ğŸ“ˆ å¾—åˆ†è¯¦æƒ…</h4>
+                 <div class="score-breakdown">
+                     <div class="score-item">
+                         <span>æµç¨‹è§„èŒƒ</span>
+                         <span>85åˆ†</span>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="score-item">
+                         <span>æ²Ÿé€šæŠ€å·§</span>
+                         <span>90åˆ†</span>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="score-item">
+                         <span>æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦</span>
+                         <span>92åˆ†</span>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="score-item">
+                         <span>ä¸šåŠ¡èƒ½åŠ›</span>
+                         <span>88åˆ†</span>
+                     </div>
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             <div class="report-section">
+                 <h4>â° é—®é¢˜äº‹ä»¶æ—¶é—´è½´</h4>
+                 <div class="timeline">
+                     ${this.violations.map(v => `
+                         <div class="timeline-item warning">
+                             <span class="time-mark">[${v.time}]</span>
+                             <span class="event-desc">ğŸ”´ ${v.violation}</span>
+                         </div>
+                     `).join('')}
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             <div class="report-section">
+                 <h4>âœ¨ äº®ç‚¹è¡¨ç°</h4>
+                 <div class="timeline">
+                     ${this.positiveMarks.map(p => `
+                         <div class="timeline-item success">
+                             <span class="time-mark">[${p.time}]</span>
+                             <span class="event-desc">ğŸŸ¢ ${p.behavior}</span>
+                         </div>
+                     `).join('')}
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             <div class="report-section">
+                 <h4>ğŸ¤– AIç»¼åˆç‚¹è¯„</h4>
+                 <div class="ai-summary">
+                     <p>æœ¬æ¬¡æœåŠ¡æ•´ä½“æµç•…ï¼Œä¸šåŠ¡è§£ç­”å‡†ç¡®ã€‚é€šè¯æ—¶é•¿${callDuration}ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡æ€åº¦è‰¯å¥½ã€‚</p>
+                     <p><strong>ä¸»è¦ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼š</strong></p>
+                     <ul>
+                         <li>èƒ½å¤ŸåŠæ—¶çº æ­£å¼€åœºç™½ä¸è§„èŒƒé—®é¢˜</li>
+                         <li>ä¸»åŠ¨å®‰æŠšå¸‚æ°‘æƒ…ç»ªï¼Œæä¾›å¢å€¼æœåŠ¡</li>
+                         <li>ä¸šåŠ¡è§£ç­”å‡†ç¡®ã€è¯¦ç»†</li>
+                     </ul>
+                     <p><strong>æ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®ï¼š</strong></p>
+                     <ul>
+                         <li>åŠ å¼ºã€Šæ ‡å‡†æœåŠ¡è¯æœ¯ã€‹çš„å­¦ä¹ ï¼Œé¿å…ä½¿ç”¨"ä½ å¿…é¡»"ç­‰å¼ºåˆ¶æ€§ç”¨è¯­</li>
+                         <li>æ³¨æ„æ§åˆ¶è¯­é€Ÿï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«æ˜¯é¢å¯¹è€å¹´äººç­‰ç‰¹æ®Šç¾¤ä½“æ—¶</li>
+                         <li>å¼€åœºç™½åº”ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§è§„èŒƒï¼Œé¿å…éœ€è¦çº æ­£</li>
+                     </ul>
+                     <p><strong>åŸ¹è®­å»ºè®®ï¼š</strong>å‚åŠ ä¸‹ä¸€æœŸ"æ¸©æš–æœåŠ¡æ²Ÿé€šæŠ€å·§"åŸ¹è®­è¯¾ç¨‹ã€‚</p>
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             <style>
+                 .report-section { margin-bottom: 25px; }
+                 .report-section h4 { 
+                     color: #2c3e50; 
+                     margin-bottom: 15px; 
+                     padding-bottom: 8px; 
+                     border-bottom: 2px solid #ecf0f1; 
+                 }
+                 .score-breakdown { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; }
+                 .score-item { 
+                     display: flex; 
+                     justify-content: space-between; 
+                     padding: 8px 12px; 
+                     background: #f8f9fa; 
+                     border-radius: 6px; 
+                 }
+                 .timeline { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; }
+                 .timeline-item { 
+                     display: flex; 
+                     gap: 10px; 
+                     padding: 8px; 
+                     border-radius: 6px; 
+                 }
+                 .timeline-item.warning { background: #fff5f5; border-left: 3px solid #ff6b6b; }
+                 .timeline-item.success { background: #f0f9ff; border-left: 3px solid #27ae60; }
+                 .time-mark { 
+                     font-family: monospace; 
+                     font-weight: bold; 
+                     color: #6c757d; 
+                     min-width: 60px; 
+                 }
+                 .event-desc { flex: 1; }
+                 .ai-summary { 
+                     background: #f8f9fa; 
+                     padding: 15px; 
+                     border-radius: 8px; 
+                     line-height: 1.6; 
+                 }
+                 .ai-summary ul { margin: 8px 0; padding-left: 20px; }
+                 .ai-summary li { margin-bottom: 4px; }
+             </style>
+         `;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è®¡ç®—è´¨æ£€è¯„åˆ†
+      */
+     calculateQualityScore() {
+         let baseScore = 100;
+         
+         // è¿è§„æ‰£åˆ†
+         this.violations.forEach(violation => {
+             if (violation.violation.includes('å¼€åœºç™½')) {
+                 baseScore -= 5;
+             } else if (violation.violation.includes('ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­')) {
+                 baseScore -= 8;
+             } else if (violation.violation.includes('è¯­é€Ÿ')) {
+                 baseScore -= 4;
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // ä¼˜ç§€è¡¨ç°åŠ åˆ†
+         this.positiveMarks.forEach(() => {
+             baseScore += 3;
+         });
+         
+         return Math.max(60, Math.min(100, baseScore));
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–è¯„åˆ†ç­‰çº§
+      */
+     getScoreLevel(score) {
+         if (score >= 95) return 'ä¼˜ç§€';
+         if (score >= 90) return 'è‰¯å¥½';
+         if (score >= 80) return 'åˆæ ¼';
+         if (score >= 70) return 'å¾…æ”¹è¿›';
+         return 'ä¸åˆæ ¼';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–é€šè¯æ—¶é•¿
+      */
+     getCallDuration() {
+         const callTimeElement = document.getElementById('callTime');
+         return callTimeElement.textContent || '03:24';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å…³é—­æŠ¥å‘Šæ¨¡æ€æ¡†
+      */
+     closeReportModal() {
+         document.getElementById('reportModal').style.display = 'none';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¯¼å‡ºæŠ¥å‘Š
+      */
+     exportReport() {
+         alert('ğŸ“¤ è´¨æ£€æŠ¥å‘Šå·²å¯¼å‡ºåˆ°æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–å½“å‰é€šè¯æ—¶é—´
+      */
+     getCurrentCallTime() {
+         if (!this.callStartTime) return '00:00';
+         
+         const elapsed = Math.floor((new Date() - this.callStartTime) / 1000);
+         const minutes = Math.floor(elapsed / 60);
+         const seconds = elapsed % 60;
+         return `${minutes.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´
+      */
+     getCurrentTime() {
+         const now = new Date();
+         return `${now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å»¶è¿Ÿå‡½æ•°
+      */
+     delay(ms) {
+         return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     new QualityCoachDemo();
+ });
+ 
```

---

## ğŸ¯ CJ_4 - AIå®æ—¶è´¨æ£€æ•™ç»ƒæ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ

### âœ… å·²å®ç°çš„æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

#### ğŸ“‹ **é¡µé¢ç»“æ„**

- **ä¸‰æ å¸ƒå±€**: åå¸­å·¥ä½œå° + AIè´¨æ£€é¢æ¿ + ç­é•¿ç›‘æ§é¢æ¿

#### ğŸ’¼ **åå¸­å·¥ä½œå°**
- é€šè¯æ§åˆ¶åŒºï¼ˆæ¥å¬/æŒ‚æ–­ï¼‰
- å®æ—¶å¯¹è¯è½¬å½•æ˜¾ç¤º
- æ“ä½œæç¤ºå’Œå¼•å¯¼

- è§„èŒƒæ€§æ£€æŸ¥æ¸…å•
- è´¨æ£€æé†’å®æ—¶å¼¹å‡º

#### ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’¼ **ç­é•¿ç›‘æ§åŠŸèƒ½**
- å¤šåå¸­çŠ¶æ€æ¦‚è§ˆ
- å®æ—¶è´¨æ£€ç»Ÿè®¡

### ğŸ¨ **è®¾è®¡ç‰¹è‰²**

### ğŸ¬ **æ¼”ç¤ºåœºæ™¯å®Œæ•´è¿˜åŸ**

å®Œå…¨æŒ‰ç…§CJ_4.mdæ–‡æ¡£çš„åœºæ™¯è¦æ±‚å®ç°ï¼š

1. **å¼€åœºç™½è¿è§„** â†’ AIå®æ—¶æé†’ â†’ åå¸­çº æ­£
2. **ä¸å½“ç”¨è¯­æ£€æµ‹** â†’ æ™ºèƒ½æ ‡æ³¨ â†’ æ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®
3. **è¯­éŸ³ç‰¹å¾åˆ†æ** â†’ å®æ—¶æ•°æ® â†’ è¯­é€Ÿè°ƒæ•´æé†’
4. **ä¼˜ç§€æœåŠ¡è¡Œä¸º** â†’ å³æ—¶æ ‡è®° â†’ ç­é•¿ç«¯æ˜¾ç¤º
5. **é€šè¯ç»“æŸ** â†’ ç§’çº§æŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆ â†’ è¯¦ç»†å¤ç›˜åˆ†æ

### ğŸš€ **ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•**

1. æ‰“å¼€ `CJ_4/index.html`
2. ç‚¹å‡»"â–¶ï¸ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º"

---

ç°åœ¨åˆ›å»ºJavaScriptæ–‡ä»¶æ¥å®ç°äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ /**
+  * æ™ºèƒ½å®æ—¶èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†æç³»ç»Ÿæ¼”ç¤ºè„šæœ¬
+  * @description æ¼”ç¤ºAIèˆ†æƒ…"å“¨å…µ"åŠ©åŠ›åº”å¯¹åŸå¸‚çªå‘å¤§é¢ç§¯åœæ°´äº‹ä»¶
+  * @author AI Assistant
+  * @version 1.0.0
+  */
+ 
+ /**
+  * å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
+  */
+ class DemoState {
+     constructor() {
+         /** @type {string} å½“å‰æ¼”ç¤ºé˜¶æ®µ */
+         this.currentStage = 'dashboard';
+         
+         /** @type {boolean} æ¼”ç¤ºæ˜¯å¦è¿è¡Œä¸­ */
+         this.isRunning = false;
+         
+         /** @type {number} å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æˆ³ */
+         this.currentTime = new Date('2024-06-12 14:00:00');
+         
+         /** @type {Array} æ¼”ç¤ºæ­¥éª¤é˜Ÿåˆ— */
+         this.demoSteps = [];
+         
+         /** @type {number} å½“å‰æ­¥éª¤ç´¢å¼• */
+         this.currentStepIndex = 0;
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†æç³»ç»Ÿæ¼”ç¤ºæ§åˆ¶å™¨
+  */
+ class SentimentAnalysisDemo {
+     /**
+      * æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ
+      */
+     constructor() {
+         this.state = new DemoState();
+         this.initElements();
+         this.bindEvents();
+         this.setupDemoSteps();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–DOMå…ƒç´ å¼•ç”¨
+      */
+     initElements() {
+         // æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®
+         this.startBtn = document.getElementById('startDemoBtn');
+         this.resetBtn = document.getElementById('resetBtn');
+         this.skipBtn = document.getElementById('skipToAlert');
+         
+         // ä¸»è¦ç•Œé¢å®¹å™¨
+         this.dashboardMain = document.getElementById('dashboardMain');
+         this.analysisInterface = document.getElementById('analysisInterface');
+         this.reportInterface = document.getElementById('reportInterface');
+         
+         // æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
+         this.timeDisplay = document.getElementById('timeDisplay');
+         this.analysisTime = document.getElementById('analysisTime');
+         
+         // çƒ­çº¿ç›‘æ§ç›¸å…³
+         this.wordcloudContainer = document.getElementById('wordcloudContainer');
+         this.hotlineStatus = document.getElementById('hotlineStatus');
+         this.rankingList = document.getElementById('rankingList');
+         
+         // é¢„è­¦ç›¸å…³
+         this.alertContainer = document.getElementById('alertContainer');
+         this.viewDetailBtn = document.getElementById('viewDetailBtn');
+         
+         // åˆ†æç›¸å…³
+         this.emotionWarning = document.getElementById('emotionWarning');
+         this.crossChannelAlerts = document.getElementById('crossChannelAlerts');
+         this.actionSection = document.getElementById('actionSection');
+         this.generateReportBtn = document.getElementById('generateReportBtn');
+         
+         // ç®€æŠ¥ç›¸å…³
+         this.downloadReportBtn = document.getElementById('downloadReportBtn');
+         this.shareReportBtn = document.getElementById('shareReportBtn');
+         this.restartDemoBtn = document.getElementById('restartDemoBtn');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      */
+     bindEvents() {
+         this.startBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startDemo());
+         this.resetBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());
+         this.skipBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.skipToAlert());
+         this.viewDetailBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showAnalysisInterface());
+         this.generateReportBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.generateReport());
+         this.downloadReportBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.downloadReport());
+         this.shareReportBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.shareReport());
+         this.restartDemoBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.restartDemo());
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è®¾ç½®æ¼”ç¤ºæ­¥éª¤åºåˆ—
+      */
+     setupDemoSteps() {
+         this.state.demoSteps = [
+             { name: 'start', delay: 0, action: () => this.initializeDashboard() },
+             { name: 'wordcloud_change', delay: 2000, action: () => this.animateWordcloud() },
+             { name: 'ranking_update', delay: 4000, action: () => this.updateRanking() },
+             { name: 'area_alert', delay: 6000, action: () => this.triggerAreaAlert() },
+             { name: 'show_alert', delay: 8000, action: () => this.showAlert() },
+             { name: 'enable_skip', delay: 10000, action: () => this.enableSkipButton() }
+         ];
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     async startDemo() {
+         if (this.state.isRunning) return;
+         
+         this.state.isRunning = true;
+         this.state.currentStepIndex = 0;
+         
+         // ç¦ç”¨å¼€å§‹æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œå¯ç”¨é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®
+         this.startBtn.disabled = true;
+         this.startBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ”„ æ¼”ç¤ºè¿›è¡Œä¸­...';
+         
+         console.log('ğŸš€ å¼€å§‹èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†ææ¼”ç¤º');
+         
+         // æ‰§è¡Œæ¼”ç¤ºæ­¥éª¤
+         for (let i = 0; i < this.state.demoSteps.length; i++) {
+             if (!this.state.isRunning) break;
+             
+             const step = this.state.demoSteps[i];
+             
+             await this.delay(step.delay);
+             
+             if (this.state.isRunning) {
+                 console.log(`æ‰§è¡Œæ­¥éª¤: ${step.name}`);
+                 step.action();
+                 this.state.currentStepIndex = i;
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–é©¾é©¶èˆ±ç•Œé¢
+      */
+     initializeDashboard() {
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:00');
+         this.hotlineStatus.textContent = 'æ­£å¸¸';
+         this.hotlineStatus.className = 'status-indicator normal';
+         
+         // ç¡®ä¿æ˜¾ç¤ºæ­£ç¡®çš„ç•Œé¢
+         this.showDashboardInterface();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åŠ¨ç”»è¯äº‘å˜åŒ–
+      */
+     animateWordcloud() {
+         const wordItems = this.wordcloudContainer.querySelectorAll('.word-item');
+         
+         // æ‰¾åˆ°"åœæ°´"å’Œ"æ²¡æ°´"è¯æ±‡å¹¶é«˜äº®
+         wordItems.forEach(item => {
+             if (item.textContent.includes('åœæ°´') || item.textContent.includes('æ²¡æ°´')) {
+                 item.classList.add('highlight');
+                 item.style.fontSize = '24px';
+                 item.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°çƒ­çº¿çŠ¶æ€
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             this.hotlineStatus.textContent = 'å¼‚å¸¸';
+             this.hotlineStatus.className = 'status-indicator warning';
+         }, 1000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°æ’è¡Œæ¦œ
+      */
+     updateRanking() {
+         const waterItem = this.rankingList.querySelector('[data-topic="water"]');
+         const trafficItem = this.rankingList.querySelector('[data-topic="traffic"]');
+         
+         if (waterItem && trafficItem) {
+             // éšè—åŸæœ‰ç¬¬ä¸€å
+             trafficItem.style.display = 'none';
+             
+             // æ˜¾ç¤º"åœæ°´"å¹¶è®¾ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€å
+             waterItem.style.display = 'flex';
+             waterItem.classList.add('rising');
+             
+             // åŠ¨æ€å¢åŠ æ•°é‡
+             const countElement = waterItem.querySelector('.count');
+             this.animateCount(countElement, 0, 320, 2000);
+         }
+         
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:15');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è§¦å‘åŒºåŸŸé¢„è­¦
+      */
+     triggerAreaAlert() {
+         const cityWest = document.getElementById('cityWest');
+         if (cityWest) {
+             cityWest.className = 'area-item alert';
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºé¢„è­¦é€šçŸ¥
+      */
+     showAlert() {
+         this.alertContainer.style.display = 'block';
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:20');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¯ç”¨è·³è½¬æŒ‰é’®
+      */
+     enableSkipButton() {
+         this.skipBtn.style.display = 'inline-block';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·³è½¬åˆ°é¢„è­¦ç•Œé¢
+      */
+     skipToAlert() {
+         // ç›´æ¥æ‰§è¡Œæ‰€æœ‰å‰ç½®æ­¥éª¤
+         this.initializeDashboard();
+         this.animateWordcloud();
+         this.updateRanking();
+         this.triggerAreaAlert();
+         this.showAlert();
+         this.enableSkipButton();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ†æç•Œé¢
+      */
+     showAnalysisInterface() {
+         this.state.currentStage = 'analysis';
+         
+         // éšè—é©¾é©¶èˆ±ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ†æç•Œé¢
+         this.dashboardMain.style.display = 'none';
+         this.analysisInterface.style.display = 'block';
+         
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:20');
+         
+         // å¯åŠ¨åˆ†æåŠ¨ç”»åºåˆ—
+         this.startAnalysisSequence();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹åˆ†æåºåˆ—åŠ¨ç”»
+      */
+     async startAnalysisSequence() {
+         // 1. æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ°å›¾çƒ­åŠ›æ‰©æ•£
+         setTimeout(() => this.animateMapHeatSpread(), 1000);
+         
+         // 2. æ˜¾ç¤ºæƒ…ç»ªé¢„è­¦
+         setTimeout(() => this.showEmotionWarning(), 3000);
+         
+         // 3. æ˜¾ç¤ºè·¨æ¸ é“é¢„è­¦
+         setTimeout(() => this.showCrossChannelAlerts(), 5000);
+         
+         // 4. æ˜¾ç¤ºç”Ÿæˆç®€æŠ¥æŒ‰é’®
+         setTimeout(() => this.showActionSection(), 7000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åŠ¨ç”»åœ°å›¾çƒ­åŠ›æ‰©æ•£
+      */
+     animateMapHeatSpread() {
+         const westArea = document.getElementById('westArea');
+         if (westArea) {
+             westArea.classList.add('affected');
+             
+             // åŠ¨æ€å¢åŠ å½±å“èŒƒå›´æ–‡æœ¬
+             const affectedArea = document.getElementById('affectedArea');
+             if (affectedArea) {
+                 this.typeWriter(affectedArea, 'Aã€Bã€Cä¸‰ä¸ªè¡—é“ï¼Œçº¦15ä¸‡å±…æ°‘', 50);
+             }
+             
+             const spreadTrend = document.getElementById('spreadTrend');
+             if (spreadTrend) {
+                 setTimeout(() => {
+                     this.typeWriter(spreadTrend, 'æŠ•è¯‰æºå¤´æ­£ä»Aè¡—é“å‘Bã€Cè¡—é“è”“å»¶', 50);
+                 }, 1000);
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºæƒ…ç»ªé¢„è­¦
+      */
+     showEmotionWarning() {
+         this.emotionWarning.style.display = 'flex';
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:25');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºè·¨æ¸ é“é¢„è­¦
+      */
+     showCrossChannelAlerts() {
+         // æ›´æ–°æ¸ é“çŠ¶æ€
+         const channelItems = document.querySelectorAll('.channel-item');
+         channelItems.forEach(item => {
+             const name = item.querySelector('.channel-name').textContent;
+             if (name.includes('å¾®åš') || name.includes('è®ºå›')) {
+                 item.classList.add('warning');
+                 item.querySelector('.channel-status').textContent = 'å‘ç°å¼‚å¸¸';
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºè·¨æ¸ é“é¢„è­¦ä¿¡æ¯
+         this.crossChannelAlerts.style.display = 'block';
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:35');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ“ä½œåŒºåŸŸ
+      */
+     showActionSection() {
+         this.actionSection.style.display = 'block';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆåº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥
+      */
+     generateReport() {
+         this.state.currentStage = 'report';
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºç”Ÿæˆä¸­çŠ¶æ€
+         this.generateReportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“Š ç”Ÿæˆä¸­...';
+         this.generateReportBtn.disabled = true;
+         
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             // éšè—åˆ†æç•Œé¢ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç®€æŠ¥ç•Œé¢
+             this.analysisInterface.style.display = 'none';
+             this.reportInterface.style.display = 'block';
+             
+             this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:40');
+             
+             console.log('ğŸ“‹ åº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆ');
+         }, 2000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ä¸‹è½½ç®€æŠ¥
+      */
+     downloadReport() {
+         // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸‹è½½
+         const blob = new Blob(['åŸè¥¿åœæ°´äº‹ä»¶åº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥'], { type: 'text/plain' });
+         const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
+         const a = document.createElement('a');
+         a.href = url;
+         a.download = 'åŸè¥¿åœæ°´äº‹ä»¶åº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥.txt';
+         a.click();
+         URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ“¥ ç®€æŠ¥ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆ†äº«ç®€æŠ¥
+      */
+     shareReport() {
+         if (navigator.share) {
+             navigator.share({
+                 title: 'åŸè¥¿åœæ°´äº‹ä»¶åº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥',
+                 text: 'æ™ºèƒ½å®æ—¶èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†æç³»ç»Ÿç”Ÿæˆçš„åº”å¯¹å»ºè®®',
+                 url: window.location.href
+             });
+         } else {
+             // å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿
+             navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href).then(() => {
+                 alert('ğŸ”— é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿');
+             });
+         }
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ”— ç®€æŠ¥åˆ†äº«å®Œæˆ');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     restartDemo() {
+         this.resetDemo();
+         setTimeout(() => this.startDemo(), 500);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º
+      */
+     resetDemo() {
+         this.state.isRunning = false;
+         this.state.currentStage = 'dashboard';
+         this.state.currentStepIndex = 0;
+         
+         // é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
+         this.startBtn.disabled = false;
+         this.startBtn.textContent = 'ğŸš€ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º';
+         this.skipBtn.style.display = 'none';
+         this.generateReportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“Š ç”Ÿæˆåº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥';
+         this.generateReportBtn.disabled = false;
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºé©¾é©¶èˆ±ç•Œé¢
+         this.showDashboardInterface();
+         
+         // é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰çŠ¶æ€
+         this.resetAllStates();
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ”„ æ¼”ç¤ºå·²é‡ç½®');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºé©¾é©¶èˆ±ç•Œé¢
+      */
+     showDashboardInterface() {
+         this.dashboardMain.style.display = 'block';
+         this.analysisInterface.style.display = 'none';
+         this.reportInterface.style.display = 'none';
+         this.alertContainer.style.display = 'none';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰çŠ¶æ€
+      */
+     resetAllStates() {
+         // é‡ç½®æ—¶é—´
+         this.updateTimeDisplay('2024-06-12 14:00');
+         
+         // é‡ç½®çƒ­çº¿çŠ¶æ€
+         this.hotlineStatus.textContent = 'æ­£å¸¸';
+         this.hotlineStatus.className = 'status-indicator normal';
+         
+         // é‡ç½®è¯äº‘
+         const wordItems = this.wordcloudContainer.querySelectorAll('.word-item');
+         wordItems.forEach(item => {
+             item.classList.remove('highlight');
+             item.style.fontSize = '';
+             item.style.fontWeight = '';
+         });
+         
+         // é‡ç½®æ’è¡Œæ¦œ
+         const waterItem = this.rankingList.querySelector('[data-topic="water"]');
+         const trafficItem = this.rankingList.querySelector('[data-topic="traffic"]');
+         if (waterItem && trafficItem) {
+             waterItem.style.display = 'none';
+             waterItem.classList.remove('rising');
+             trafficItem.style.display = 'flex';
+         }
+         
+         // é‡ç½®åŒºåŸŸçŠ¶æ€
+         const cityWest = document.getElementById('cityWest');
+         if (cityWest) {
+             cityWest.className = 'area-item normal';
+         }
+         
+         // é‡ç½®åˆ†æç•Œé¢çŠ¶æ€
+         this.emotionWarning.style.display = 'none';
+         this.crossChannelAlerts.style.display = 'none';
+         this.actionSection.style.display = 'none';
+         
+         // é‡ç½®æ¸ é“çŠ¶æ€
+         const channelItems = document.querySelectorAll('.channel-item');
+         channelItems.forEach(item => {
+             item.classList.remove('warning');
+             item.querySelector('.channel-status').textContent = 'æ­£å¸¸ç›‘æ§';
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
+      * @param {string} timeStr - æ—¶é—´å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+      */
+     updateTimeDisplay(timeStr) {
+         if (this.timeDisplay) {
+             this.timeDisplay.textContent = timeStr;
+         }
+         if (this.analysisTime) {
+             this.analysisTime.textContent = timeStr;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ•°å­—åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
+      * @param {HTMLElement} element - ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ 
+      * @param {number} start - èµ·å§‹å€¼
+      * @param {number} end - ç»“æŸå€¼
+      * @param {number} duration - åŠ¨ç”»æ—¶é•¿
+      */
+     animateCount(element, start, end, duration) {
+         const startTime = performance.now();
+         
+         const animate = (currentTime) => {
+             const elapsed = currentTime - startTime;
+             const progress = Math.min(elapsed / duration, 1);
+             
+             const current = Math.floor(start + (end - start) * progress);
+             element.textContent = current;
+             
+             if (progress < 1) {
+                 requestAnimationFrame(animate);
+             }
+         };
+         
+         requestAnimationFrame(animate);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ‰“å­—æœºæ•ˆæœ
+      * @param {HTMLElement} element - ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ 
+      * @param {string} text - è¦æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æ–‡æœ¬
+      * @param {number} speed - æ‰“å­—é€Ÿåº¦ï¼ˆæ¯«ç§’ï¼‰
+      */
+     typeWriter(element, text, speed = 100) {
+         element.textContent = '';
+         let index = 0;
+         
+         const type = () => {
+             if (index < text.length) {
+                 element.textContent += text.charAt(index);
+                 index++;
+                 setTimeout(type, speed);
+             }
+         };
+         
+         type();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å»¶è¿Ÿå‡½æ•°
+      * @param {number} ms - å»¶è¿Ÿæ¯«ç§’æ•°
+      * @returns {Promise}
+      */
+     delay(ms) {
+         return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿ
+  */
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     console.log('ğŸ¯ æ™ºèƒ½å®æ—¶èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†æç³»ç»Ÿæ¼”ç¤ºå·²åŠ è½½');
+     
+     // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¼”ç¤ºæ§åˆ¶å™¨
+     window.sentimentDemo = new SentimentAnalysisDemo();
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ é”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®æ”¯æŒ
+     document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
+         if (e.ctrlKey && e.key === 'Enter') {
+             window.sentimentDemo.startDemo();
+         } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
+             window.sentimentDemo.resetDemo();
+         }
+     });
+     
+     console.log('ğŸ’¡ å¿«æ·é”®æç¤ºï¼šCtrl+Enter å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤ºï¼ŒEsc é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤º');
+ });
+ 
+ /**
+  * é¡µé¢å¸è½½æ—¶æ¸…ç†èµ„æº
+  */
+ window.addEventListener('beforeunload', () => {
+     if (window.sentimentDemo) {
+         window.sentimentDemo.state.isRunning = false;
+     }
+ });
+ 
```

---

ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘ä»¬è¿è¡Œä¸€ä¸‹é¡µé¢æ¥æµ‹è¯•åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

```bash
cd CJ_5 && python -m http.server 8005
```

2. **æ™ºèƒ½èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†æç•Œé¢** - åœ°ç†ç©ºé—´åˆ†æã€æƒ…ç»ªè¿½è¸ªã€è·¨æ¸ é“ç›‘æµ‹
3. **AIåº”å¯¹ç®€æŠ¥ç”Ÿæˆ** - è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆäº‹ä»¶æ‘˜è¦å’Œå¤„ç†å»ºè®®

### ğŸ¨ **è®¾è®¡ç‰¹ç‚¹**

### ğŸš€ **æ¼”ç¤ºæµç¨‹**

2. **æ·±åº¦åˆ†æ** - åœ°å›¾çƒ­åŠ›æ‰©æ•£ã€æƒ…ç»ªåˆ†æã€è·¨æ¸ é“ç›‘æµ‹

### ğŸ’» **æŠ€æœ¯å®ç°**

- äº‹ä»¶é©±åŠ¨çš„çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
- å¹³æ»‘çš„CSSåŠ¨ç”»å’Œè¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ

### ğŸ® **äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½**
- ä¸€é”®å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º
- å¿«é€Ÿè·³è½¬åŠŸèƒ½
- ç®€æŠ¥ä¸‹è½½å’Œåˆ†äº«
- é”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®æ”¯æŒï¼ˆCtrl+Enterå¼€å§‹ï¼ŒEscé‡ç½®ï¼‰

é¡µé¢ç°åœ¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ `http://localhost:8005`ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç‚¹å‡»"ğŸš€ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º"æŒ‰é’®æ¥ä½“éªŒå®Œæ•´çš„èˆ†æƒ…åˆ†ææ¼”ç¤ºæµç¨‹ï¼

<!-- Generated by SpecStory -->

# ç”Ÿæˆdemoå†…å®¹å’Œé¡µé¢headerå‚è€ƒ (2025-06-10 10:38:02)

_**User**_

ä½ éµå¾ªæ–‡æ¡£å’Œè§„èŒƒè¦æ±‚ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆdemoå†…å®¹ï¼Œé¡µé¢headerå‚è€ƒCJ_3ã€‚

---

_**Assistant**_

æˆ‘ä¼šæ ¹æ®CJ_6çš„æ–‡æ¡£è¦æ±‚å’ŒCJ_3çš„headerå‚è€ƒæ¥ç”Ÿæˆæ™ºæ…§åŸå¸‚é©¾é©¶èˆ±çš„demoå†…å®¹ã€‚è®©æˆ‘å…ˆæŸ¥çœ‹CJ_3çš„headerè®¾è®¡ä½œä¸ºå‚è€ƒã€‚

---

Read file: CJ_3/index.html

---

Read file: CJ_3/style.css

---

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘å°†æ ¹æ®CJ_6çš„æ–‡æ¡£è¦æ±‚ï¼Œä»¥CJ_3çš„headerè®¾è®¡ä¸ºå‚è€ƒï¼Œåˆ›å»ºæ™ºæ…§åŸå¸‚é©¾é©¶èˆ±çš„demoé¡µé¢ã€‚

---

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘å°†åˆ›å»ºå¯¹åº”çš„CSSæ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ /* ===== CSSå˜é‡å®šä¹‰ ===== */
+ :root {
+     /* å“ç‰Œæ¸å˜è‰² */
+     --primary-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
+     --secondary-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%);
+     --success-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #27ae60, #2ecc71);
+     --warning-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #f39c12, #e67e22);
+     --danger-gradient: linear-gradient(45deg, #e74c3c, #c0392b);
+     --city-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 50%, #667eea 100%);
+     
+     /* æ–‡æœ¬é¢œè‰² */
+     --text-primary: #2c3e50;
+     --text-secondary: #6c757d;
+     --text-light: #ecf0f1;
+     --text-muted: #bdc3c7;
+     --text-accent: #667eea;
+     
+     /* èƒŒæ™¯è‰² */
+     --bg-white: #ffffff;
+     --bg-light: #f8f9fa;
+     --bg-muted: #e9ecef;
+     --bg-dark: #2c3e50;
+     --bg-transparent: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
+     --bg-overlay: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
+     
+     /* é˜´å½± */
+     --shadow-light: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
+     --shadow-medium: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
+     --shadow-dark: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
+     --shadow-glow: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3);
+     
+     /* å­—ä½“ */
+     --font-title: 24px;
+     --font-subtitle: 18px;
+     --font-body: 14px;
+     --font-small: 12px;
+     --font-large: 16px;
+     --font-normal: 400;
+     --font-medium: 500;
+     --font-semibold: 600;
+     --font-bold: 700;
+ }
+ 
+ /* ===== åŸºç¡€æ ·å¼ ===== */
+ * {
+     margin: 0;
+     padding: 0;
+     box-sizing: border-box;
+ }
+ 
+ body {
+     font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei', 'PingFang SC', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
+     background: var(--city-gradient);
+     min-height: 100vh;
+     color: var(--text-primary);
+     overflow-x: hidden;
+ }
+ 
+ /* ===== æ§åˆ¶é¢æ¿æ ·å¼ ===== */
+ .demo-controls {
+     background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
+     backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
+     padding: 15px 25px;
+     border-radius: 0 0 20px 20px;
+     box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
+     margin-bottom: 20px;
+     position: sticky;
+     top: 0;
+     z-index: 1000;
+     border-bottom: 3px solid var(--text-accent);
+ }
+ 
+ .control-row {
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: space-between;
+     align-items: center;
+     gap: 25px;
+     max-width: 1400px;
+     margin: 0 auto;
+ }
+ 
+ .demo-title {
+     color: var(--text-primary);
+     font-size: var(--font-subtitle);
+     font-weight: var(--font-bold);
+     flex-shrink: 0;
+     background: var(--primary-gradient);
+     -webkit-background-clip: text;
+     -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
+     background-clip: text;
+ }
+ 
+ .control-buttons {
+     display: flex;
+     gap: 15px;
+     flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ 
+ /* ===== æŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ ===== */
+ .btn-primary, .btn-secondary {
+     padding: 12px 24px;
+     border: none;
+     border-radius: 30px;
+     font-size: var(--font-body);
+     font-weight: var(--font-medium);
+     cursor: pointer;
+     transition: all 0.3s ease;
+     outline: none;
+     position: relative;
+     overflow: hidden;
+ }
+ 
+ .btn-primary {
+     background: var(--primary-gradient);
+     color: white;
+     box-shadow: 0 6px 20px var(--shadow-glow);
+ }
+ 
+ .btn-primary:hover {
+     transform: translateY(-3px);
+     box-shadow: 0 8px 25px var(--shadow-glow);
+ }
+ 
+ .btn-secondary {
+     background: var(--bg-white);
+     color: var(--text-secondary);

+ }
+ 
+ .btn-secondary:hover {
+     background: var(--bg-light);
+     color: var(--text-primary);
+     transform: translateY(-2px);
+ }
+ 
+ /* ===== ä¸»å®¹å™¨æ ·å¼ ===== */

+ }

+ /* ===== é©¾é©¶èˆ±ä¸»ç•Œé¢ ===== */
+ .dashboard-main {

+ }
+ 
+ .dashboard-header {
+     display: flex;
+     justify-content: space-between;

+ }
+ 
+ .dashboard-header h1 {
+     font-size: var(--font-title);
+     font-weight: var(--font-bold);
+     background: var(--primary-gradient);
+     -webkit-background-clip: text;
+     -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
+     background-clip: text;
+ }
+ 
+ .dashboard-header h2 {
+     font-size: var(--font-subtitle);
+     font-weight: var(--font-bold);

+ }

+     display: flex;

+     font-size: var(--font-body);
+     color: var(--text-secondary);
+ }
+ 
+ .weather {
+     font-weight: var(--font-medium);
+ }
+ 
+ .back-btn {
```

---

```diff
+

+     /**

+     startVoiceRecognition() {
+         const commandElement = document.getElementById('voiceCommand');
+         let currentCommand = '';
+         
+         if (this.currentCommandIndex < this.voiceCommands.length) {
+             currentCommand = this.voiceCommands[this.currentCommandIndex];
+             this.currentCommandIndex++;
+         } else {
+             currentCommand = "è¯·è¯´å‡ºæ‚¨çš„æŒ‡ä»¤...";
+         }
+         
+         // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé€å­—è¯†åˆ«
+         let index = 0;
+         const interval = setInterval(() => {
+             if (index <= currentCommand.length) {
+                 commandElement.textContent = currentCommand.substring(0, index);
+                 index++;
+             } else {
+                 clearInterval(interval);
+                 setTimeout(() => {
+                     this.closeVoiceModal();
+                     this.processVoiceCommand(currentCommand);
+                 }, 1000);
+             }
+         }, 100);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¤„ç†è¯­éŸ³æŒ‡ä»¤
+      * @param {string} command - è¯†åˆ«åˆ°çš„è¯­éŸ³æŒ‡ä»¤

+     processVoiceCommand(command) {
+         if (command.includes('æ—¥æŠ¥')) {
+             this.showDailyReport();
+         } else if (command.includes('åœè½¦éš¾')) {
+             setTimeout(() => this.goToStep(2), 500);

+             setTimeout(() => this.goToStep(3), 500);
+         }
+     }

+         document.getElementById('loadingAnimation').style.display = 'block';
+         document.getElementById('resultsContent').style.display = 'none';
+         
+         // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAIåˆ†æè¿‡ç¨‹
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             document.getElementById('loadingAnimation').style.display = 'none';
+             document.getElementById('resultsContent').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('finalActions').style.display = 'flex';
+             
+             // æ ¹æ®é€‰æ‹©æ›´æ–°ç»“æœå†…å®¹

+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»“æœ
+      * @param {string} area - ç›®æ ‡åŒºåŸŸ
+      * @param {string} solution - è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ
+      */
+     updateSimulationResults(area, solution) {
+         // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒçš„åŒºåŸŸå’Œæ–¹æ¡ˆæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸åŒçš„ç»“æœ
+         // å½“å‰æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯é»˜è®¤çš„Aè¡—é“æ–°å»ºåœè½¦åœºæ–¹æ¡ˆ
+         console.log(`æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»“æœ: ${area} - ${solution}`);
+         
+         // æ·»åŠ åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
+         const items = document.querySelectorAll('.impact-item, .risk-item, .recommendation-item');
+         items.forEach((item, index) => {
+             item.style.opacity = '0';
+             item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 item.style.transition = 'all 0.5s ease';
+                 item.style.opacity = '1';
+                 item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
+             }, index * 200);
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ‰¹å‡†å†³ç­–
+      */
+     approveDecision() {
+         this.showMessage('âœ… æ–¹æ¡ˆå·²æ‰¹å‡†ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨ç”Ÿæˆå®æ–½è®¡åˆ’...', 'success');
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             this.showMessage('ğŸ“‹ å®æ–½è®¡åˆ’å·²ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œå·²æ´¾å‘è‡³ç›¸å…³éƒ¨é—¨æ‰§è¡Œ', 'success');
+         }, 2000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ä¿®æ”¹æ–¹æ¡ˆ
+      */
+     modifyDecision() {

+     }
+ 
+     /**

+     moreSimulation() {

+         document.getElementById('finalActions').style.display = 'none';
+     }

+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯æç¤º
+      * @param {string} message - æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
+      * @param {string} type - æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹
+      */
+     showMessage(message, type = 'info') {
+         // åˆ›å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯æç¤ºå…ƒç´ 
+         const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
+         messageDiv.className = `message-toast ${type}`;
+         messageDiv.textContent = message;
+         messageDiv.style.cssText = `
+             position: fixed;
+             top: 100px;
+             right: 20px;
+             background: ${type === 'success' ? '#27ae60' : type === 'error' ? '#e74c3c' : '#667eea'};
+             color: white;
+             padding: 15px 25px;
+             border-radius: 8px;
+             box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
+             z-index: 9999;
+             opacity: 0;
+             transform: translateX(100%);
+             transition: all 0.3s ease;
+         `;
+         
+         document.body.appendChild(messageDiv);
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ¨ç”»
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             messageDiv.style.opacity = '1';
+             messageDiv.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
+         }, 100);
+         
+         // è‡ªåŠ¨ç§»é™¤
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             messageDiv.style.opacity = '0';
+             messageDiv.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 document.body.removeChild(messageDiv);
+             }, 300);
+         }, 3000);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
+      */
+     updateTime() {
+         const timeElement = document.getElementById('currentTime');
+         if (timeElement) {
+             const now = new Date();
+             const options = { 
+                 year: 'numeric', 
+                 month: 'long', 
+                 day: 'numeric',
+                 hour: '2-digit',
+                 minute: '2-digit'
+             };
+             timeElement.textContent = now.toLocaleDateString('zh-CN', options);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å›¾è¡¨åŠ¨ç”»
+      */
+     animateCharts() {
+         // æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾åŠ¨ç”»
+         const chartItems = document.querySelectorAll('.chart-item');
+         chartItems.forEach((item, index) => {
+             const value = item.querySelector('.chart-value').textContent;
+             const width = value.replace('%', '');
+             
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 item.style.setProperty('--chart-width', width + '%');
+                 item.querySelector('::before') && (item.querySelector('::before').style.width = width + '%');
+             }, index * 200);
+         });
+ 
+         // è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾åŠ¨ç”»
+         const trendBars = document.querySelectorAll('.trend-bar');
+         trendBars.forEach((bar, index) => {
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 bar.style.opacity = '1';
+                 bar.style.transform = 'scaleX(1)';
+             }, index * 300);
+         });
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     window.dashboard = new SmartCityDashboard();
+ });
+ 
+ /**
+  * å…¨å±€å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
+  */
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ•°å­—æ˜¾ç¤º
+  * @param {number} num - æ•°å­—
+  * @param {number} decimals - å°æ•°ä½æ•°
+  * @returns {string} æ ¼å¼åŒ–åçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+  */
+ function formatNumber(num, decimals = 1) {
+     return Number(num).toFixed(decimals);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * é˜²æŠ–å‡½æ•°
+  * @param {Function} func - è¦é˜²æŠ–çš„å‡½æ•°
+  * @param {number} wait - ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´
+  * @returns {Function} é˜²æŠ–åçš„å‡½æ•°
+  */
+ function debounce(func, wait) {
+     let timeout;
+     return function executedFunction(...args) {
+         const later = () => {
+             clearTimeout(timeout);
+             func(...args);
+         };
+         clearTimeout(timeout);
+         timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
+     };
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * èŠ‚æµå‡½æ•°
+  * @param {Function} func - è¦èŠ‚æµçš„å‡½æ•°
+  * @param {number} limit - é™åˆ¶æ—¶é—´
+  * @returns {Function} èŠ‚æµåçš„å‡½æ•°
+  */
+ function throttle(func, limit) {
+     let inThrottle;
+     return function() {
+         const args = arguments;
+         const context = this;
+         if (!inThrottle) {
+             func.apply(context, args);
+             inThrottle = true;
+             setTimeout(() => inThrottle = false, limit);
+         }
+     };
+ }
+ 
+ // æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›å®ç”¨çš„CSSåŠ¨ç”»ç±»
+ const style = document.createElement('style');
+ style.textContent = `
+     .chart-item::before {
+         width: var(--chart-width, 0%);
+     }
+     
+     .trend-bar {
+         opacity: 0;
+         transform: scaleX(0);
+         transform-origin: left;
+         transition: all 0.6s ease;
+     }
+     
+     .message-toast {
+         font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei', 'PingFang SC', sans-serif;
+         font-weight: 500;
+         font-size: 14px;
+     }
+ `;
+ document.head.appendChild(style);
+ 
```

---

---

_**User**_

å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥è§£å†³ é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®ä¸èƒ½å®é™…é‡ç½®çš„é—®é¢˜ éœ€è¦ç‚¹å‡»é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®å°±æ˜¯åˆå§‹åŒ–é¡µé¢çš„åŠŸèƒ½

---

_**Assistant**_



---

å¥½çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ç†è§£äº†ã€‚æ‚¨å¸Œæœ›é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®èƒ½å¤Ÿç«‹å³ã€å½»åº•åœ°å°†é¡µé¢æ¢å¤åˆ°åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€ã€‚

ç›®å‰ `resetDemo()` å‡½æ•°å·²ç»åŒ…å«äº†å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†é‡ç½®é€»è¾‘ï¼Œä½†ç”±äºAIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡å’ŒçŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—çš„æ˜¾ç¤º/éšè—æ¶‰åŠåˆ°åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœï¼ˆGSAPåŠ¨ç”»å’ŒCSS `transition`ï¼‰ï¼Œåœ¨é‡ç½®æ—¶å®ƒä»¬å¯èƒ½ä¸ä¼šç«‹å³æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä¼šå…ˆæ‰§è¡Œå®ŒåŠ¨ç”»ã€‚

ä¸ºäº†ç¡®ä¿ç‚¹å‡»é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®æ—¶ï¼Œè¿™äº›å…ƒç´ èƒ½å¤Ÿ**ç«‹å³**å›åˆ°åˆå§‹çš„éšè—çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åœ¨ `resetDemo()` å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ˜¾å¼åœ°è®¾ç½®å®ƒä»¬çš„æ ·å¼ï¼Œå¹¶åœæ­¢å¯èƒ½æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œçš„åŠ¨ç”»ã€‚

è¯·ä¿®æ”¹ `CJ_1/script.js` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå°† `resetDemo()` å‡½æ•°æ›´æ–°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

```language:CJ_1/script.js
// ... existing code ...
/**
 * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤ºã€‚
 */
function resetDemo() {
    isPlaying = false;
    currentStep = 0;
    callSeconds = 0;
    toggleCallTimer(false);
    callTimeSpan.textContent = 'é€šè¯ä¸­ 00:00:00';
    startBtn.textContent = 'â–¶ï¸ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º';

    dialogueArea.innerHTML = ''; // æ¸…ç©ºå¯¹è¯å†…å®¹

    // ç«‹å³éšè—AIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡ï¼Œå¹¶åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³åŠ¨ç”»
    gsap.killTweensOf(analysisCard); // åœæ­¢AIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œçš„GSAPåŠ¨ç”»
    analysisCard.style.opacity = '0'; // è®¾ç½®é€æ˜åº¦ä¸º0
    analysisCard.style.transform = 'scale(0.8)'; // æ¢å¤åˆå§‹ç¼©æ”¾çŠ¶æ€
    analysisCard.style.display = 'none'; // éšè—å…ƒç´ 

    // ç«‹å³éšè—çŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—ï¼Œå¹¶åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³åŠ¨ç”»
    smsPopup.classList.remove('active'); // ç§»é™¤æ¿€æ´»ç±»ï¼ŒCSSè¿‡æ¸¡ä¼šä½¿å…¶éšè—
    // è™½ç„¶hideSmsPopupæ²¡æœ‰ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨GSAPï¼Œä½†ä¸ºäº†å½»åº•å’Œä¸€è‡´æ€§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åŠ ä¸ŠkillTweensOf
    gsap.killTweensOf(smsPopup); 
    smsPopup.style.transform = 'translateY(-100%)'; // å¼ºåˆ¶è®¾ç½®å›åˆ°éšè—ä½ç½®ï¼Œè¦†ç›–å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨çš„è¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ

    // æ¢å¤åˆå§‹ç•Œé¢ï¼ˆç›®å‰ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ åˆå§‹æ¬¢è¿è¯­æˆ–å›¾ç‰‡ï¼‰
}

// ... existing code ...
```

**è§£é‡Šï¼š**

1.  **`gsap.killTweensOf(analysisCard);`**: è¿™ä¼šç«‹å³åœæ­¢ `analysisCard` ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œçš„ GSAP åŠ¨ç”»ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢å®ƒç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œéšè—åŠ¨ç”»ã€‚
2.  **`analysisCard.style.opacity = '0';` `analysisCard.style.transform = 'scale(0.8)';` `analysisCard.style.display = 'none';`**: è¿™äº›è¡Œç›´æ¥è®¾ç½®äº† `analysisCard` çš„ `opacity`ã€`transform` å’Œ `display` å±æ€§ï¼Œå°†å…¶å¼ºåˆ¶æ¢å¤åˆ°åˆå§‹çš„éšè—çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè€Œä¸ä¼šç­‰å¾…åŠ¨ç”»å®Œæˆã€‚
3.  **`smsPopup.classList.remove('active');`**: ç§»é™¤ `active` ç±»ä¼šè®©çŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œ CSS `transition` åŠ¨ç”»å›åˆ°éšè—ä½ç½®ã€‚
4.  **`smsPopup.style.transform = 'translateY(-100%)';`**: è¿™ä¸€è¡Œæ˜¯é¢å¤–çš„ä¿é™©ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šç«‹å³å°†çŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—çš„ `transform` å±æ€§è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå…¶éšè—æ—¶çš„å€¼ï¼Œç¡®ä¿å®ƒå³ä½¿åœ¨ CSS `transition` è¿›è¡Œä¸­ä¹Ÿèƒ½ç«‹å³å›åˆ°éšè—çŠ¶æ€ã€‚
5.  **`gsap.killTweensOf(smsPopup);`**: å°½ç®¡ `smsPopup` çš„æ˜¾ç¤º/éšè—ä¸»è¦æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ CSS `transition` æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œä½†ä¸ºäº†ä»£ç çš„å¥å£®æ€§å’Œä¸€è‡´æ€§ï¼Œåœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰æ½œåœ¨çš„ GSAP åŠ¨ç”»ä»ç„¶æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¥½çš„åšæ³•ã€‚

é€šè¿‡è¿™äº›ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»é‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®æ—¶ï¼ŒAIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡å’ŒçŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—å°†ä¼šç«‹å³ä»é¡µé¢ä¸­æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œä»è€Œå®ç°æ›´å½»åº•çš„é¡µé¢é‡ç½®æ•ˆæœã€‚

---

_**User**_

å¹¶ä¹ˆæœ‰è§£å†³

---

_**Assistant**_



---

å¥½çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘éå¸¸æŠ±æ­‰ä¹‹å‰çš„ä¿®æ”¹æ²¡æœ‰å®Œå…¨è§£å†³é—®é¢˜ã€‚æ‚¨æ˜¯å¯¹çš„ï¼Œé‡ç½®åŠŸèƒ½éœ€è¦æ›´åŠ å½»åº•ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»”ç»†æ£€æŸ¥äº†ä»£ç ï¼Œå‘ç°é—®é¢˜å¾ˆå¯èƒ½å‡ºåœ¨ `setTimeout` çš„è°ƒç”¨ä¸Šã€‚å½“æ¼”ç¤ºè¿›è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œ`nextStep` å‡½æ•°ä¼šä½¿ç”¨ `setTimeout` è°ƒåº¦ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è¯æ­¥éª¤ã€‚å¦‚æœåœ¨è¿™ä¸ªå®šæ—¶å™¨è§¦å‘ä¹‹å‰ç‚¹å‡»äº†â€œé‡ç½®â€æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå³ä½¿ `isPlaying` è¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸º `false`ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå·²ç»è°ƒåº¦çš„ `setTimeout` ä»ç„¶ä¼šåœ¨æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´åæ‰§è¡Œ `nextStep`ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´é¡µé¢çœ‹èµ·æ¥æ²¡æœ‰å®Œå…¨é‡ç½®ï¼Œæˆ–è€…åœ¨é‡ç½®ååˆç«‹å³å¼€å§‹äº†æ–°çš„æ­¥éª¤ã€‚

æ­¤å¤–ï¼ŒçŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—ä¹Ÿæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªåŠ¨éšè—çš„ `setTimeout`ï¼Œä¹Ÿéœ€è¦è¢«æ¸…é™¤ã€‚

ä¸ºäº†è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥å˜é‡æ¥å­˜å‚¨è¿™äº› `setTimeout` çš„IDï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ `resetDemo` å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ˜¾å¼åœ°æ¸…é™¤å®ƒä»¬ã€‚

è¯·ä¿®æ”¹ `CJ_1/script.js` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå…·ä½“å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

### **ä¿®æ”¹ `CJ_1/script.js`**

æˆ‘ä»¬å°†æ·»åŠ ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–°çš„å˜é‡æ¥å­˜å‚¨ `setTimeout` çš„IDï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ `nextStep` å’Œ `showSmsPopup` ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒä»¬ï¼Œæœ€ååœ¨ `resetDemo` ä¸­æ¸…é™¤å®ƒä»¬ã€‚

```language:CJ_1/script.js
// ... existing code ...

// æ¼”ç¤ºçŠ¶æ€å˜é‡
let currentStep = 0;
let isPlaying = false;
let callTimerInterval;
let callSeconds = 0;
/**
 * @type {number|null} ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨ nextStep çš„ setTimeout IDï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨é‡ç½®æ—¶æ¸…é™¤
 */
let nextStepTimeoutId = null; 
/**
 * @type {number|null} ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨çŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—è‡ªåŠ¨éšè—çš„ setTimeout IDï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨é‡ç½®æ—¶æ¸…é™¤
 */
let smsHideTimeoutId = null; 

// ... existing code ...

/**
 * æ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—ã€‚
 * @param {string} text - çŸ­ä¿¡å†…å®¹ã€‚
 */
function showSmsPopup(text) {
    smsContent.textContent = text;
    smsPopup.classList.add('active');
    // åœ¨è®¾ç½®æ–°çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•ç°æœ‰çš„çŸ­ä¿¡éšè—å®šæ—¶å™¨
    if (smsHideTimeoutId) {
        clearTimeout(smsHideTimeoutId);
        smsHideTimeoutId = null;
    }
    // æŒç»­ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´åè‡ªåŠ¨éšè—
    smsHideTimeoutId = setTimeout(() => {
        hideSmsPopup();
        smsHideTimeoutId = null; // å®šæ—¶å™¨æ‰§è¡Œåå°† ID ç½®ç©º
    }, 5000);
}

// ... existing code ...

/**
 * æ‰§è¡Œæ¼”ç¤ºçš„ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ã€‚
 */
async function nextStep() {
    if (currentStep >= conversationScript.length) {
        // æ¼”ç¤ºç»“æŸ
        isPlaying = false;
        toggleCallTimer(false);
        startBtn.textContent = 'â–¶ï¸ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º';
        
        // ç¡®ä¿æ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•æ­£åœ¨ç­‰å¾…çš„ nextStep å®šæ—¶å™¨
        if (nextStepTimeoutId) {
            clearTimeout(nextStepTimeoutId);
            nextStepTimeoutId = null;
        }
        return;
    }

    const stepData = conversationScript[currentStep];

    // éšè—ä¹‹å‰çš„åˆ†æå¡ç‰‡ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
    if (currentStep > 0 && conversationScript[currentStep - 1].analysis) {
        hideAnalysisCard();
    }

    // æ·»åŠ å¯¹è¯æ°”æ³¡
    await addMessageBubble(stepData.speaker, stepData.text);

    // æ˜¾ç¤ºAIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡
    if (stepData.analysis && analysisPoints[stepData.analysis]) {
        showAnalysisCard(analysisPoints[stepData.analysis]);
    }

    // æ˜¾ç¤ºçŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—
    if (stepData.sms) {
        showSmsPopup(stepData.sms);
    }

    currentStep++;

    if (isPlaying) {
        // è‡ªåŠ¨æ’­æ”¾ä¸‹ä¸€æ¡
        // åœ¨è°ƒåº¦æ–°çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•ç°æœ‰çš„ nextStep å®šæ—¶å™¨
        if (nextStepTimeoutId) {
            clearTimeout(nextStepTimeoutId);
        }
        nextStepTimeoutId = setTimeout(nextStep, stepData.duration + 500); // å¢åŠ ä¸€äº›é—´éš”æ—¶é—´å¹¶å­˜å‚¨ ID
    }
}

// ... existing code ...

/**
 * é‡ç½®æ¼”ç¤ºã€‚
 */
function resetDemo() {
    isPlaying = false;
    currentStep = 0;
    callSeconds = 0;
    toggleCallTimer(false);
    callTimeSpan.textContent = 'é€šè¯ä¸­ 00:00:00';
    startBtn.textContent = 'â–¶ï¸ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º';

    dialogueArea.innerHTML = ''; // æ¸…ç©ºå¯¹è¯å†…å®¹

    // æ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•æ­£åœ¨ç­‰å¾…çš„ nextStep å®šæ—¶å™¨
    if (nextStepTimeoutId) {
        clearTimeout(nextStepTimeoutId);
        nextStepTimeoutId = null;
    }

    // ç«‹å³éšè—AIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡ï¼Œå¹¶åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³åŠ¨ç”»
    gsap.killTweensOf(analysisCard); // åœæ­¢AIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œçš„GSAPåŠ¨ç”»
    analysisCard.style.opacity = '0'; // è®¾ç½®é€æ˜åº¦ä¸º0
    analysisCard.style.transform = 'scale(0.8)'; // æ¢å¤åˆå§‹ç¼©æ”¾çŠ¶æ€
    analysisCard.style.display = 'none'; // éšè—å…ƒç´ 

    // ç«‹å³éšè—çŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—ï¼Œå¹¶åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³åŠ¨ç”»
    // æ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•æ­£åœ¨ç­‰å¾…çš„çŸ­ä¿¡è‡ªåŠ¨éšè—å®šæ—¶å™¨
    if (smsHideTimeoutId) {
        clearTimeout(smsHideTimeoutId);
        smsHideTimeoutId = null;
    }
    smsPopup.classList.remove('active'); // ç§»é™¤æ¿€æ´»ç±»ï¼ŒCSSè¿‡æ¸¡ä¼šä½¿å…¶éšè—
    gsap.killTweensOf(smsPopup); // åœæ­¢çŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰æ­£åœ¨è¿›è¡Œçš„GSAPåŠ¨ç”»ï¼ˆå°½ç®¡å¯èƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ï¼‰
    smsPopup.style.transform = 'translateY(-100%)'; // å¼ºåˆ¶è®¾ç½®å›åˆ°éšè—ä½ç½®ï¼Œè¦†ç›–å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨çš„è¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ

    // æ¢å¤åˆå§‹ç•Œé¢ï¼ˆç›®å‰ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ åˆå§‹æ¬¢è¿è¯­æˆ–å›¾ç‰‡ï¼‰
}

// ... existing code ...
```

**å…³é”®æ”¹åŠ¨å’Œè§£é‡Šï¼š**

1.  **`nextStepTimeoutId` å’Œ `smsHideTimeoutId` å˜é‡**ï¼šåœ¨ `script.js` æ–‡ä»¶çš„é¡¶éƒ¨ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…åœ¨ `resetDemo` å‡½æ•°çš„ä¸Šæ–¹ï¼‰æ·»åŠ äº†è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„å£°æ˜ï¼Œå¹¶åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸º `null`ã€‚
2.  **`nextStep` å‡½æ•°ä¸­ `setTimeout` çš„ç®¡ç†**ï¼š
    *   åœ¨è°ƒåº¦æ–°çš„ `nextStep` å®šæ—¶å™¨ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œä¼šå…ˆæ£€æŸ¥ `nextStepTimeoutId` æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨ `clearTimeout` æ¸…é™¤å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå®šæ—¶å™¨ã€‚
    *   `setTimeout` è¿”å›çš„ ID è¢«èµ‹å€¼ç»™ `nextStepTimeoutId`ã€‚
    *   åœ¨æ¼”ç¤ºç»“æŸçš„ `if (currentStep >= conversationScript.length)` å—ä¸­ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¾å¼åœ°æ¸…é™¤äº† `nextStepTimeoutId`ï¼Œä»¥é˜²æ¼”ç¤ºç»“æŸåè¿˜æœ‰æœªè§¦å‘çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨ã€‚
3.  **`showSmsPopup` å‡½æ•°ä¸­ `setTimeout` çš„ç®¡ç†**ï¼š
    *   åœ¨è®¾ç½®æ–°çš„çŸ­ä¿¡è‡ªåŠ¨éšè—å®šæ—¶å™¨ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œä¼šæ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•ç°æœ‰çš„ `smsHideTimeoutId`ã€‚
    *   `setTimeout` è¿”å›çš„ ID è¢«èµ‹å€¼ç»™ `smsHideTimeoutId`ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨å®šæ—¶å™¨æ‰§è¡Œåå°†å…¶ç½®ç©ºã€‚
4.  **`resetDemo` å‡½æ•°ä¸­ `clearTimeout` è°ƒç”¨**ï¼š
    *   åœ¨é‡ç½® AI åˆ†æå¡ç‰‡å’ŒçŸ­ä¿¡å¼¹çª—ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå¢åŠ äº† `if (nextStepTimeoutId) { clearTimeout(nextStepTimeoutId); nextStepTimeoutId = null; }` å’Œ `if (smsHideTimeoutId) { clearTimeout(smsHideTimeoutId); smsHideTimeoutId = null; }`ã€‚è¿™ç¡®ä¿äº†æ‰€æœ‰æœªè§¦å‘çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨éƒ½è¢«å–æ¶ˆï¼Œé˜²æ­¢å®ƒä»¬åœ¨é‡ç½®åâ€œå·å·â€å¯åŠ¨ã€‚

é€šè¿‡è¿™äº›ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œé‡ç½®æŒ‰é’®åº”è¯¥èƒ½å¤Ÿæ›´å¯é åœ°å°†é¡µé¢å®Œå…¨æ¢å¤åˆ°åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€äº†ã€‚

```language:CJ_1/script.js
    currentStep = 0;
    callSeconds = 0;
    toggleCallTimer(false);
    callTimeSpan.textContent = 'é€šè¯ä¸­ 00:00:00';
    startBtn.textContent = 'â–¶ï¸ å¼€å§‹æ¼”ç¤º';

    dialogueArea.innerHTML = ''; // æ¸…ç©ºå¯¹è¯å†…å®¹

    // æ¸…é™¤ä»»ä½•æ­£åœ¨ç­‰å¾…çš„ nextStep å®šæ—¶å™¨

        clearTimeout(nextStepTimeoutId);
        nextStepTimeoutId = null;
    }

    // ç«‹å³éšè—AIåˆ†æå¡ç‰‡ï¼Œå¹¶åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰ç›¸å…³åŠ¨ç”»

    analysisCard.style.opacity = '0'; // è®¾ç½®é€æ˜åº¦ä¸º0
```

```diff
+     opacity: 1;
+     visibility: visible;
+ }

+     .points-popup-header h3 {
+         font-size: 18px;
+     }
+     
+     .points-popup-body {
+         padding: 16px;
+     }
+     
+     .point-card {
+         padding: 14px;
+         border-radius: 12px;
+     }
+     
+     .point-content h4 {
+         font-size: 13px;
+         margin-bottom: 6px;
+     }
+     
+     .point-content p {
+         font-size: 11px;
+     }
+     
+     .close-btn {
+         width: 28px;
+         height: 28px;
+         font-size: 14px;
+         top: 10px;
+         right: 12px;
+     }
+ }
```

```diff
          const resetBtn = document.getElementById('resetBtn');
          const endCallBtn = document.getElementById('endCallBtn');
+         const pointsBtn = document.getElementById('pointsBtn');
+         const pointsCloseBtn = document.getElementById('pointsCloseBtn');
+         const pointsPopupOverlay = document.getElementById('pointsPopupOverlay');
  
          startCallBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.startCall());
          resetBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetDemo());
          endCallBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.endCall());
+         
+         // æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹åŠŸèƒ½
+         pointsBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => this.showPointsPopup());
```

---

_**User**_

æŠŠ CJ_1å’ŒCJ_2çš„æ¼”ç¤ºè¦ç‚¹ä¹ŸåŒæ­¥æ›´æ–°ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œè·Ÿ3ã€4ã€5ã€6çš„å¼„æˆä¸€è‡´çš„

---

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘æ¥åˆ›å»ºé…å¥—çš„æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š
